analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdud bye ba mnan pa ste ma gsungs kyang snying rje chen pos dmigs nas mtha' med cing thug pa med pa grangs med pa'i bdud mnan pa ni rang gi sems kyi bag chags kyi rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'o //
translated: Although not stated, the suppression of millions of demons is also included. The suppression of infinite, endless, countless demons by the Great Compassionate One arises from the conceptual thoughts of one's own mental imprints.

original: de nyid mi bden pa'i dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor 'chi ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyi sgrub thabs gdams pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid mi bden pa'i dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor 'chi ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyi sgrub thabs gdams pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis mtshon pa'o //
translated: That is the false glory of Heruka, the yoga of immortality, characterized by the instructions of the sādhana.

original: phyag bcu gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtogs par sla ste /
analyzed: phyag bcu gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtogs par sla ste /
translated: The twelve mudrās, etc. are easy to understand.

original: bde mchog la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams su dpal he ru ka bsgom par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bde mchog la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams su dpal he ru ka bsgom par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: In the Yoginī Tantras such as the Cakrasaṃvara, it is not Śrī Heruka who is to be meditated upon.

original: de nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid gsungs pa /
translated: He himself says this:

original: gang dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas sna tshogs pa'i rgyud rnams kyi gtso bo'o //
analyzed: gang dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas sna tshogs pa'i rgyud rnams kyi gtso bo'o //
translated: “In the various tantras, the principal one is the one called ‘Hevajra.’

original: phyi zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang spyod pa'o //
analyzed: phyi zhes bya ba ni bya ba dang spyod pa'o //
translated: The outer one is the Kriyā and Caryā.

original: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni dpal 'dus pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni dpal 'dus pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do //
translated: The secret one is the Yoga Tantra such as the glorious Guhyasamāja.

original: nang gi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni nges par brjod pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni nges par brjod pa la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams kyi'o //
translated: The inner one is the Yoginī Tantra such as the Niṣpannayogāvalī.

original: de dang de'i zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'i rgyud rnams su lha'i gtso bo'i sku he ru ka'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de dang de'i zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'i rgyud rnams su lha'i gtso bo'i sku he ru ka'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In those and those tantras taught, the principal deity’s body is to be meditated upon as having the nature of Heruka.

original: de ltar he ru ka'i rnam par rang 'dod pa'i lha thams cad nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar he ru ka'i rnam par rang 'dod pa'i lha thams cad nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
translated: Thus, all one’s desired deities are to be indicated in the form of Heruka.

original: gal te he ru ka'i rnam pa rgyud sna tshogs su rang 'dod pa'i lha yin na /
analyzed: gal te he ru ka'i rnam pa rgyud sna tshogs su rang 'dod pa'i lha yin na /
translated: If Heruka’s form is one’s desired deity in the various tantras,

original: de'i tshe sgrol ma 'byung ba la sogs pa'i rgyud yod par 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i tshe sgrol ma 'byung ba la sogs pa'i rgyud yod par 'gyur /
translated: At that time, the Tantra of Tara's Origination, etc. would exist.🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / dbye ba mos pa'i dbang gis te //
analyzed: gsungs pa / dbye ba mos pa'i dbang gis te //
translated: The division is by the power of devotion.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi bag chags kyi dbang gis sems can mos pa sna tshogs so //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi bag chags kyi dbang gis sems can mos pa sna tshogs so //
translated: By the power of the previous habitual tendencies of sentient beings, there are various kinds of sentient beings with different inclinations.

original: 'dir de bzhin du dbang dang yongs su bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dir de bzhin du dbang dang yongs su bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Here, in the same way, the empowerment, the complete action, etc. are taught.

original: bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis me tog bskyur ba @43a * //
analyzed: bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis me tog bskyur ba @43a * //
translated: By the characteristics of the blessing of truth, etc., the flower cast, etc.

original: la sogs pas rang gi rigs kyang nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: la sogs pas rang gi rigs kyang nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
translated: also illustrates one's own family.

original: gang gis dngos grub rigs 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang gis dngos grub rigs 'gyur ba //
translated: By whom there is the transformation of the family of powers,

original: de yi rigs kyi snod can te //
analyzed: de yi rigs kyi snod can te //
translated: he is a vessel of that family.

original: lha rnams rigs kyi rim par ni //
analyzed: lha rnams rigs kyi rim par ni //
translated: By the sequence of the families of the deities,🔽may it be so here by casting the flower.

original: me tog bskyur bas 'dir 'gyur shog / ces bya bas byin gyis brlabs so //
analyzed: me tog bskyur bas 'dir 'gyur shog / ces bya bas byin gyis brlabs so //
translated: Thus it is blessed.

original: de'i phyir dbye bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbye bar dgongs so //
translated: Therefore, it is intended to divide.

original: rgyud dang rgyud kyi nang du mchog / ces bya ba ni rgyud sna tshogs pa rnams su gtso bo ma yin par ro //
analyzed: rgyud dang rgyud kyi nang du mchog / ces bya ba ni rgyud sna tshogs pa rnams su gtso bo ma yin par ro //
translated: The phrase in the tantras and within the tantras, the supreme means that [the four syllables] are not the principal [topic] in the various tantras.

original: dpal he ru ka yang yi ge bzhi rnams kyis sku bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs te /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka yang yi ge bzhi rnams kyis sku bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs te /
translated: The glorious Heruka is also said to be the nature of the four bodies by means of the four syllables.

original: gang gi phyir de'i dgongs pa rnams dang bral na sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i chos su mi 'gyur zhing mu stegs kyi chos dang mnyam mo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de'i dgongs pa rnams dang bral na sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i chos su mi 'gyur zhing mu stegs kyi chos dang mnyam mo //
translated: Because if one is devoid of his intention, the Dharma taught by the Buddha will not be [understood], and it will be the same as the non-Buddhist Dharma.

original: de bzhin du yang kye'i rdo rje la sogs par gsungs pa'i yi ge bzhi rnams kyi nges pa'i tshul gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang kye'i rdo rje la sogs par gsungs pa'i yi ge bzhi rnams kyi nges pa'i tshul gsungs pa /
translated: Similarly, the definitive method of the four syllables taught in the Hevajra and other [tantras] is stated:

original: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
analyzed: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
translated: ŚRĪ is nondual wisdom,

original: he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
analyzed: he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
translated: HE is the emptiness of causes and so forth,

original: ru ni bkod pa dang bral te //
analyzed: ru ni bkod pa dang bral te //
translated: RU is free from arrangement,

original: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas so //
analyzed: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas so //
translated: KA does not abide anywhere.

original: de ltar mchog dang gtso bo'i gzugs su gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar mchog dang gtso bo'i gzugs su gsungs pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is said to be the supreme and principal form.

original: ming ci 'drar shes par bya zhes bya ba ni rang rang gi rgyud rnams su rang gi 'dod pa'i lha dpal sgrol ma la sogs pa'i ming ngo //
analyzed: ming ci 'drar shes par bya zhes bya ba ni rang rang gi rgyud rnams su rang gi 'dod pa'i lha dpal sgrol ma la sogs pa'i ming ngo //
translated: What are their names? means the names of one's chosen deities, such as Sri Tara, in one's own tantras.

original: 'on kyang he ru ka bsre zhes bya ba ni dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug he ru ka ste de ltar mtha' med pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gar mdzad pa rnams su sangs rgyas he ru ka la sogs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang he ru ka bsre zhes bya ba ni dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug he ru ka ste de ltar mtha' med pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gar mdzad pa rnams su sangs rgyas he ru ka la sogs par shes par bya'o //
translated: However, mixing with Heruka means Sri Heruka, the Lord of the World. Thus, one should know that the Buddhas, who dance in the infinite, are the Buddha Heruka, etc.

original: kha dog de dang 'dra zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dkar po dang dmar po la sogs par rang rang gi rgyud rnams su gsungs pa'i mdog go //
analyzed: kha dog de dang 'dra zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dkar po dang dmar po la sogs par rang rang gi rgyud rnams su gsungs pa'i mdog go //
translated: Their colors are similar means the colors taught in one's own tantras, such as white, red, etc.

original: de bzhin du 'dir yang bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang bya'o //
translated: So it is here also.

original: bzhugs tshul he ru ka'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni phyag bcu gnyis pa zhal bzhi pa spyan gsum pa ral ba'i cod pan can gar dang ldan pa zhabs g-yas brkyang pas gnon pa ni 'phrog byed dang dkar mo la sogs pa sna tshogs pa mnan pa phag
analyzed: bzhugs tshul he ru ka'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni phyag bcu gnyis pa zhal bzhi pa spyan gsum pa ral ba'i cod pan can gar dang ldan pa zhabs g-yas brkyang pas gnon pa ni 'phrog byed dang dkar mo la sogs pa sna tshogs pa mnan pa phag
translated: The phrase “the mode of existence in the form of Heruka” means that one should visualize the twelve-armed, four-faced, three-eyed Heruka, wearing a crown of matted hair, dancing, and standing with his right leg extended, trampling on the various forms of Bhairava, Gaurī, and so on, and embracing Vārāhī, and so on.

original: mo la sogs pa la 'khyud pa mtshon cha glang po la sogs pa nas rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mo la sogs pa la 'khyud pa mtshon cha glang po la sogs pa nas rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: He holds weapons such as an elephant goad, and so on, up to a trident.

original: de ci'i phyir sa rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sa bcu gnyis rnam par dag pas phyag bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir sa rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sa bcu gnyis rnam par dag pas phyag bcu gnyis so //
translated: The phrase “why are they called the stages?” and so on means that the twelve stages are purified by the twelve arms.

original: ma gsungs kyang dga' ba bzhi rnam par dag pas zhal bzhi'o //
analyzed: ma gsungs kyang dga' ba bzhi rnam par dag pas zhal bzhi'o //
translated: Even though it is not stated, the four faces are purified by the four joys.

original: spyan bcu gnyis ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / de bzhin du yongs su brtags pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang dang / yongs su @43b grub pa dang / mtshan gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: spyan bcu gnyis ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / de bzhin du yongs su brtags pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang dang / yongs su @43b grub pa dang / mtshan gzhi dang / mtshan nyid dang /
translated: The twelve eyes are the purities of emptiness, signlessness,🔽wishlessness, and likewise, the imagined, the dependent, and the thoroughly established, the basis of characteristics, the characteristics,

original: mtshon pa dang / de bzhin du snang ba dang snang ba gsal ba dang snang ba thob pa rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: mtshon pa dang / de bzhin du snang ba dang snang ba gsal ba dang snang ba thob pa rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: and the illustration.

original: ral ba'i cod pan ni drang po min pa'i skye bo thams cad gdul ba'i phyir 'khyog par byas pa'o //
analyzed: ral ba'i cod pan ni drang po min pa'i skye bo thams cad gdul ba'i phyir 'khyog par byas pa'o //
translated: The topknot is crooked in order to tame all crooked beings.

original: gar dang ldan pa ni sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa ste gsung rab yan lag dgu rnams so //
analyzed: gar dang ldan pa ni sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa ste gsung rab yan lag dgu rnams so //
translated: Possessing dance is possessing the moods of grace, and so on, which are the nine branches of scripture.

original: g-yas brkyang pas mnan pa ni g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i sna'i bu ga rnams su sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnan pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang pas mnan pa ni g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i sna'i bu ga rnams su sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnan pa'o //
translated: The right leg is extended in order to trample on the left and right nostrils, which are the earth and so on mandalas.

original: 'phrog byed dang dkar mo ni sred pa dang zhe sdang mnan pa'o //
analyzed: 'phrog byed dang dkar mo ni sred pa dang zhe sdang mnan pa'o //
translated: Graha and Gaurī are trampling on craving and hatred.

original: sna tshogs pa'i bdud ni dam pa ma yin pa'i bag chags sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin lus la sogs pa las skyes pa yongs su mnan pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i bdud ni dam pa ma yin pa'i bag chags sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin lus la sogs pa las skyes pa yongs su mnan pa'o //
translated: The various demons are the various non-virtuous habitual tendencies born from the body, etc.

original: phag mo la sogs pa la 'khyud pa ni /
analyzed: phag mo la sogs pa la 'khyud pa ni /
translated: The embrace of Vārāhī, etc.

original: sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi lung gi rjes su 'brang ba dang / thabs sna tshogs pa dang gdams ngag sna tshogs pas stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi lung gi rjes su 'brang ba dang / thabs sna tshogs pa dang gdams ngag sna tshogs pas stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'o //
translated: is the various Dharmas, the various means, and the various instructions, which are the observation of emptiness.

original: mtshon cha ni bgegs la sogs pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ster ba po rnam par 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: mtshon cha ni bgegs la sogs pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ster ba po rnam par 'joms pa'o //
translated: The weapon is the destruction of the obstacles, etc., which give the suffering of cyclic existence.

original: de lta bu'i sna tshogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das la las dang po pas rang rang gi dad pa'i dbang du song bas bag chags ngan pa yongs su spangs pa'i phyir dang khyad par 'phags pa'i bag chags la dmigs par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sna tshogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das la las dang po pas rang rang gi dad pa'i dbang du song bas bag chags ngan pa yongs su spangs pa'i phyir dang khyad par 'phags pa'i bag chags la dmigs par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The beginner should visualize the various Blessed Ones in accordance with his own faith, in order to abandon the bad habitual tendencies and to observe the superior habitual tendencies.🔽Therefore,

original: de'i phyir / des na he ru ka dang 'dra //
analyzed: de'i phyir / des na he ru ka dang 'dra //
translated: he is like Heruka.

original: zhes bya ba ste chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa dang bde ba chen po dang 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa dang bde ba chen po dang 'dra ba ste /
translated: Thus, it is similar to the Dharma, Enjoyment, and Emanation Bodies, and to the Great Bliss.

original: rang rang gi lhag par mos pa'i dbang gis sna tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gar mdzad pa he ru ka'i rnam pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: rang rang gi lhag par mos pa'i dbang gis sna tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gar mdzad pa he ru ka'i rnam pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is the dance of the various Buddhas, performed by the Hero's Body, in accordance with the inclinations of each individual.🔽Thus, it is the form of Heruka.

original: de bzhin du kye'i rdo rjer gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du kye'i rdo rjer gsungs pa /
translated: So it is said in the Hevajra Tantra:

original: 'gro ba thams cad nga las byung //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad nga las byung //
translated: All beings come from me.

original: sa gsum po ni nga las byung //
analyzed: sa gsum po ni nga las byung //
translated: The three worlds come from me.

original: 'di dag thams cad nga yis khyab //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad nga yis khyab //
translated: I pervade all this.

original: 'gro ba gzhan ni ngas ma mthong //
analyzed: 'gro ba gzhan ni ngas ma mthong //
translated: I do not see any other being.

original: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
translated: This is the definitive statement of the Bhagavat.

original: slar yang de ltar 'di gsungs pa //🔽sangs rgyas bye ba yongs byung ba //
analyzed: slar yang de ltar 'di gsungs pa // sangs rgyas bye ba yongs byung ba //
translated: And again, it is said:🔽For the sake of the welfare of millions of beings,

original: sems can bye ba'i don phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can bye ba'i don phyir ro //
translated: millions of Buddhas have appeared.

original: thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du //🔽sgyu ma nyid du dmigs pa des //
analyzed: thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du // sgyu ma nyid du dmigs pa des //
translated: All of them are of the nature of illusion.🔽By the perception of illusion itself,

original: rnam par bsgyings pa'i sgyu ma des //
analyzed: rnam par bsgyings pa'i sgyu ma des //
translated: by that illusion of display,

original: las can rnams kyi dbang po sogs //
analyzed: las can rnams kyi dbang po sogs //
translated: the senses and so forth of those who have karma,

original: las 'bras bu yang za ba ste //
analyzed: las 'bras bu yang za ba ste //
translated: And also experience the results of karma.

original: dge dang mi dge'i 'gror song ba //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge'i 'gror song ba //
translated: They go to virtuous and nonvirtuous realms.

original: de ni bden min brdzun pa min //
analyzed: de ni bden min brdzun pa min //
translated: That is neither true nor false.

original: mi bden pa yi zas longs spyod //
analyzed: mi bden pa yi zas longs spyod //
translated: They enjoy food that is not real.

original: sna tshogs @44a * //
analyzed: sna tshogs @44a * //
translated: Various

original: gzugs ni mi bden te //
analyzed: gzugs ni mi bden te //
translated: forms are not real.

original: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs bden pa min //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs bden pa min //
translated: The Buddha taught that they are not true.

original: ma lus go 'phang bden pa ni //
analyzed: ma lus go 'phang bden pa ni //
translated: The true state, which is the complete stage,

original: bden min mtha' yi bar brtags pa'o //
analyzed: bden min mtha' yi bar brtags pa'o //
translated: Is imagined to be between the two extremes of truth and untruth.

original: de ltar de bzhin sgyu ma che //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin sgyu ma che //
translated: Thus, the great illusion is like that.

original: sprul pa sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa //
analyzed: sprul pa sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa //
translated: The emanations are emanated by the Buddha.

original: kun rdzob kyi ni bden pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi ni bden pa'i gzugs //
translated: The form of conventional truth

original: ye shes shes bya gnyis su gnas //
analyzed: ye shes shes bya gnyis su gnas //
translated: Abides in the two: pristine consciousness and the object of knowledge.

original: bden dang mi bden bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bden dang mi bden bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate on the true and the untrue.

original: ji ltar pi wang gi ni sgra //
analyzed: ji ltar pi wang gi ni sgra //
translated: Just as the sound of a vīṇā

original: rgyu rkyen dbang gis 'byung ba ste //
analyzed: rgyu rkyen dbang gis 'byung ba ste //
translated: Arises through the power of causes and conditions,

original: rtsol ba rgyud dang lag pas so //
analyzed: rtsol ba rgyud dang lag pas so //
translated: Through effort, the strings, and the hands,

original: de bzhin du ni gsungs pa'i chos //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni gsungs pa'i chos //
translated: So, too, is the Dharma that is taught.

original: phan tshun nyams su myong ba yis //
analyzed: phan tshun nyams su myong ba yis //
translated: Through mutual experience,

original: thog ma med nas sgyu mar gnas //
analyzed: thog ma med nas sgyu mar gnas //
translated: It abides as an illusion from beginningless time.

original: mthar med pa de 'byung med phyir //
analyzed: mthar med pa de 'byung med phyir //
translated: Because that which is without an end is without origin,

original: thams cad bdag po de byang chub //
analyzed: thams cad bdag po de byang chub //
translated: All is the Lord, that is enlightenment.

original: sgyu ma che las kun 'byung ngo //
analyzed: sgyu ma che las kun 'byung ngo //
translated: All arises from the great illusion.

original: zhes so // 'dir gsungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes so // 'dir gsungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Here, it is said:

original: bdag po zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ston pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bdag po zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ston pa'i phyir te /
translated: The Lord is the one who shows all mundane and supramundane perfections.

original: 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod par mdzad pa'i khyab bdag ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod par mdzad pa'i khyab bdag ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the phrase “the all-pervading Lord who cuts off the continuity of cyclic existence” is as follows.

original: yang na sv'a'i yi ge gsum rnams te zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rlung gi bar du'o //🔽sa zhes bya ba ni sa thams cad kyi steng rnams su'o //
analyzed: yang na sv'a'i yi ge gsum rnams te zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rlung gi bar du'o // sa zhes bya ba ni sa thams cad kyi steng rnams su'o //
translated: Or, the three syllables sva are the vajra wind.🔽The syllable sa is the upper part of all the earth.

original: aa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i rang bzhin la'o //
analyzed: aa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la gnas pa rnams kyi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i rang bzhin la'o //
translated: The syllable a is the sky.

original: mi zhes bya ba ni yi ge gnyis te sad pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: mi zhes bya ba ni yi ge gnyis te sad pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs dang bral ba'o //
translated: The syllable mi is the two syllables.

original: bde ba che zhes bya ba ni 'dis sa 'og la sogs pa na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rang bzhin ni bde chen no //
analyzed: bde ba che zhes bya ba ni 'dis sa 'og la sogs pa na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rang bzhin ni bde chen no //
translated: The great bliss is the nature of the yoginis who dwell in the underworld, etc.

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi'o //
translated: The yoginis who have that nature.

original: de'i phyir de ltar rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes pa ste /
translated: Therefore, thus the Vajradaka.

original: d'a ni nam mkha' bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: d'a ni nam mkha' bde ba chen po'o //
translated: The da is the sky, the great bliss.

original: aa ka'i sgras so //
analyzed: aa ka'i sgras so //
translated: By the word aka.

original: mkha' 'gro ma ni rnal 'byor ma rnams te 'gro ba nyid dang 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma ni rnal 'byor ma rnams te 'gro ba nyid dang 'jug pa'o //
translated: The dakas are the yoginis, the goers, the engaged.

original: de rnams dang dbyer med pa nyid kyi ste /
analyzed: de rnams dang dbyer med pa nyid kyi ste /
translated: They are inseparable from that.🔽The vajra is the nondual, the distinctive.

original: rdo rje ni khyad par du byed pa gnyis su med pa gang yin pa de rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdag po zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
analyzed: rdo rje ni khyad par du byed pa gnyis su med pa gang yin pa de rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdag po zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
translated: That which is so is the Vajradaka, the lord.

original: de ltar phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung ste //
analyzed: de ltar phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung ste //
translated: Thus, the Blessed One, the Tathagata, who is the nature of all perfections, is also the sound of emptiness.

original: ji ltar brgya la zhig na yang nam mkha' dri ma med pa las sgra 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar brgya la zhig na yang nam mkha' dri ma med pa las sgra 'byung ngo //
translated: Just as, by some chance, a sound arises from the stainless sky,

original: de bzhin du bdag gis de ltar rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma thams @44b cad dang lhan cig dpa' bo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba las zhes te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis de ltar rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma thams @44b cad dang lhan cig dpa' bo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba las zhes te /
translated: so also, in the same way, I, together with all the dakinis such as Vajravarahi, from the union of all the heroes,

original: gang thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kun du 'pho ba'o //
analyzed: gang thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kun du 'pho ba'o //
translated: all of the nature of means and wisdom, the forms of Vajrasattva, are transferred.

original: des de bzhin mchog tu bde zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: des de bzhin mchog tu bde zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By that, thus, supreme bliss,

original: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du chos thams cad rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du chos thams cad rtogs pa'o //
translated: the realization of all phenomena as the nature of great bliss.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rdo rje phag mos bsdu ba mdzad pa rang gi rgyud yongs su spangs pa ni 'di zhes bya ba ste de ltar le'u yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rdo rje phag mos bsdu ba mdzad pa rang gi rgyud yongs su spangs pa ni 'di zhes bya ba ste de ltar le'u yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The Bhagavat's speech, compiled by Vajravarahi, abandoning her own tantra, is this, thus the chapter is complete.

original: de yang thog mar 'jug pa ye shes kyi rgya mtsho 'di'o //
analyzed: de yang thog mar 'jug pa ye shes kyi rgya mtsho 'di'o //
translated: And that is the beginning of the ocean of wisdom entry.

original: rgya mtsho drug la sogs pa'i dang po'o //
analyzed: rgya mtsho drug la sogs pa'i dang po'o //
translated: The first of the six oceans, and so on.

original: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The Glorious Ocean of Dakas is as follows:

original: dpal ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: dpal ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'o //
translated: Glorious means the two accumulations of merit, mundane and supramundane, and non-dual.

original: mkha' 'gro'i sgra sngon du bshad do //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro'i sgra sngon du bshad do //
translated: The word dakini was explained earlier.

original: rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni khyad par te /
analyzed: rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni khyad par te /
translated: Ocean is a particularity,

original: gnyis su med pa'i rgya mtsho dang / rang bzhin shes par bya ba'i don rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'di'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i rgya mtsho dang / rang bzhin shes par bya ba'i don rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'di'o //
translated: meaning this is the non-dual ocean, the various aspects of the meaning to be known by nature.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba ni de ltar sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i dbus su 'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzhin gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba ni de ltar sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i dbus su 'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzhin gsal ba'o //
translated: The Great King of Yoginī Tantras is as follows: In the middle of the king of tantras of various aspects and non-duality, like a great universal monarch, it is clear.

original: ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yan lag bcu bdun gyi ngo bo thams cad kyi mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba ste rnam grangs so //
analyzed: ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa yan lag bcu bdun gyi ngo bo thams cad kyi mngon par brjod pa zhes bya ba ste rnam grangs so //
translated: The All-Embracing Expression of the Essence of the Seventeen Branches of the Ocean of Wisdom is a synonym.

original: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las rgyu mtshan dam pa la sogs pa'i tshig sna tshogs pa rnams yan lag bcu bdun rnams /
analyzed: dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i 'grel pa gru gzings las rgyu mtshan dam pa la sogs pa'i tshig sna tshogs pa rnams yan lag bcu bdun rnams /
translated: In the commentary on the great king of tantras of Yoginī, the Ocean of Dakas, the Ship, the various words such as “the highest reason” are the seventeen branches.

original: le'u thams cad kyi dang po'i le'ur bshad pa mdor bstan pa las /
analyzed: le'u thams cad kyi dang po'i le'ur bshad pa mdor bstan pa las /
translated: In the brief presentation of the first chapter of all the chapters,

original: le'u dang po'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: le'u dang po'i 'grel pa rdzogs so /
translated: the commentary on the first chapter is complete.

original: // / de ltar rdo rje phag sku la //
analyzed: // / de ltar rdo rje phag sku la //
translated: Thus, in the body of Vajravārāhī,

original: shes bya de nyid rab 'jug ma //
analyzed: shes bya de nyid rab 'jug ma //
translated: she is the one who enters the reality that is to be known.

original: ye shes rnam pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: ye shes rnam pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: By the nature of the aspect of pristine consciousness,

original: chos rnams gnas las skyed pa mo //🔽rnal 'byor ma tshogs ma lus pa'i //
analyzed: chos rnams gnas las skyed pa mo // rnal 'byor ma tshogs ma lus pa'i //
translated: she is the one who generates phenomena from the abode.

original: de yi rang bzhin gyis gnas ma //🔽gtum mo lta bu'i rang lha mo //🔽mkha' 'gro'i gzugs can phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin gyis gnas ma // gtum mo lta bu'i rang lha mo // mkha' 'gro'i gzugs can phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: She is the one who abides by the nature of all the hosts of yoginīs.🔽She is the one who has the form of a ḍākinī, like a fierce inner fire.

original: de nyid nyi ma khyod lha mos //
analyzed: de nyid nyi ma khyod lha mos //
translated: Having bowed to you, the goddess of the sun,🔽the one who is arisen in the assembly,

original: shar ba 'dus pa kyang zag med //
analyzed: shar ba 'dus pa kyang zag med //
translated: the one who is stainless,

original: sna tshogs dbu ma'i rtsa kun dang // padma rtogs par byed ma'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs dbu ma'i rtsa kun dang // padma rtogs par byed ma'o //
translated: the one who causes the various central channels and lotuses to be realized,

original: de ltar yon tan gter bstod nas //
analyzed: de ltar yon tan gter bstod nas //
translated: Having thus praised the treasure of good qualities,

original: bdag gi 'grel pa'ang brjod bya ste //
analyzed: bdag gi 'grel pa'ang brjod bya ste //
translated: I will also express my commentary,

original: bla ma rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi //
analyzed: bla ma rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi //
translated: By the permission of the gurus and Vajradharas,

original: @45a * // sprul pas mngon sum rjes gnang pa'o //
analyzed: @45a * // sprul pas mngon sum rjes gnang pa'o //
translated: Through their direct emanations.

original: de nas rdo rje phag mo'i le'u gnyis pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje phag mo'i le'u gnyis pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: Then, with regard to the second chapter on Vajravarahi, it is said:

original: bskyed pa la sogs pa dang rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa'i go cha'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i sngags rnams kyi 'khrul 'khor rnams dang / gtso mo dang / dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin kyang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bskyed pa la sogs pa dang rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa'i go cha'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i sngags rnams kyi 'khrul 'khor rnams dang / gtso mo dang / dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin kyang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The yantras of the root mantras and the armor mantras of Vajravarahi and so forth, the principal one, the meditation on the mandala, and the nature of reality will also be explained.

original: mchod byas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mchod byas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Having worshipped and so forth.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Vajra means Great Vajradhara.

original: slar yang ni thog ma la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang ni thog ma la ltos pa'o //
translated: Again refers to the beginning.

original: mchod pa zhes bya ba ni gtum mo 'bar bar gyur pas 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid can rdo rje phag mo de'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin rnams su mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mchod pa zhes bya ba ni gtum mo 'bar bar gyur pas 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid can rdo rje phag mo de'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin rnams su mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word “worship” means that, by the blazing of the fierce fire, one should worship with the nature of the worship of Vajravarahi, who is the nature of great passion.

original: lha rdzas rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni seng ge dang 'phrog byed dang dbyig gi snying po la sogs pa rnams kyi bdag mo'i lha mo'o //
analyzed: lha rdzas rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni seng ge dang 'phrog byed dang dbyig gi snying po la sogs pa rnams kyi bdag mo'i lha mo'o //
translated: “Divine Yoginis” means that they are the goddesses who are the mistresses of the lions, Kama, Vasudhara, etc.

original: seng ge ni khyab 'jug ste sems so //
analyzed: seng ge ni khyab 'jug ste sems so //
translated: The lion is Vishnu, the mind.

original: 'phrog byed ni bde byed de byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: 'phrog byed ni bde byed de byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Kama is Kamadeva, the bodhicitta.

original: dbyig gi snying po ni tshangs pa ste ba thag lta bu'i lus kyi rtsa'o //🔽sogs kyi sgras sna tshogs pa'i lha rnams kyang mig la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can de rnams kyi bdag po ste /
analyzed: dbyig gi snying po ni tshangs pa ste ba thag lta bu'i lus kyi rtsa'o // sogs kyi sgras sna tshogs pa'i lha rnams kyang mig la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can de rnams kyi bdag po ste /
translated: Vasudhara is Brahma, the channel of the body like a rope.🔽The word “etc.” includes the various gods, who are of the nature of the arrangement of the eyes, etc.

original: rang gis rig pa'i bdag nyid can lha rdzas kyi rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang gis rig pa'i bdag nyid can lha rdzas kyi rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The mistress of those is the divine Yogini, who is of the nature of self-awareness. This is the meaning.

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can bstan par ma brjod ces bya ba la sogs pa nas dgongs pa nas dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i bar du dris pa ste /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can bstan par ma brjod ces bya ba la sogs pa nas dgongs pa nas dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i bar du dris pa ste /
translated: The nature of that is not explained.🔽🔽

original: phyed dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pas so //
analyzed: phyed dang bcas pa'i tshigs su bcad pas so //
translated: The question is asked in the half-verse beginning The nature of that up to the intention of the intention.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po rang gi sems kyi rgyal po bla ma'i nye bar bstan pa'i dbang gis yul rnams kyi phan tshun rjes su phye ba las thim par gyur pa ni rmi lam ltar rtogs
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po rang gi sems kyi rgyal po bla ma'i nye bar bstan pa'i dbang gis yul rnams kyi phan tshun rjes su phye ba las thim par gyur pa ni rmi lam ltar rtogs
translated: The Bhagavān, the Great Vajradhara, who resides in perfect complete enlightenment, by the power of the guru's instruction, the king of his own mind, through the mutual division of the objects, dissolves into the realization like a dream.

original: bzhin pa la sngon chos nyan pa la sogs pa dang / sgom pa la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: bzhin pa la sngon chos nyan pa la sogs pa dang / sgom pa la sogs pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The Bhagavān is the previous listening to the Dharma, etc. and the meditation, etc.

original: bdag po zhes bya ba ni le'u sngon mar bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bdag po zhes bya ba ni le'u sngon mar bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: The lord is as explained in the previous chapter.

original: ci bstan par mdzod ces gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci bstan par mdzod ces gsungs pa /
translated: What is taught? is said.

original: phag mo zhes bya ba ste mdor bsdus na rdo rje phag mo bdag gi ming yi ge gsum byed pa mdor bstan pa'o //🔽ci las byung ba zhes bya ba ni ci'i phyir bskyed pa gsungs shig pa'o //
analyzed: phag mo zhes bya ba ste mdor bsdus na rdo rje phag mo bdag gi ming yi ge gsum byed pa mdor bstan pa'o // ci las byung ba zhes bya ba ni ci'i phyir bskyed pa gsungs shig pa'o //
translated: The name Vārāhī is the three syllables of my name Vajravārāhī, in brief.🔽 What is the origin? means Tell me why it is generated.

original: skyed pa gang gis bskyed pa yin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: skyed pa gang gis bskyed pa yin zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By what generation is it generated?

original: gang gis @45b phag mos zhes bya ba'i ming gi yi ge gsum las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis @45b phag mos zhes bya ba'i ming gi yi ge gsum las 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By what is the name Vārāhī produced from the three syllables?

original: rang bzhin ji ltar 'dod ces bya ba ni yi ge 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin ji ltar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin ji ltar 'dod ces bya ba ni yi ge 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin ji ltar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: What is the nature of the desire? means What is the nature of these syllables?

original: bdag 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan ci zhes bya ba ni de ltar yi ge gsum las bdag rdo rje phag mo ji ltar byung /
analyzed: bdag 'byung ba'i rgyu mtshan ci zhes bya ba ni de ltar yi ge gsum las bdag rdo rje phag mo ji ltar byung /
translated: What is the reason for my origin? means In that way, how do I, Vajravārāhī, originate from the three syllables?

original: 'dir ni dgongs pa ji ltar yin zhes bya ba ni yang na nga'i dngos pos dgos pa de gang yin zhes dris pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni dgongs pa ji ltar yin zhes bya ba ni yang na nga'i dngos pos dgos pa de gang yin zhes dris pa ste /
translated: What is the intention here? means Or what is the purpose of my entity?

original: dri ba bzhi po 'di rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das kyi lan ni /
analyzed: dri ba bzhi po 'di rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das kyi lan ni /
translated: The Blessed One's reply to these four questions is as follows:

original: dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The three syllables are the three places,

original: yi ge gsum rnams su ni skye gnas te /
analyzed: yi ge gsum rnams su ni skye gnas te /
translated: and the three places are the three wombs.

original: de yang dngos po phag mo can thog mar 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang dngos po phag mo can thog mar 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: And that is the first entry of the entity having a sow face,

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje phag mo'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: which is the focus of the Vajra Sow mandala to be explained.

original: de'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbus ma la gtum mo rab tu sbar te g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i bar du rgyu ba rnams kyis yongs su bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbus ma la gtum mo rab tu sbar te g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i bar du rgyu ba rnams kyis yongs su bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the gathering of the movements in between the left and right by the blazing of the fierce fire in the middle of the samādhi,🔽all of the faculties, etc.,

original: dbang po la sogs pa thams cad la zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa thams cad la zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa la yang ngo //
translated: the aggregates, elements, sense bases, etc.,🔽in the navel mandala,🔽in the mandala of the lord of all, the channel, etc.,

original: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi bdag po rtsa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni lte ba'o //
analyzed: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi bdag po rtsa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni lte ba'o //
translated: the navel,🔽abides there,

original: der rab tu bzhugs zhes bya ba ni rang gi rig pa rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: der rab tu bzhugs zhes bya ba ni rang gi rig pa rtogs pa'o //
translated: realizing one’s awareness.

original: steng du kha bltas 'bab ces bya ba ni rang gi rig pa mtshon du med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: steng du kha bltas 'bab ces bya ba ni rang gi rig pa mtshon du med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The falling is looking upward, because one's own awareness is not an object of illustration.

original: b'a'i yi ges rlung ste rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku thams cad du rjes su 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs can no //
analyzed: b'a'i yi ges rlung ste rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku thams cad du rjes su 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs can no //
translated: The wind is the letter va, and the forms of Vajravārāhī and so on are all the emanation bodies of the buddhas, which are the forms of yoginīs that pervade everywhere.

original: spyi bo'i rdo rje gur du zhes bya ba ni mtshon du med pa las mtshon pa'i rdo rje gur ni chos kyi sku ste /
analyzed: spyi bo'i rdo rje gur du zhes bya ba ni mtshon du med pa las mtshon pa'i rdo rje gur ni chos kyi sku ste /
translated: The vajra tent is the dharma body, which is the tent of vajras that are illustrations from the nonillustrated.

original: mi phyed pa'i phyir dang khyab par bya ba nyid kyis rdo rje'i gur te sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i phyir dang khyab par bya ba nyid kyis rdo rje'i gur te sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is the tent of vajras because it is indivisible and pervades everywhere, and it is the wisdom of the buddhas.

original: de yang b'a'i yi ges rab tu byung ba'o zhes so //
analyzed: de yang b'a'i yi ges rab tu byung ba'o zhes so //
translated: That is also the renunciant by the letter va.

original: spyir sdom pa'i don bshad pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor bas kyang dbang po la sogs pa thams cad lte ba la aa wa dh'u t'i rnams su rab tu zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: spyir sdom pa'i don bshad pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i sbyor bas kyang dbang po la sogs pa thams cad lte ba la aa wa dh'u t'i rnams su rab tu zhugs pa ste /
translated: In general, the meaning of the binding is that by the yoga of the supreme immutable bliss, all the sense organs and so on enter into the avadhūti at the navel.

original: kha gyen du bltas pa dpral ba nas rdo rje nor bu'i spyi bo'i bar du'o //
analyzed: kha gyen du bltas pa dpral ba nas rdo rje nor bu'i spyi bo'i bar du'o //
translated: Looking upward, from the forehead to the top of the vajra jewel.

original: rdo rje'i gur der rab tu babs pa'i rjes su thim par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i gur der rab tu babs pa'i rjes su thim par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Having entered that vajra fence, it dissolves into the drop.

original: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: dbu ma'i rnal 'byor rab 'jug pas //
analyzed: dbu ma'i rnal 'byor rab 'jug pas //
translated: The one who enters the yoga of the central channel

original: g-yon dang g-yas pa kun du spyod //
analyzed: g-yon dang g-yas pa kun du spyod //
translated: practices on the left and right.

original: mig @46a * //
analyzed: mig @46a * //
translated: The eye, etc.,

original: la sogs pa'i khyad par ni //
analyzed: la sogs pa'i khyad par ni //
translated: are the special features.

original: yid kyi rdo rje'i rlung der son //
analyzed: yid kyi rdo rje'i rlung der son //
translated: The mind-vajra wind enters there.

original: zhes so // r'a zhes bya ba ni r'a'i yi ge nges pa'i tshul te /
analyzed: zhes so // r'a zhes bya ba ni r'a'i yi ge nges pa'i tshul te /
translated: The syllable ra is the method of the syllable ra.

original: 'dod chags nyi ma zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i dpral ba nas nor bu'i bu ga'i bar du 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: 'dod chags nyi ma zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i dpral ba nas nor bu'i bu ga'i bar du 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: Passion is the sun, which is the great passion from the forehead to the opening of the jewel, as explained above.

original: me'i thig le ni nyi ma'o //
analyzed: me'i thig le ni nyi ma'o //
translated: The drop of fire is the sun.

original: de nyid kyis bskyod par nd'a ni nam mkha'i me bskal pa sreg pa lta bu thams cad kyi sdud par byed pa po'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis bskyod par nd'a ni nam mkha'i me bskal pa sreg pa lta bu thams cad kyi sdud par byed pa po'o //
translated: That itself is moved by the wind, which is the wind of the space element, which is like the fire at the end of the eon, which is the collector of all.

original: de ltar 'dod chags chen po'i me'i 'od kyi thig le'i nyi ma shar ba yang gti mug la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud par byed pa po'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'dod chags chen po'i me'i 'od kyi thig le'i nyi ma shar ba yang gti mug la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud par byed pa po'o //
translated: Thus, the sun of the drop of the light of the fire of great passion arises, and it is the one who completely gathers the conceptual thoughts of delusion and so forth.

original: dbus su zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi me'i nyi ma de'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: dbus su zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi me'i nyi ma de'i dbus su'o //
translated: In the center means in the center of that sun of the fire of wisdom.

original: sbrul mo zhes bya ba ni zab mo ste rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang rdo rje 'chang gi bdag nyid can kyang ngo //
analyzed: sbrul mo zhes bya ba ni zab mo ste rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang rdo rje 'chang gi bdag nyid can kyang ngo //
translated: The female snake is profound, and she is also the nature of Vajradhara, who is emptiness endowed with all aspects.

original: skad cig gis thim 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa ye shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yang mi 'dzin par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig gis thim 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa ye shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yang mi 'dzin par gyur pa'o //
translated: In an instant, she dissolves means that the yogin becomes free of even the conceptual thought of wisdom.

original: de las skyes pa'i phag mo zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i cho ga'i bya ba rnams la bha ga dang ling+ga'i bar las bdag nyid gyi  ming rang gis rig pa po'i srog go //
analyzed: de las skyes pa'i phag mo zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i cho ga'i bya ba rnams la bha ga dang ling+ga'i bar las bdag nyid gyi  ming rang gis rig pa po'i srog go //
translated: The sow born from that means that between the bhaga and the liṅga of such ritual activity, one’s own name is the life of the one who knows.

original: gang bha ga ling+ga de ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang bha ga ling+ga de ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is that bhaga and liṅga?

original: rtog pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi ye shes kyi bha ga'i ye shes kyi me'i nyi ma la sogs pa dang 'khyud pa'i ling+ga gang gis shes par 'gyur ba dang ye shes kyi'o //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi ye shes kyi bha ga'i ye shes kyi me'i nyi ma la sogs pa dang 'khyud pa'i ling+ga gang gis shes par 'gyur ba dang ye shes kyi'o //
translated: The liṅga of the gnosis of the bhaga, which has the nature of non-conceptual gnosis, is embraced by the sun of the fire of gnosis, etc.

original: de las byung ba'i phag mo'i zhes bya ba'i ming ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i phag mo'i zhes bya ba'i ming ni rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: The name “Vārāhī” arises from that.

original: 'di nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi ma dang pa dag go //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi phyir rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi ma dang pa dag go //
translated: For this very reason, they are the mothers of all yoginīs.

original: skye gnas kyi gnas ni thams cad kyi las kyi gzugs brnyan 'chad bzhin pa'i ming gi yi ge rnams su yang ngo //
analyzed: skye gnas kyi gnas ni thams cad kyi las kyi gzugs brnyan 'chad bzhin pa'i ming gi yi ge rnams su yang ngo //
translated: The womb-place is also in the syllables of the name that is being explained, the reflection of the action of all.

original: slar yang 'di rnams kyi ye shes dang shes bya'i rang bzhin ye shes las byung ba rnams kyi dang rdo rje phag mo'i rang bzhin rnams kyi yang skyed pa po gsungs pa /
analyzed: slar yang 'di rnams kyi ye shes dang shes bya'i rang bzhin ye shes las byung ba rnams kyi dang rdo rje phag mo'i rang bzhin rnams kyi yang skyed pa po gsungs pa /
translated: Again, the producer of these, which are of the nature of gnosis and the object of knowledge, which arise from gnosis, and which are of the nature of Vajravārāhī, is stated:

original: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Mahāsukha” and so forth.

original: khams zhes bya ba ni yul dang dbang po la sogs pa dang nam mkha' la sogs pa ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin dag go //
analyzed: khams zhes bya ba ni yul dang dbang po la sogs pa dang nam mkha' la sogs pa ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin dag go //
translated: The “elements” are the objects, faculties, etc., and space, etc., which are of the nature of great bliss.

original: de rnams kyis yang zhes bya ba ni khams thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi thig les so //
analyzed: de rnams kyis yang zhes bya ba ni khams thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi thig les so //
translated: “By them” means by the drops which are the nature of all the elements.

original: skyed pa'o zhes bya ba ni skyed pa ste /
analyzed: skyed pa'o zhes bya ba ni skyed pa ste /
translated: “Generated” means produced.

original: sngon las zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: sngon las zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: “Previously” means in connection with the past.

original: rang bzhin rnams su las kyi phyag rgya dang phrad bas kyang rnal @46b 'byor pa rnams kyi rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin phag mo 'byung ngo zhes bya bar dgongs te 'di ni dri ba dang po'i lan gyi tshig go //
analyzed: rang bzhin rnams su las kyi phyag rgya dang phrad bas kyang rnal @46b 'byor pa rnams kyi rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin phag mo 'byung ngo zhes bya bar dgongs te 'di ni dri ba dang po'i lan gyi tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that by the union with the karmamudra in the natures, the nature of Vajradhara, i.e., Vajrayogini, arises for the yogis. This is the answer to the first question.

original: gnyis pa'i gsungs pa /
analyzed: gnyis pa'i gsungs pa /
translated: The answer to the second question is

original: rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: stated by “nature” and so forth.

original: phag mo'i yi ge gsum so so ba nyid med de de'i tshe bdag med gcig pu zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: phag mo'i yi ge gsum so so ba nyid med de de'i tshe bdag med gcig pu zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The three syllables of Vajrayogini are not individual, and at that time there is only one Nairatmya,

original: yi ge gcig go //
analyzed: yi ge gcig go //
translated: which is the single syllable.

original: de yang rang bzhin med pa'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin med pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: It is also of the nature of essencelessness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mkha' mnyam rnal 'byor gzugs can no //
analyzed: mkha' mnyam rnal 'byor gzugs can no //
translated: The space-like yoga is the form.

original: zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'i don gyi dang po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste lnga pa'i don gyi dang po'o //
translated: This is the first topic of the fifth chapter.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i khyad par ni rnal 'byor pa'i gzugs nyid las so //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i khyad par ni rnal 'byor pa'i gzugs nyid las so //
translated: The distinction of being equal to space is from the very form of the yogi.

original: yi ge rjes su brjod pa las nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ni bdag med pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir te /
analyzed: yi ge rjes su brjod pa las nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ni bdag med pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir te /
translated: From the recitation of the syllables, the equality with space is due to the nature of selflessness.

original: gang gi phyir rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi bsam pa rtse gcig pa las so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnal 'byor pa'i sems kyi bsam pa rtse gcig pa las so //
translated: Because of the one-pointed intention of the yogi's mind.

original: 'dir gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'dir gsungs pa /
translated: Here it is said:

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes nyid gang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes nyid gang //
translated: The wisdom of the buddhas

original: brjod bya rjod pa po mtshan nyid //
analyzed: brjod bya rjod pa po mtshan nyid //
translated: Is characterized by the expressed and the expresser.

original: sbyor ba gcig dang sna tshogs pa //
analyzed: sbyor ba gcig dang sna tshogs pa //
translated: The single and various applications

original: yi ge rnams kyi mkha' mnyam snying //
analyzed: yi ge rnams kyi mkha' mnyam snying //
translated: Are the space-like hearts of the syllables.

original: mkha' mnyam med par shes byas nas //
analyzed: mkha' mnyam med par shes byas nas //
translated: Having understood the unequaled equality with space,

original: bdag med dngos po dngos med pa //
analyzed: bdag med dngos po dngos med pa //
translated: The selfless entity is non-entity.

original: dngos dang dngos med pa med gang //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med pa med gang //
translated: That which is neither entity nor non-entity

original: de tshe bdag med can zhes bshad //
analyzed: de tshe bdag med can zhes bshad //
translated: Is then explained as having selflessness.

original: 'di ni dri ba gnyis pa'i lan no //
analyzed: 'di ni dri ba gnyis pa'i lan no //
translated: This is the answer to the second question.

original: gsum pa'i gsungs pa /
analyzed: gsum pa'i gsungs pa /
translated: The answer to the third is:

original: rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de ltar rdo rje phag mo'i yi ge dang bskyed pa dang rang bzhin bdag med pa yang rgyu mtshan ci'i phyir bskyed par 'gyur /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste de ltar rdo rje phag mo'i yi ge dang bskyed pa dang rang bzhin bdag med pa yang rgyu mtshan ci'i phyir bskyed par 'gyur /
translated: The reason, etc. Thus, why would the letters, generation, and nature of Vajravarahi not be generated?

original: de'i tshe skye bo rnams kyi grol bar byed pa'i rgyu dang snying rje'i gzugs de gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi phag mo snying rje'i rang bzhin gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de'i tshe skye bo rnams kyi grol bar byed pa'i rgyu dang snying rje'i gzugs de gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi phag mo snying rje'i rang bzhin gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Then, the form of compassion, the cause of liberation for people, will arise as the nature of compassion for the people to be tamed.🔽This is the thought.

original: gsum pa'i dri ba'i lan gyi tshig go //
analyzed: gsum pa'i dri ba'i lan gyi tshig go //
translated: The answer to the third question.

original: bzhi pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: bzhi pa gsungs pa /
translated: The answer to the fourth is:

original: dgos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: dgos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The purpose, etc.

original: 'dir gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi grol bar byed pa las byung ba'i phag mo snying rje'i bdag nyid can te /
analyzed: 'dir gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi grol bar byed pa las byung ba'i phag mo snying rje'i bdag nyid can te /
translated: Here, the purpose is the liberation of people to be tamed.

original: de'i tshe sgrub par byed par 'gyur zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i tshe sgrub par byed par 'gyur zhes gsungs so //
translated: Then, the one who accomplishes that will arise.

original: ci gsungs pa /
analyzed: ci gsungs pa /
translated: What is said?

original: phyag rgya'i sbyor pa rab sgrub pa //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i sbyor pa rab sgrub pa // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The accomplishment of the practice of the seal.

original: lnga pa'i don gyi dang po'o //
analyzed: lnga pa'i don gyi dang po'o //
translated: This is the first topic of the fifth chapter.

original: phyag rgya sbyor bas rab tu sgrub pas so //
analyzed: phyag rgya sbyor bas rab tu sgrub pas so //
translated: Because of the accomplishment of the practice of the seal.

original: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'o //🔽thabs dang shes rab dag dang chos rnams kyang sbyor ba ste stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis dngos po thams cad kyi mtshon par bya ba mtshon pa @47a * //
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'o // thabs dang shes rab dag dang chos rnams kyang sbyor ba ste stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis dngos po thams cad kyi mtshon par bya ba mtshon pa @47a * //
translated: The seal is the great seal.

original: nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med pa sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med pa sgrub pa ste /
translated: The practice of method and wisdom and of all things is the nondual accomplishment by the nature of emptiness and compassion, because all things are indicated by the indication of emptiness.

original: rab tu mthar phyin pa'i bar du sems can rnams kyi dgos pa'o zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
analyzed: rab tu mthar phyin pa'i bar du sems can rnams kyi dgos pa'o zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
translated: Up to the ultimate accomplishment is the purpose of sentient beings.

original: 'dir gsungs pa /🔽rang rang dus su dbu ma ru //
analyzed: 'dir gsungs pa / rang rang dus su dbu ma ru //
translated: Here it is said:🔽In their own time, the minds of yogis

original: rnal 'byor rnams kyi sems byung bas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnams kyi sems byung bas //
translated: arise in the central channel.

original: mnyam pa yi ni dus su 'gro //
analyzed: mnyam pa yi ni dus su 'gro //
translated: In the time of equality,

original: sems can dang ni ldan lha rnams //
analyzed: sems can dang ni ldan lha rnams //
translated: the gods who possess sentient beings

original: sa gsum thams cad za ba ste //
analyzed: sa gsum thams cad za ba ste //
translated: eat the entire three worlds.

original: sems can rang gi sems grol med //
analyzed: sems can rang gi sems grol med //
translated: Sentient beings are not liberated by their own minds.

original: snying rje'i phyag rgya gang sems can //
analyzed: snying rje'i phyag rgya gang sems can //
translated: The seal of compassion is any sentient being.

original: de tshe phag mo stong pa'o //
analyzed: de tshe phag mo stong pa'o //
translated: At that time, the pig is emptiness.

original: de rnams gnyis med 'du shes pa //
analyzed: de rnams gnyis med 'du shes pa //
translated: Those two are conceived as nondual.

original: skye med 'ong ba med pa'o //
analyzed: skye med 'ong ba med pa'o //
translated: There is no arising, no coming.

original: chos bdag med dang gang zag ni //
analyzed: chos bdag med dang gang zag ni //
translated: The selflessness of phenomena and the person

original: phyag rgya'i sbyor ba rab tu bsgrub //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i sbyor ba rab tu bsgrub //
translated: are accomplished by the practice of the seal.

original: ces so // dri ba bzhi pa'i lan gyi tshig go //
analyzed: ces so // dri ba bzhi pa'i lan gyi tshig go //
translated: This is the answer to the fourth question.

original: de ltar cho ga dang bya bas rdo rje phag mo rab tu bsgrubs te /
analyzed: de ltar cho ga dang bya bas rdo rje phag mo rab tu bsgrubs te /
translated: Thus, having accomplished Vajravārāhī by means of the rite and practice,

original: rgyud 'di dang rgyud gzhan rnams su yang bcom ldan 'das he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba la sogs par rgya che bar bstan te /
analyzed: rgyud 'di dang rgyud gzhan rnams su yang bcom ldan 'das he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba la sogs par rgya che bar bstan te /
translated: the Blessed Heruka is taught extensively in this tantra and in other tantras, such as in the manifestation of the Blessed One.

original: sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs pa'i dbang gis sna tshogs pa'i ming nye bar bstan pas bshad do //
analyzed: sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs pa'i dbang gis sna tshogs pa'i ming nye bar bstan pas bshad do //
translated: It is explained that the various names are taught due to the power of the various thoughts of sentient beings.

original: da ni rdo rje phag mo'i rnam par gzhag pa'i bdag po la thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi gdams ngag dang sngon du zhus pa'i lan gyi tshig rnams kyis de mdor bstan pa las rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje phag mo'i rnam par gzhag pa'i bdag po la thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi gdams ngag dang sngon du zhus pa'i lan gyi tshig rnams kyis de mdor bstan pa las rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa ste /
translated: Now, in the context of the arrangement of Vajravarahi, the reply to the questions asked earlier is stated in terms of the nature of all things and the instructions.

original: khyod ni bdag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas bsgom pa'i bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i bar du tshigs su bcad pa bcu rnams kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: khyod ni bdag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas bsgom pa'i bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i bar du tshigs su bcad pa bcu rnams kyis gsungs so //
translated: The ten verses beginning with “you are the lord” and ending with “the nature of meditation” are stated.

original: khyod ni lha mo'i bdag po can //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyod ni lha mo'i bdag po can // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: You are the lord of the goddesses.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ste //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ste //
translated: This is stated by the Bhagavat.

original: kye nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag por lha mor rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: kye nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag por lha mor rab tu grags pa'o //
translated: O goddess, you are renowned as the lord of the mandala and the deities of the mandala.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sgom pa'i bdag nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: sgom pa'i bdag nyid kyi'o //
translated: The nature of meditation.

original: des rab tu bsgrubs pa gang gi tshe bdag pos so //
analyzed: des rab tu bsgrubs pa gang gi tshe bdag pos so //
translated: The lord is the one who accomplishes that.

original: kun du spyod pa mang spyod ma //
analyzed: kun du spyod pa mang spyod ma //
translated: You are the one who practices many activities.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'chad bzhin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su rtsa dang sngags kyi sbyor bas kun du spyod pa yang sna tshogs pa'i rdo rje phag mo'i rang bzhin sna tshogs pa'i bdag po'i bdag nyid can rnal 'byor ma kun du spro ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'chad bzhin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su rtsa dang sngags kyi sbyor bas kun du spyod pa yang sna tshogs pa'i rdo rje phag mo'i rang bzhin sna tshogs pa'i bdag po'i bdag nyid can rnal 'byor ma kun du spro ba'o //
translated: This is the emission of the Yoginis, who are of the nature of the various Vajravarahi, the nature of the Lord of the various, by the practice of the channels and mantras in the Buddha-fields being described.

original: cis she na /
analyzed: cis she na /
translated: By what?

original: sngags rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: sngags rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: He says by the mantras, etc.

original: sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pas rje bar mtshon par bya ba ste /
analyzed: sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pas rje bar mtshon par bya ba ste /
translated: By the mantras, etc., he indicates the Lord.

original: phreng ba'i rnam pa dang rang gi sems las byung ba'o //
analyzed: phreng ba'i rnam pa dang rang gi sems las byung ba'o //
translated: In the form of a garland, and arisen from one's own mind.

original: de'i sngags rnams ci zhe na /
analyzed: de'i sngags rnams ci zhe na /
translated: What are the mantras of that?

original: @47b aa yig la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: @47b aa yig la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: He says the letter A, etc.

original: sogs kyi sgras ka'i yi ge la sogs par dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams dang thung du dang ring po dang bar ma dang ldan pa rnams so //
analyzed: sogs kyi sgras ka'i yi ge la sogs par dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams dang thung du dang ring po dang bar ma dang ldan pa rnams so //
translated: By the word etc. are included the vowels and consonants beginning with the letter Ka, short, long, and prolated.

original: de rnams khyab bdag ces bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa sems can rnams kyi dang bo'i yi ge rnams su 'grub bo zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de rnams khyab bdag ces bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i zhi ba la sogs pa sems can rnams kyi dang bo'i yi ge rnams su 'grub bo zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The pervading is the first letters of the various beings' minds, peace, etc.

original: yang na rtsa ba'i phag mo las zhes bya ba ni ji ltar mos pa'i rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags rnams la yang ngo //
analyzed: yang na rtsa ba'i phag mo las zhes bya ba ni ji ltar mos pa'i rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags rnams la yang ngo //
translated: Or, from the root of Vajravarahi means from the root mantras of Vajravarahi, as one wishes.

original: go cha'i sngags rnams kyi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma rnams su dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma dag la go cha'i sngags rnams kyi nang du bcug pa'o //
analyzed: go cha'i sngags rnams kyi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma rnams su dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma dag la go cha'i sngags rnams kyi nang du bcug pa'o //
translated: The combination of the armor mantras is the insertion of the armor mantras among the heroes and yoginis at the beginning and end.

original: yi ge re re'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: yi ge re re'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Each syllable, etc.

original: sngags kyi zhes bya ba ste aa'i yi ge la sogs pa rnams su son pa dag tu'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi zhes bya ba ste aa'i yi ge la sogs pa rnams su son pa dag tu'o //
translated: In the mantras means in the syllables A, etc.

original: sdom pa kun du spyod pa la //
analyzed: sdom pa kun du spyod pa la //
translated: In the practice of the vow,

original: zhes bya ba ni sdom pas na sdom par bshad de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sdom pas na sdom par bshad de /
translated: vow is explained as binding.

original: de ji ltar sdom par byed ce na /
analyzed: de ji ltar sdom par byed ce na /
translated: How does it bind?

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'pho ba med pa'i sbyor bas so //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'pho ba med pa'i sbyor bas so //
translated: By the yoga of the transference that will be explained.

original: de yang go cha gnyis kyi yi ge dang / bsgom par bya ba dang / brjod pa thams cad kyi sdom pa'o //
analyzed: de yang go cha gnyis kyi yi ge dang / bsgom par bya ba dang / brjod pa thams cad kyi sdom pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it is the seed-syllable of the two armors, the meditation, and the summary of all expressions.

original: de'i rnam pa spangs pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa spangs pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that its aspect is abandoned.

original: yi ge'i dbyibs dang bral na ji lta bu'i rnam pa bskyed par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: yi ge'i dbyibs dang bral na ji lta bu'i rnam pa bskyed par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is free from the shape of a syllable, how is an aspect generated?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / bskyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / bskyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: generated, etc.

original: rtsa'i mchog gi grong du'o zhes bya ba ni bdun pa'i don gyi dang po ste /
analyzed: rtsa'i mchog gi grong du'o zhes bya ba ni bdun pa'i don gyi dang po ste /
translated: In the city of the supreme nāḍī, etc.

original: mchog ni gtso bo ste rang gis rig par bya ba'i rang bzhin rnams kyi rtsa'i grong khyer rnams su ste /
analyzed: mchog ni gtso bo ste rang gis rig par bya ba'i rang bzhin rnams kyi rtsa'i grong khyer rnams su ste /
translated: The supreme is the principal, and it is in the cities of the nāḍīs of those whose nature is to be known by oneself.

original: gnas der mchog gi rnal 'byor ma rnams ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnas der mchog gi rnal 'byor ma rnams ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: In that place, the supreme yoginīs are the dakinis, and so on.

original: yang na 'chad par 'gyur ba'i ming rdo rje la sogs pa bskyed pa ni yi ge re re rnams kyis zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
analyzed: yang na 'chad par 'gyur ba'i ming rdo rje la sogs pa bskyed pa ni yi ge re re rnams kyis zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
translated: Alternatively, the generation of the vajra, etc., that will be explained is connected with by each syllable.

original: rtsa rnams kyi tshang ji tsam zhe na /
analyzed: rtsa rnams kyi tshang ji tsam zhe na /
translated: How many are the total of the channels?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbus las zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa / stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbus las zhes bya ba ste /
translated: From the middle of the seventy-two thousand.

original: lnga pa'i don la dang po ste dbus las so //🔽sna tshogs pa'i sbyor ba 'dzin las so //🔽aa wa dh'u t'i'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lnga pa'i don la dang po ste dbus las so // sna tshogs pa'i sbyor ba 'dzin las so // aa wa dh'u t'i'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The meaning of the fifth [letter] is the first [letter], that is, the middle.🔽From the middle of the seventy-two thousand channels, the middle one is the avadhūtī.

original: na'i yi ge de rnams su yang rtsa'i dbus rnams su bdag med pa ston pa ni aa wa dh'u t'ir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: na'i yi ge de rnams su yang rtsa'i dbus rnams su bdag med pa ston pa ni aa wa dh'u t'ir 'gyur ro //
translated: The middle of the channels is taught to be the avadhūtī, since it is the middle of the channels.🔽The avadhūtī is so called because it destroys all conceptual thoughts.🔽It is the avadhūtī of all, since it pervades all the channels.🔽It is the destroyer of all conceptual thoughts of the channels.

original: kun nas rnam par rtog pa 'joms pas na aa wa dh'u t'i ste thams cad nyid aa wa dh'u t'i zhes so //
analyzed: kun nas rnam par rtog pa 'joms pas na aa wa dh'u t'i ste thams cad nyid aa wa dh'u t'i zhes so //
translated: It is the pervader of all the channels.🔽It is the abode of all the channels.🔽It is the abode of all the yoginīs.🔽It is the abode of all the yogins.🔽It is the abode of all the gods.🔽It is the abode of all the goddesses.

original: rtsa thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa @48a * //🔽'joms pa nyid du khyab pa po rnams su gnas pa ste /
analyzed: rtsa thams cad kyi rnam par rtog pa @48a * // 'joms pa nyid du khyab pa po rnams su gnas pa ste /
translated: It is the abode of all the buddhas.

original: srog kun du spyod pa'i dus las so //
analyzed: srog kun du spyod pa'i dus las so //
translated: It is the abode of all the bodhisattvas.🔽It is the abode of all the pratyekabuddhas.🔽It is the abode of all the śrāvakas.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.

original: de'i phyir phag mo zhes bya ba ni de ltar cho ga'i bya bas rtsa thams cad dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi rdo rje phag mo'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir phag mo zhes bya ba ni de ltar cho ga'i bya bas rtsa thams cad dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi rdo rje phag mo'o //
translated: It is the abode of all the ṛṣis.🔽It is the abode of all

original: gang gi phyir gtso mo lta bu'i mchog gi go 'phang du shes par bya'o zhes 'brel lo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gtso mo lta bu'i mchog gi go 'phang du shes par bya'o zhes 'brel lo //
translated: One should know the supreme state, like the chief one.

original: yi ge'i bdag nyid can gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ming rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: yi ge'i bdag nyid can gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ming rnams gsungs pa /
translated: He states the names of the Yoginis who are the nature of the letters.

original: rdo rje la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The first of the vajra, etc.,

original: rdo rje'i thog ma'i ming ni gang gsungs pa thog mar rdo rje yod pa ni rdo rje thog ma ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i thog ma'i ming ni gang gsungs pa thog mar rdo rje yod pa ni rdo rje thog ma ste /
translated: The first of the vajra is the one whose name is stated first, who has a vajra first, who is a vajra first.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dang por te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dang por te /
translated: For that very reason, at the beginning,

original: de yang aa rdo rje ma zhes bya ba'i ming gi 'du shes so //
analyzed: de yang aa rdo rje ma zhes bya ba'i ming gi 'du shes so //
translated: and that is the name-notion of the Vajra Lady.

original: ka rdo rje ma zhes bya ba ni de de bzhin du bshad do //
analyzed: ka rdo rje ma zhes bya ba ni de de bzhin du bshad do //
translated: The ka of the Vajra Lady is explained in the same way.

original: sogs pa'i sgras dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams kyi sngags kyi mtha' zhes bya ba ste aa'i yi ge dang ksha'i yi ge dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams kyi sngags kyi mtha' zhes bya ba ste aa'i yi ge dang ksha'i yi ge dag kyang ngo //
translated: The word etc. refers to the end of the mantra of the vowels and consonants, the letter a and the letter kṣa.

original: yang na rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa'i mthar h'um dang phat kyi yi ge dang sv'a h'a'o //
analyzed: yang na rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa'i mthar h'um dang phat kyi yi ge dang sv'a h'a'o //
translated: Or, at the end of the root mantra, etc., the letters hūṃ and phaṭ, and svāhā.

original: yang na 'chad par 'gyur ba las so //
analyzed: yang na 'chad par 'gyur ba las so //
translated: Or, as will be explained.

original: so so las zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi yi ge re re rnams su'am so sor rnam par brtag pa la sngags kyi yi ge thams cad rjes su brjod par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: so so las zhes bya ba ni sngags kyi yi ge re re rnams su'am so sor rnam par brtag pa la sngags kyi yi ge thams cad rjes su brjod par bya'o zhes so //
translated: Each of the letters of the mantra, means that each of the letters of the mantra should be considered individually, and that all the letters of the mantra should be recited.

original: des yi ge re re gtso mor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des yi ge re re gtso mor 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, each letter becomes the principal one.

original: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo rnams kyi rang gi 'khor lo dang ldan pa rnams kyis bskyed pa la mthong zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo rnams kyi rang gi 'khor lo dang ldan pa rnams kyis bskyed pa la mthong zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The seeing should be connected to the generation by the yoginis and heroes who have their own wheels as explained below.

original: de ltar sngags rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid ster ba po rnams kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar sngags rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid ster ba po rnams kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, having explained the rite of recitation of the mantras that bestow buddhahood,

original: gang gi dus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi dus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: he says, at what time, etc.

original: sngags bzlas bya zhes bya ba'i sngon du bshad pa'i de'i dus rnams su'o //
analyzed: sngags bzlas bya zhes bya ba'i sngon du bshad pa'i de'i dus rnams su'o //
translated: At the time of the recitation of the mantra, means at the time previously explained.

original: rnal 'byor ldan zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ldan zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ni ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: Endowed with yoga, means that yoga is samadhi.

original: sems kyi 'jug pa rtse gcig pa nyid chos kyi sku la gcig tu brtan pa bsam gtan bzhi rnams su nye bar nges par son pa'i sems so //
analyzed: sems kyi 'jug pa rtse gcig pa nyid chos kyi sku la gcig tu brtan pa bsam gtan bzhi rnams su nye bar nges par son pa'i sems so //
translated: The mind's one-pointed engagement in the dharmakāya is the four concentrations, which are definitely attained by the mind that has gone to the four concentrations.

original: de yang thog mar sprin lta bur snang ngo //
analyzed: de yang thog mar sprin lta bur snang ngo //
translated: Moreover, at the beginning, it appears like a cloud.

original: gnyis pa sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis pa sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur ro //
translated: In the second, it becomes like an illusion.

original: gsum pa rmi lam ltar snang ngo //
analyzed: gsum pa rmi lam ltar snang ngo //
translated: In the third, it appears like a dream.

original: bzhi pa dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In the fourth, it is called “without reference point.”

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa rnams su de bzhin du khyad par gyis yang lus kyi gdams ngag gsungs pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa rnams su de bzhin du khyad par gyis yang lus kyi gdams ngag gsungs pa /
translated: In the four concentrations, the instruction on the body is also given by way of distinctions.

original: 'gro dang 'ong ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'gro dang 'ong ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “Going and coming”
