original: srog dang thur du sel ba rnams su'o //🔽lte ba spyi bo snying gyen du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: srog dang thur du sel ba rnams su'o // lte ba spyi bo snying gyen du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: refers to the life-force and the downward-clearing vāyu.🔽“The navel, crown, and heart upward”

original: lte ba nas 'ongs pa ni thur sel @48b lo //
analyzed: lte ba nas 'ongs pa ni thur sel @48b lo //
translated: means that the navel is the downward-clearing [vāyu].

original: snying ga dang spyi bor 'gro ba ni srog go //
analyzed: snying ga dang spyi bor 'gro ba ni srog go //
translated: The heart and the crown are the life-force.

original: rim pa ji lta ba rnams su snying ga dang spyi bo dang lte bar gyen du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba byed do //
analyzed: rim pa ji lta ba rnams su snying ga dang spyi bo dang lte bar gyen du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba byed do //
translated: In the four concentrations, the upward-moving [vāyu] moves up and down in the heart, the crown, and the navel, respectively.

original: sems tsam gyis de ltar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sems tsam gyis de ltar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should do it with just the mind.

original: las 'di'i dgos pa cir 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: las 'di'i dgos pa cir 'gyur ba gsungs pa /
translated: The purpose of this rite is stated:

original: rnam par 'phro 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas te ;
analyzed: rnam par 'phro 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas te ;
translated: By the emission, etc.

original: bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni kun nas rtsa rnams la 'gro ba ni byang chub kyi sems chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid can gyi sems kyang der 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni kun nas rtsa rnams la 'gro ba ni byang chub kyi sems chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid can gyi sems kyang der 'ongs pa'o //
translated: By oneself means that the mind, which is the nature of the bodhicitta of the dharmakāya, moves into the nāḍīs.

original: mtshon pa'i sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni rtag tu dus thams cad du sngags kyi yi ge der thim par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: mtshon pa'i sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni rtag tu dus thams cad du sngags kyi yi ge der thim par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The application of the metaphor is that the mantra syllables always, at all times, dissolve into that.

original: de rnams kyis kyang rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i gtso zhes bya ba ni phag mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma dang he ru ka la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams rnam par 'phro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
analyzed: de rnams kyis kyang rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i gtso zhes bya ba ni phag mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma dang he ru ka la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams rnam par 'phro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
translated: Also, by them, the yoginīs and heroes are emitted, meaning that the yoginīs such as Vārāhī and the heroes such as Heruka are emitted.

original: der rnam par spros bzhin pas gang du 'gro ba zhes bya ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: der rnam par spros bzhin pas gang du 'gro ba zhes bya ba gsungs pa /
translated: Since they are emitted there, where do they go?

original: zhing du 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pas te sngon du bshad pa'i rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams kyi drung las rnam par spros pa yang de'i sbyor ba las stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du son pa rnams zhes
analyzed: zhing du 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pas te sngon du bshad pa'i rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams kyi drung las rnam par spros pa yang de'i sbyor ba las stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du son pa rnams zhes
translated: “Going to the fields” and so forth. The emanations from the seventy-two thousand channels explained previously are also the seventy-two thousand from the yoga of that [emanation]. “Arriving at the buddha-fields”

original: bya ba ste nye bar mtshon pa tsam mo //
analyzed: bya ba ste nye bar mtshon pa tsam mo //
translated: is just an illustration.

original: 'on kyang rtsa mtha' yas shing mu med pa rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' med par kyang ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang rtsa mtha' yas shing mu med pa rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' med par kyang ngo //
translated: However, the channels are infinite and limitless, and the buddha-fields are also limitless.

original: de rnams su zhing dang zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams su zhing dang zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “Going to the fields and fields”

original: bskyed bzhin pa rnams kyi dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams rang gi zhing rnams su yang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par son pa rnams so //
analyzed: bskyed bzhin pa rnams kyi dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams rang gi zhing rnams su yang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par son pa rnams so //
translated: means that the heroes and yoginīs who are being generated also go to the places and neighboring places of their own fields.🔽Therefore, “endowed with one’s own wheel and yoginī”

original: de'i phyir rang gi 'khor lo dang ldan ba'i rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi 'khor lo dang ldan ba'i rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ste /
translated: means

original: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma re re khams sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi dbang gis sna tshogs pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig pa'i 'khor can du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma re re khams sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi dbang gis sna tshogs pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig pa'i 'khor can du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Each hero and yoginī, by the power of the nature of the various elements, also becomes the retinue together with various heroes and yoginīs.

original: lha mo khyod ni bdag po ste //
analyzed: lha mo khyod ni bdag po ste //
translated: You are the mistress, O goddess,

original: zhes bya ba ni zhing dang zhing du yang sna tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i bdag mo dang rtsa rnams kyi skyed ma yang ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhing dang zhing du yang sna tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i bdag mo dang rtsa rnams kyi skyed ma yang ste /
translated: in the various fields, and also the mother of the channels of the various yoginīs.

original: de rnams su rdo rje phag mo khyod kyi gzugs kyis rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams su rdo rje phag mo khyod kyi gzugs kyis rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: In them, you, Vajravārāhī, abide in form.

original: gang gi phyir thim pa dang longs spyod pa la sogs pa byed pa po nyid kyis dang 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir thim pa dang longs spyod pa la sogs pa byed pa po nyid kyis dang 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyis kyang ngo //
translated: Because you are the agent of dissolution and enjoyment, and so forth, and because of what will be explained.

original: rtsa'i yi ges thog mar rdo rje phag mo @49a * //
analyzed: rtsa'i yi ges thog mar rdo rje phag mo @49a * //
translated: The letter of the channel is Vajravārāhī at the beginning.

original: mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas su 'ongs pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma yang phag mo'i gnas su 'ongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas longs spyod pa dang thim pa dang bdag po byed pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas su 'ongs pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma yang phag mo'i gnas su 'ongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas longs spyod pa dang thim pa dang bdag po byed pa'o //
translated: Having come to the abode of the dakinis, and the dakinis having come to the abode of Varahi, and so on, one enjoys, dissolves, and becomes the lord.

original: de'i phyir rdo rje phag mo la zhes so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje phag mo la zhes so //
translated: Therefore, of Vajravarahi and so on.

original: tsa'i yi ges bdag po yang ngo //
analyzed: tsa'i yi ges bdag po yang ngo //
translated: The syllable ca means lord.

original: gang gi tshe nga yis lhan cig kha sbyar ba zhes bya ba ni bdag dpal he ru ka dang lhan cig thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can la snyoms par zhugs nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad khyod kyis kun du spyod pa la sogs pa des na
analyzed: gang gi tshe nga yis lhan cig kha sbyar ba zhes bya ba ni bdag dpal he ru ka dang lhan cig thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can la snyoms par zhugs nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad khyod kyis kun du spyod pa la sogs pa des na
translated: When I enter into union with you, that is, when I, Sri Heruka, enter into union with you, who are of the nature of means and insight, then all yoginis will enjoy you and so on.

original: tu'i sgra ni nges par bzung pa'o //🔽'di nyid kyi ltar kun du spyod pa'i khyad par gyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: tu'i sgra ni nges par bzung pa'o // 'di nyid kyi ltar kun du spyod pa'i khyad par gyis gsungs pa /
translated: The word eva is for emphasis.🔽He states the special enjoyment: At the proper time, and so on.

original: dus su zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dir ni kun du spyod pa'i dus gnyis te /
analyzed: dus su zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dir ni kun du spyod pa'i dus gnyis te /
translated: Here, there are two times for enjoyment:

original: de la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
translated: worldly and transcendent.

original: 'jig rten pa ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo dang thun mong dang thun tshod dang dbyu gu dang zla ba phyed dang zla ba dang lo'i dbye ba rnams su rlung 'bab pa las so //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo dang thun mong dang thun tshod dang dbyu gu dang zla ba phyed dang zla ba dang lo'i dbye ba rnams su rlung 'bab pa las so //
translated: The mundane is from the flow of the wind in the divisions of day and night, common, period, period-half, fortnight, month, and year.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni de las phyin ci log gis dga' ba bzhi'i dbye ba rnams su rang gis rig pa'i bde ba las so //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni de las phyin ci log gis dga' ba bzhi'i dbye ba rnams su rang gis rig pa'i bde ba las so //
translated: The supramundane is from the bliss of self-awareness in the divisions of the four joys, the opposite of that.

original: de ltar mi mthun pa gnyis kyi sbyor bas rdo rje 'chang chen po kun du spyod do //🔽de yang nam mkha'i bu ga'i nang du gnas zhes bya ba ni dpral bar son pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon 'bar ba 'dzin pa'i bu ga ru rang gis rig par son pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar mi mthun pa gnyis kyi sbyor bas rdo rje 'chang chen po kun du spyod do // de yang nam mkha'i bu ga'i nang du gnas zhes bya ba ni dpral bar son pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon 'bar ba 'dzin pa'i bu ga ru rang gis rig par son pa'o //
translated: Thus, by the union of the two opposites, one practices the Great Vajradhara.🔽And that is “in the space-cavity,” that is, in the cavity of the blazing seed of enlightenment in the forehead, one reaches self-awareness.

original: de'i nam mkha'i bu ga rnams su rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can gyi ye shes gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i nam mkha'i bu ga rnams su rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can gyi ye shes gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that in the space-cavities of that, the nature of the naturally luminous intuition abides.

original: ye shes de de ltar kun du son pa yang de dang der rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bdud rtsi'i sa bon 'dzag pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes de de ltar kun du son pa yang de dang der rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bdud rtsi'i sa bon 'dzag pa'o //
translated: That pristine consciousness is omnipresent in that way, and the seed of nectar falls in that and that place of the yogin.

original: gang dang gang du rnal 'byor pas skyes pa de dang der sngon gyi bag chags kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pas kyang 'od gsal bar mnyam par gnas par gyur pas kyang rtsa thams cad kyi rang bzhin la bdud rtsi'i sa bon 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang dang gang du rnal 'byor pas skyes pa de dang der sngon gyi bag chags kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pas kyang 'od gsal bar mnyam par gnas par gyur pas kyang rtsa thams cad kyi rang bzhin la bdud rtsi'i sa bon 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Wherever the yogin is born, there, due to previous traces, the seed of nectar falls on the nature of all the nāḍīs, since one abides in equipoise in the state of clarity due to relying on a spiritual friend.

original: skye gnas lam nyid nas 'thon zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i lam nas kyang 'ongs te rdo rje bu ga'i nang du 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: skye gnas lam nyid nas 'thon zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i lam nas kyang 'ongs te rdo rje bu ga'i nang du 'gro ba'o //
translated: “Arising from the path of the birth canal” means that it also comes from the path of the navel and enters inside the vajra.

original: der ni 'pho med ye shes bya //
analyzed: der ni 'pho med ye shes bya //
translated: “There, pristine consciousness is changeless.”

original: zhes bya ba ni hi ka hi ka phyed dang bcas pa'i yi ge rnams kyi sngon du bshad pa'i 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rnal 'byor gyi man ngag las bsgom par bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni hi ka hi ka phyed dang bcas pa'i yi ge rnams kyi sngon du bshad pa'i 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rnal 'byor gyi man ngag las bsgom par bya ba ste /
translated: The movement and the coming and going explained previously of the syllables with half of hika hika should be meditated on according to the intimate instructions of yoga.

original: der de ltar 'pho ba med pas bya zhes pa'o //
analyzed: der de ltar 'pho ba med pas bya zhes pa'o //
translated: There, one should not move in that way.

original: rnal 'byor pa @49b rnams kyi sgom pa'i byang chub nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa @49b rnams kyi sgom pa'i byang chub nye bar bstan pa'o //
translated: The yoga of the yoginīs is taught.

original: las dang po pa rnams kyis kyang goms pas de nye bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: las dang po pa rnams kyis kyang goms pas de nye bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: Even for beginners, it is said that by practice, that [yoga] will arise.

original: mi mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mi mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares:

original: ji ltar mi mo dang skyes bu phrad pa'i dus rnams su de yang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mi mo dang skyes bu phrad pa'i dus rnams su de yang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
translated: “A woman and a man should unite in union at the time of union, and the yogin should practice yoga with the yoginīs.

original: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nges pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nges pa'o //
translated: The supreme unchanging should be accomplished.” This is the Bhagavān’s declaration.

original: da ni glu'i sngags rnams kyis yi ge re re'i btu ba dang de bzhin du bsgom pa'i rim pa dang las kyi sbyor ba yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni glu'i sngags rnams kyis yi ge re re'i btu ba dang de bzhin du bsgom pa'i rim pa dang las kyi sbyor ba yang gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the extraction of each syllable by the mantra of the song, and likewise the process of meditation and the application of rites, are taught.

original: der ni 'byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: der ni 'byung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares, “There, the elements,” and so on.

original: der zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad pa'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs kyi gang skyes pa'i lha'i bdag nyid can gyi yi ge'o //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad pa'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs kyi gang skyes pa'i lha'i bdag nyid can gyi yi ge'o //
translated: “There” means in the previously explained supreme unchanging state, which is the divine nature of the arisen syllable.

original: der rig pa che zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba ste /
analyzed: der rig pa che zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba ste /
translated: “The great knowledge” is what is to be known.

original: bsgom pa'i bdag nyid kyis bri'o zhes bya ba ni sems can yi ge gcig gam yi ge mang pos mngon par dga' ba de rnams kyis bri bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: bsgom pa'i bdag nyid kyis bri'o zhes bya ba ni sems can yi ge gcig gam yi ge mang pos mngon par dga' ba de rnams kyis bri bar bya ba ste /
translated: “One should write with the nature of meditation” means that those sentient beings who delight in one syllable or many syllables should write it.

original: rim pa ji lta bas gral rims su btu bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: rim pa ji lta bas gral rims su btu bar bya ba'o //
translated: It should be arranged in order according to the sequence.

original: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: thog mar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thog mar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “First, etc.”

original: thog mar rnam snang mgon po ste //
analyzed: thog mar rnam snang mgon po ste //
translated: “First, the lord Vairocana”

original: zhes bya ba ni thog mar aom gyi yi ge rnam par snang mdzad de sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa dang mgon dang skyob pa yang ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thog mar aom gyi yi ge rnam par snang mdzad de sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa dang mgon dang skyob pa yang ngo //
translated: means that first, the syllable Oṃ is Vairocana, the support of all sentient beings, and also the protector and refuge.

original: ri mo gsum skor lte 'og gnas //
analyzed: ri mo gsum skor lte 'og gnas //
translated: “Three lines encircle below the navel.”

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad de yang lte ba'i 'og gi char ri mo gsum skor dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad de yang lte ba'i 'og gi char ri mo gsum skor dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This is Vairocana, and he is endowed with three circles below the navel.

original: des ci byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: des ci byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: What does he do?

original: de ni langs nas mgrin par 'gro //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ni langs nas mgrin par 'gro // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: He rises and goes to the throat.

original: aom gyi yi ge de yang srog gi gzugs kyis mgrin pa'i bar du 'gro ba ste /
analyzed: aom gyi yi ge de yang srog gi gzugs kyis mgrin pa'i bar du 'gro ba ste /
translated: This is the syllable OṂ, and he goes to the throat in the form of the life-force.

original: 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang rnam par ldang ba'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang rnam par ldang ba'i bdag nyid do //
translated: He has the nature of entering, abiding, and rising.

original: sa gsum sgron me lta bur gsal //
analyzed: sa gsum sgron me lta bur gsal //
translated: The three worlds are illuminated like lamps.

original: zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dang khams gsum gyi yang tshad med pa ye shes kyi snang ba'i 'jig rten sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams su yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dang khams gsum gyi yang tshad med pa ye shes kyi snang ba'i 'jig rten sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams su yang 'gyur ro //
translated: The three worlds of body, speech, and mind are also immeasurable, and the worlds of the various natures of the appearances of gnosis become immeasurable.

original: sngags gzhan pa mtha' mnyam pa yod //
analyzed: sngags gzhan pa mtha' mnyam pa yod //
translated: There is another mantra with a final equal sign.

original: ces bya ba ni ha'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni ha'i rnam pa ste /
translated: This is the form of HA.

original: la la n'a'i mtha' mar gnas pa mo'i rtsa'o //
analyzed: la la n'a'i mtha' mar gnas pa mo'i rtsa'o //
translated: The channel of the female is located at the end of LA LA NA.

original: g-yon du 'dzin pa zla ba skye //
analyzed: g-yon du 'dzin pa zla ba skye //
translated: The moon is generated on the left.

original: zhes bya ba ni de la mthar byang chub kyi sems skyes pa zla ba yang g-yon pa'i ngos 'dzin pa'i @50a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de la mthar byang chub kyi sems skyes pa zla ba yang g-yon pa'i ngos 'dzin pa'i @50a * //
translated: Here, the end of the moon is identified with the left side, and the end of the sun is identified with the right side.

original: dang tshul can no //
analyzed: dang tshul can no //
translated: The manner is the manner of the moon and sun.

original: sngags 'di'i thig les brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: sngags 'di'i thig les brgyan pa'o //
translated: The mantra is adorned with a drop.

original: zhes bya ba ni kha 'og tu bltas pa'i ham gi yi ges byang chub kyi sems kyi thig les brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kha 'og tu bltas pa'i ham gi yi ges byang chub kyi sems kyi thig les brgyan pa'o //
translated: The mantra is adorned with a drop of bodhicitta, with the letter haṃ looking downward.

original: sngags ni rnal 'byor ma bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: sngags ni rnal 'byor ma bskyed pa'o //
translated: The mantra is the generation of the yoginī.

original: zhes bya ba ni da ltar ham gi yi ge'i sngags rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid sa gsum khyab pa mo'i rnal 'byor ma rdzogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni da ltar ham gi yi ge'i sngags rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid sa gsum khyab pa mo'i rnal 'byor ma rdzogs par byed pa'o //
translated: The mantra is the letter haṃ, which is the nature of Vajradhara, the yoginī who pervades the three worlds, and it generates the perfection.

original: slar yang sa bon gnyis brjod pa //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: slar yang sa bon gnyis brjod pa // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Again, the two seed syllables are uttered.

original: slar yang gnyis pa ha'i yi ge'i sa bon brjod pa ste de ltar 'bar bar yang byed pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang gnyis pa ha'i yi ge'i sa bon brjod pa ste de ltar 'bar bar yang byed pa'o //
translated: Again, the second seed syllable, the letter ha, is uttered, and thus it also causes the blazing.

original: g-yas pa nyi ma skyed pa ste //🔽zhes bya ba ni de yang nyi ma'i skyed par byed pa g-yas pa'i rtsa ra sa n'a'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: g-yas pa nyi ma skyed pa ste //🔽zhes bya ba ni de yang nyi ma'i skyed par byed pa g-yas pa'i rtsa ra sa n'a'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The right side generates the sun.🔽The right channel, rasanā, is the nature of the sun, which generates the sun.

original: logs su gnyis phye mgor thig le //
analyzed: logs su gnyis phye mgor thig le //
translated: The two are distinguished separately, and the bindu is on the head.

original: zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi khrag 'phel ba'i dbang gis byang chub sems kyi 'phel bar byed pa po ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi khrag 'phel ba'i dbang gis byang chub sems kyi 'phel bar byed pa po ste /
translated: This is the one who increases the bodhicitta by the power of increasing the blood of that [woman].

original: de'i phyir mgo bo la sbra dang thig les mnan pa 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid can te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mgo bo la sbra dang thig les mnan pa 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid can te /
translated: Therefore, the head is pressed down with the bindu of the hero, which is the nature of great passion.

original: 'di ni rtsa gsum bskyed pa'i gnas g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dang dbus dang steng dang 'og dang dbus su yang ngo //
analyzed: 'di ni rtsa gsum bskyed pa'i gnas g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dang dbus dang steng dang 'og dang dbus su yang ngo //
translated: This is the place of generation of the three nāḍīs, the left, right, and middle, above, below, and in the middle.

original: sngags gzhan rnams de yis bskyed ces bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: sngags gzhan rnams de yis bskyed ces bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The other mantras are generated by that.

original: gzhan de phag mo la sogs pa drug gi go cha'i sngags rnams gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhan de phag mo la sogs pa drug gi go cha'i sngags rnams gsungs pa /
translated: The other is the armor mantra of the six, such as Vārāhī, and so on.

original: yang de'i mtha'i sa bon ni zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha'i yi ge ni wa'o //
analyzed: yang de'i mtha'i sa bon ni zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha'i yi ge ni wa'o //
translated: The seed at the end of that is the letter va, which is the last letter of the ya class.

original: byang chub sems chen 'bab lam mo //
analyzed: byang chub sems chen 'bab lam mo //
translated: The path of the descent of great bodhicitta

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub chen po sgrub pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dbus ma'i lam rnams su yang ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub chen po sgrub pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dbus ma'i lam rnams su yang ste /
translated: is the path of the middle [nāḍī] of the yogins and yoginīs because it accomplishes great awakening.

original: wa'i yi ge byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: wa'i yi ge byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The letter va is the nature of the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: aa yi yi ges mthar brgyan pa //
analyzed: aa yi yi ges mthar brgyan pa //
translated: It is adorned at the end with the letter a.

original: zhes bya ba ni aa'i yi ge'i dbyangs kyis phye ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni aa'i yi ge'i dbyangs kyis phye ba ste /
translated: This means that it is distinguished by the vowel a.

original: mdor na wa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mdor na wa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In brief, it is va.

original: mgo bor zla phyed nyi mas brgyan //
analyzed: mgo bor zla phyed nyi mas brgyan //
translated: The head is adorned with the half-moon and sun.

original: zhes bya ba ni bcu drug gi cha'i zla ba phyed par nyi ma'i thig le'i mgo bor rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcu drug gi cha'i zla ba phyed par nyi ma'i thig le'i mgo bor rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: The head of the half-moon, which is one-sixteenth [of a full moon], is sealed with the drop of the sun.

original: sngags mdor na wam du 'gyur ro //🔽'di ni phag mo'i mgon sa bon //
analyzed: sngags mdor na wam du 'gyur ro // 'di ni phag mo'i mgon sa bon //
translated: The mantra is, in brief, vam.🔽This is the seed of Varada.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'di de rdo rje phag mo'i sa bon te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'di de rdo rje phag mo'i sa bon te /
translated: This is the seed of Vajravarahi.

original: mgon zhes bya ba ni sgra'i dbang po rnams kyi bde ba 'babs pas so //
analyzed: mgon zhes bya ba ni sgra'i dbang po rnams kyi bde ba 'babs pas so //
translated: Varada means protector, because it is the descent of bliss for the organs of sound.

original: ya sde'i dang po'i sa bon ni //
analyzed: ya sde'i dang po'i sa bon ni //
translated: The seed of the first of the ya class

original: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi dang po'i yi ge ni ya'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi dang po'i yi ge ni ya'i yi ge'o //
translated: The first letter of the ya class is the letter ya.

original: de yang khyad par ji ltar zhe na /🔽sbyor bas sa gsum rlung yon tan //
analyzed: de yang khyad par ji ltar zhe na / sbyor bas sa gsum rlung yon tan //
translated: And how is that distinguished?

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By application, the wind of the three stages is the quality.

original: rlung gi rang bzhin gyis las /
analyzed: rlung gi rang bzhin gyis las /
translated: By the nature of the wind, it is action.

original: @50b zhes bya ba ni sa gsum la'o //
analyzed: @50b zhes bya ba ni sa gsum la'o //
translated: This is the three stages.

original: sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad pa ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad pa ste /
translated: The application is as previously explained.

original: aom ham h'am lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rtsa gsum du srog nang du thim pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: aom ham h'am lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rtsa gsum du srog nang du thim pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The intention is that the life force dissolves into the three channels of body, speech, and mind, called “oṃ, haṃ, and haṃ. ”

original: dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis brgyan //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pa yis brgyan //
translated: It is adorned with the thirteenth vowel.

original: zhes bya ba ni dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gsum pa ao'i yi ges rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gsum pa ao'i yi ges rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: This is the sealing with the thirteenth vowel, the letter oṃ.

original: dkar po'i phyogs kyi mgo bor brgyan //
analyzed: dkar po'i phyogs kyi mgo bor brgyan //
translated: It is adorned at the head of the bright fortnight.

original: zhes bya ba ni mgo bo rnams su bcu drug pa dkar po'i thog ma'i cha dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mgo bo rnams su bcu drug pa dkar po'i thog ma'i cha dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This is the sixteen at the beginning of the bright fortnight at the heads.

original: thig le dang ni bcas par 'bar //
analyzed: thig le dang ni bcas par 'bar //
translated: It blazes with the bindu.

original: zhes bya ba ni de la thig le 'bar ba'i thig le las so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de la thig le 'bar ba'i thig le las so //
translated: This is the bindu of the blazing bindu.

original: dga' ba bzhi po dag pa'o //
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi po dag pa'o //
translated: It is the purification of the four joys.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar mdor na yom gyi yi ge thig le dang / zla phyed dang ao yi yi ge ste dga' ba bzhi dag pa gshin rje ma'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar mdor na yom gyi yi ge thig le dang / zla phyed dang ao yi yi ge ste dga' ba bzhi dag pa gshin rje ma'i sngags so //
translated: Thus, in brief, the syllable oṃ, the bindu, the crescent moon, and the syllable oṃ are the mantra of Kṣemarāja, the purification of the four joys.

original: pa sde'i mtha' ma bde ba'i gzugs //
analyzed: pa sde'i mtha' ma bde ba'i gzugs //
translated: The last of the Pa group is the form of bliss.

original: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha'i yi ge ni ma'i yi ge ste bde ba'i gzugs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha'i yi ge ni ma'i yi ge ste bde ba'i gzugs so //
translated: The last letter of the Pa group is the letter Ma, which is the form of bliss.

original: ma'i yi ge khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ma'i yi ge khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the special feature of the letter Ma?

original: dga' ba bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i gzugs so //🔽ao'i yi ge bzhon ldan pa //
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi'i mthar thug pa'i gzugs so // ao'i yi ge bzhon ldan pa //
translated: It is the form of the culmination of the four joys.🔽The letter O is mounted on the vehicle.

original: zhes bya ba ni ao'i yi ge zhon pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ao'i yi ge zhon pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The letter O is mounted on the vehicle.

original: mgo bor zla phyed nyi mas mnan //
analyzed: mgo bor zla phyed nyi mas mnan //
translated: The crescent moon is suppressed by the sun on the head.

original: zhes bya ba ni mgo bor zla ba phyed pa dang thig les reg pas mo'i yi ge la zhon par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mgo bor zla ba phyed pa dang thig les reg pas mo'i yi ge la zhon par blta bar bya'o //
translated: The crescent moon and the drop touching the head should be seen as mounted on the letter Mo.

original: mdor na mom gi yi ge rmongs byed ma'i sngags so //
analyzed: mdor na mom gi yi ge rmongs byed ma'i sngags so //
translated: In brief, the letter Moṃ is the mantra of Moharā.

original: sa yi pha rol gzhom med pa //
analyzed: sa yi pha rol gzhom med pa //
translated: The other side of the earth is the invincible.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa'i pha rol gyi yi ge ste rang bzhin ci zhe na gzhom du med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa'i pha rol gyi yi ge ste rang bzhin ci zhe na gzhom du med pa'o //
translated: The other side of the letter Sa is the letter Ha. What is its nature? It is invincible.

original: gzhom bu med pa'i gzugs so //🔽nyi ma yi ni stan la gnas //
analyzed: gzhom bu med pa'i gzugs so // nyi ma yi ni stan la gnas //
translated: It is the form of the invincible.🔽It is situated on the seat of the sun.

original: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa ste /
translated: It is situated on the seat of the sun.

original: de yang / dbyangs kyi bzhi pa rna drung bzung //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de yang / dbyangs kyi bzhi pa rna drung bzung // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the fourth vowel is held at the ear.

original: bzhi pa aee'i dbyangs kyi yi ges rna ba'i gnas su bzung pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa aee'i dbyangs kyi yi ges rna ba'i gnas su bzung pa'o //
translated: The fourth vowel is the letter ai, which is held at the ear.

original: cha shas zhes bya ba ni cha shas bcu drug pa rnams kyis de de bzhin no //
analyzed: cha shas zhes bya ba ni cha shas bcu drug pa rnams kyis de de bzhin no //
translated: The parts are the sixteen parts.

original: zla ba phyed pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa'o //
translated: The half-moon.

original: zla ba phyed pa'i cha shas slar yang mgo bor brgyan pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa'i cha shas slar yang mgo bor brgyan pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The half-moon part is again adorned on the head.

original: de la de ltar mgo bor thig le dang bcas pas brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: de la de ltar mgo bor thig le dang bcas pas brgyan pa'o //
translated: There, it is thus adorned on the head with a drop.

original: de ltar mdor na hr'i'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: de ltar mdor na hr'i'i yi ge'o //
translated: Thus, in brief, the letter hrīḥ.

original: 'dod chags mtha' yi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dod chags mtha' yi rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the end of passion.

original: zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i mtha'i bde ba'i rang bzhin te mchog tu mi 'gyur ba las zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i mtha'i bde ba'i rang bzhin te mchog tu mi 'gyur ba las zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The nature of the bliss at the end of innate joy, the nature of the supreme unchanging, is the thought.

original: de ltar kun du bskyed ma'i sngags so //
analyzed: de ltar kun du bskyed ma'i sngags so //
translated: Thus, the mantra of the universal generation.

original: ye shes kyi yi ge ni h'um gi yi ge'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi yi ge ni h'um gi yi ge'o //
translated: The letter of wisdom is the letter hūṃ.

original: gnyis 'gyur @51a * //
analyzed: gnyis 'gyur @51a * //
translated: Doubled.

original: dbye zhes bya ba ni h'um gi yi ge gnyis brjod pa'o //
analyzed: dbye zhes bya ba ni h'um gi yi ge gnyis brjod pa'o //
translated: The division is the utterance of the letter hūṃ twice.

original: spro ba dang ni bsdu bas skyes //
analyzed: spro ba dang ni bsdu bas skyes //
translated: It is born from the emission and gathering.

original: zhes bya ba ni h'um gi yi ge spro ba dang sdud pa por skyes pa ste byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni h'um gi yi ge spro ba dang sdud pa por skyes pa ste byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: This is the bodhicitta, born from the emission and gathering of the syllable hūṃ.

original: 'og dang steng du gnas pa yi //
analyzed: 'og dang steng du gnas pa yi //
translated: The Lord, abiding above and below,

original: mgon po longs spyod rdzogs 'dzin pa //
analyzed: mgon po longs spyod rdzogs 'dzin pa //
translated: is the holder of the perfect enjoyment.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdor na steng 'og tu gnas pa'i mgon por gyur pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdor na steng 'og tu gnas pa'i mgon por gyur pa ste /
translated: In brief, the Lord is above and below,

original: h'um gi yi ge snying ga dang chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi padmor bla ma'i gdams ngag bstan pas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: h'um gi yi ge snying ga dang chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi padmor bla ma'i gdams ngag bstan pas shes par bya'o //
translated: the syllable hūṃ should be known by the guru’s instruction in the heart and the lotus of the source of phenomena.

original: don gyi cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: don gyi cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The rite of the meaning is complete.

original: zhes bya ba ni don gyi cho gas yongs su dga' ba'i don rang gi nyams su myong bas te de'i cho gas sems rtsa thams cad du song bas bde ba chen pos dgang bar bya bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni don gyi cho gas yongs su dga' ba'i don rang gi nyams su myong bas te de'i cho gas sems rtsa thams cad du song bas bde ba chen pos dgang bar bya bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the rite of the meaning is the meaning of complete joy, experienced by oneself. By that rite, the mind should be filled with great bliss, having gone into all the channels.

original: yongs su skrag byed ma sa bon //
analyzed: yongs su skrag byed ma sa bon //
translated: The seed of the one who causes terror.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar h'um gi yi ge gnyis yongs su skrag byed ma'i sa bon te sngags zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar h'um gi yi ge gnyis yongs su skrag byed ma'i sa bon te sngags zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Thus, the two syllables of HŪṀ are the seed of the Terrifying One, and are considered to be the mantra.

original: pa mtha'i yi ge bzung nas ni //
analyzed: pa mtha'i yi ge bzung nas ni //
translated: Taking the last letter of PA,

original: zhes bya ba ni pa'i yi ge yongs su gzung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pa'i yi ge yongs su gzung ba'o //
translated: one should take the letter PA.

original: slar yang de bzhin brjod par bya //
analyzed: slar yang de bzhin brjod par bya //
translated: Again, one should utter it in the same way,

original: zhes bya ba ni slar yang pha'i yi ge de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni slar yang pha'i yi ge de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
translated: again one should utter the letter PHA in the same way.

original: mdor na ma gsungs kyang rjes su bzhag ste /
analyzed: mdor na ma gsungs kyang rjes su bzhag ste /
translated: In brief, although not stated, one should understand that

original: ta'i yi ge phyed kyis kyang gsal bar bya ste phat phat kyi yi ge dag go //
analyzed: ta'i yi ge phyed kyis kyang gsal bar bya ste phat phat kyi yi ge dag go //
translated: the letter TA is also half, and the letters PHAṬ PHAṬ are clear.

original: phat kyi yi ge 'di rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: phat kyi yi ge 'di rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa /
translated: The arrangement of these letters PHAṬ is stated:🔽in the city of Uḍḍiyāna, in the navel, and in the aperture,

original: au rgyan 'bar ba 'dzin grong gi / bu gar zhes bya ba ste au rgyan dang 'bar ba 'dzin pa'i grong dang lte ba'i gnas dang bu ga gnyis rnams su yang srog gi rlung gis bkang ba'o //
analyzed: au rgyan 'bar ba 'dzin grong gi / bu gar zhes bya ba ste au rgyan dang 'bar ba 'dzin pa'i grong dang lte ba'i gnas dang bu ga gnyis rnams su yang srog gi rlung gis bkang ba'o //
translated: the life-force wind is filled.

original: thams cad la ci byed pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: thams cad la ci byed pa gsungs pa /
translated: What is done in all of them is stated:

original: gtum mo 'bar ba'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gtum mo 'bar ba'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The blazing of candali.

original: lte ba'i gnas nas aa'i yi ge gtum mo'i gzugs kyis 'bar ba ste 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: lte ba'i gnas nas aa'i yi ge gtum mo'i gzugs kyis 'bar ba ste 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: The letter A in the form of candali blazes up from the navel, the nature of great passion.

original: 'bras bu ci ster ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'bras bu ci ster ba gsungs pa /
translated: What is the result that is given?

original: byang chub sems kyis sa gsum 'gengs //🔽zhes bya ba ste /🔽'bar ba'i gtum mo dang de'i 'dod chags chen po'i mes zhu ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyis sa gsum ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems kyis sa gsum 'gengs // zhes bya ba ste / 'bar ba'i gtum mo dang de'i 'dod chags chen po'i mes zhu ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyis sa gsum ste /
translated: The three worlds are filled with bodhicitta.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid 'gengs pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid 'gengs pa'o //
translated: The three worlds are filled with the bodhicitta that melts by the fire of the blazing candali and her great passion.

original: de yis kyang rang gi rig pa skye bar 'gyur te gtum mo'i sngags so //
analyzed: de yis kyang rang gi rig pa skye bar 'gyur te gtum mo'i sngags so //
translated: And by that, one's knowledge will arise, the candali mantra.

original: da ni mdor byas nas gsungs ba'i sngags rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba'i sgo nas phan yon gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni mdor byas nas gsungs ba'i sngags rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba'i sgo nas phan yon gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the benefits are stated by way of the summary of the mantras taught in the Condensed Tantra:

original: de ltar bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar bshad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus explained, etc.

original: sngags gang rnams @51b zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sngags gang rnams @51b zhes bya'o //
translated: The mantras are those called

original: mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the condensed.

original: mdor na bam yom mom hr'im h'um h'um phat phat ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: mdor na bam yom mom hr'im h'um h'um phat phat ces bya ba ste /
translated: In brief, the mantras are bam, yom, mom, hrim, hum, hum, phat, phat.

original: aom gyi gi ge thams cad du rjes su 'brel par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: aom gyi gi ge thams cad du rjes su 'brel par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The syllable om should be connected to all of them.

original: m'a tra dang thig le la sogs pas phye pas phye pa rim pas yang sna tshogs pa'i yi ge nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: m'a tra dang thig le la sogs pas phye pas phye pa rim pas yang sna tshogs pa'i yi ge nye bar mtshon par bya'o //
translated: The matra and bindu and so forth are distinguished, and the various syllables are indicated in order.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi ming yongs ldan //🔽zhes bya ba ni aom bam rdo rje phag mo'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi ming yongs ldan // zhes bya ba ni aom bam rdo rje phag mo'o //
translated: The names of the yoginis are complete.🔽Om vam is Vajravarahi.

original: aom yom gshin rje ma'o //
analyzed: aom yom gshin rje ma'o //
translated: Om yom is Yamantaka.

original: aom mom rmongs byed ma'o //🔽aom hr'im kun du bskyod ma'o //
analyzed: aom mom rmongs byed ma'o // aom hr'im kun du bskyod ma'o //
translated: Om mom is Mohari.🔽Om hrim is Samkambhari.

original: aom h'um h'um kun du skrag byed ma'o //
analyzed: aom h'um h'um kun du skrag byed ma'o //
translated: Om hum hum is Samtrasiki.

original: aom phat phat gtum mo'o //
analyzed: aom phat phat gtum mo'o //
translated: Om phat phat is Chandika.

original: ci bya ba las kyi dus su rtogs par bya zhes bya ba ste zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dus rnams su shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci bya ba las kyi dus su rtogs par bya zhes bya ba ste zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dus rnams su shes par bya ba'o //
translated: One should understand what to do at the time of action, that is, one should understand at the times of pacifying and so forth.

original: re re'i zhes bya ba ni yi ge re re 'am rnal 'byor ma'o //
analyzed: re re'i zhes bya ba ni yi ge re re 'am rnal 'byor ma'o //
translated: Each means each syllable or yogini.

original: bdag nyid che zhes bya ba ni mthu stobs so //
analyzed: bdag nyid che zhes bya ba ni mthu stobs so //
translated: Great self means power.

original: grangs zhes bya ba ni grangs so //
analyzed: grangs zhes bya ba ni grangs so //
translated: Number means enumeration.

original: rnam par 'phro ba bdag nyid che //
analyzed: rnam par 'phro ba bdag nyid che //
translated: The great self of emanation

original: zhes bya ba ni gang rnams bdag nyid che ba de ni bdag nyid che ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang rnams bdag nyid che ba de ni bdag nyid che ba ste /
translated: This is the greatness of those who are great.

original: sna tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bzhud pa dang rnam par spro ba'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bzhud pa dang rnam par spro ba'o //
translated: They go to various buddha-fields and emanate.

original: cha shas zhes bya ba'i rang gi dus rnams su rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi cha shas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: cha shas zhes bya ba'i rang gi dus rnams su rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi cha shas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The parts are the parts of the yoginis in their own times.

original: de'i phyir yang byang chub kyi cha shas rgyu byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang byang chub kyi cha shas rgyu byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, they are called the causes of the parts of enlightenment.

original: sems can thams cad rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs kyis gdul bar bya ba de rnams lhag ma med par byang chub kyi cha shas rnams su rab tu 'jug par byed pa'i gzugs kyis rang bzhin las kyang skyes pa gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par son par rnal
analyzed: sems can thams cad rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs kyis gdul bar bya ba de rnams lhag ma med par byang chub kyi cha shas rnams su rab tu 'jug par byed pa'i gzugs kyis rang bzhin las kyang skyes pa gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par son par rnal
translated: All sentient beings are to be converted by the form of the yoginis. They enter into the parts of enlightenment without remainder by means of the form that is born from the nature of the yoginis, and they are located in the sacred sites and sub-sites.

original: 'byor ma 'phro'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'byor ma 'phro'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The yoginis emanate, this is the meaning.

original: da ni rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba'i go rims ji lta ba'i ram pas 'khrul 'khor bcu gnyis rnams gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: da ni rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba'i go rims ji lta ba'i ram pas 'khrul 'khor bcu gnyis rnams gsungs pa ste /
translated: Now, the twelve cakras are taught in the order of the extraction of the root mantra of Vajravārāhī.

original: de yang / thog mar rnam snang phyag 'tshal ba //
analyzed: de yang / thog mar rnam snang phyag 'tshal ba //
translated: First, the homage to Vairocana,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: and so on, up to

original: de nyid tshig ni rgya che ba //🔽zhes bya ba'i bar du gzhag la /
analyzed: de nyid tshig ni rgya che ba // zhes bya ba'i bar du gzhag la /
translated: the words of that are extensive.

original: thog mar 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams kyis bshad de /
analyzed: thog mar 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams kyis bshad de /
translated: First, the cakras are explained by the cakras.

original: thor long du sbal pa 'phar bas so //
analyzed: thor long du sbal pa 'phar bas so //
translated: The frog jumps in a zigzag.

original: de ltar 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas de 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i 'khrul 'khor te rkang pa'i mthe bo nas mgo ba'i bar du rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams so //
analyzed: de ltar 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas de 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i 'khrul 'khor te rkang pa'i mthe bo nas mgo ba'i bar du rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams so //
translated: Thus, the so-called cakra, and so on, up to that is the cakra of the nāḍīs, the seventy-two thousand nāḍīs from the toes to the head.

original: de rnams kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i gtso bo dang sngags kyi yi ge'i tshad rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i gtso bo dang sngags kyi yi ge'i tshad rnams so //
translated: The so-called wheel of those is the principal nāḍīs and the measure of the mantra syllables.

original: de'i phyir khyod kyi sngags so //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyod kyi sngags so //
translated: Therefore, your mantra.

original: @52a * // chung brgya che ba zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phag mo khyod kyi sngags mdor bsdus pa rnams su 'khrul 'khor gyi sngags kyi yi ge rnams de'i don du chung ba'o //
analyzed: @52a * // chung brgya che ba zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phag mo khyod kyi sngags mdor bsdus pa rnams su 'khrul 'khor gyi sngags kyi yi ge rnams de'i don du chung ba'o //
translated: “Small and great” means that in your Vajravārāhī’s concise mantra, the mantra syllables of the yantra are small in that they are for that purpose.

original: yi ge re re'i don gyi sna tshogs pa'i dgos pa byed pa des na rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: yi ge re re'i don gyi sna tshogs pa'i dgos pa byed pa des na rgya che ba'o //
translated: Since each syllable has a variety of purposes, it is great.

original: der ba bshad bya zhes bya bar 'brel lo //🔽bri bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: der ba bshad bya zhes bya bar 'brel lo // bri bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
translated: There, it should be explained—this is the connection.

original: de rnams su rtsa bskyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: de rnams su rtsa bskyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du rtogs par sla'o //
translated: “It should be written” and so on up to “the channels are generated in those” is easy to understand.

original: 'on kyang lnga bcu rtsa drug gis lhag pa'i yi ge bzhi brgya rnams te /
analyzed: 'on kyang lnga bcu rtsa drug gis lhag pa'i yi ge bzhi brgya rnams te /
translated: However, the remaining forty-six syllables are the four hundred syllables.

original: de rnams kyis lhag ma la sogs pa yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams te /
analyzed: de rnams kyis lhag ma la sogs pa yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams te /
translated: The remaining twenty-four syllables are the remaining ones and so on.

original: lte ba'i lhag ma rnams ni 'khrul 'khor bcu gnyis rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: lte ba'i lhag ma rnams ni 'khrul 'khor bcu gnyis rnams kyi'o //
translated: The remaining ones of the navel are those of the twelve yantras.

original: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba ni rtsa stong phrag rnams so //
analyzed: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba ni rtsa stong phrag rnams so //
translated: “The seventy-two thousand” are the channels in thousands.

original: re re'i 'khor zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: re re'i 'khor zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The retinue of each is

original: sngar bshad pa'i lnga bcu rtsa drug gis lhag pa'i yi ge bzhi brgya'i 'khor ro //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i lnga bcu rtsa drug gis lhag pa'i yi ge bzhi brgya'i 'khor ro //
translated: the retinue of four hundred syllables, which is in excess of the fifty-six previously explained.🔽The one root, the sage, the arrow, and the moon are

original: rtsa gcig gi drang srong dang mda' dang zla ba zhes bya ba ni lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis lhag pa'i brgya ste /
analyzed: rtsa gcig gi drang srong dang mda' dang zla ba zhes bya ba ni lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis lhag pa'i brgya ste /
translated: in excess of the eighty-five.

original: spyir bsdus pas thams cad la bdun stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyir bsdus pas thams cad la bdun stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad du 'gyur ro //
translated: In general, when all are combined, there are seven thousand, two hundred and forty-eight.

original: de ltar thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Thus, all, etc.

original: drang srong rig byed mtshams zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad pa rnams las lhag pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad do //
analyzed: drang srong rig byed mtshams zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad pa rnams las lhag pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad do //
translated: The sage Veda-samdhi is in excess of the forty-eight previously explained.

original: de rnams su yang des nyung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams su yang des nyung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In those, he is also less.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽gsungs pa / lus thams cad kyi tshigs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / gsungs pa / lus thams cad kyi tshigs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Why is that?🔽It is said:🔽all the joints of the body.

original: der gnas zhes bya ba ni tshigs kyi rtsa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: der gnas zhes bya ba ni tshigs kyi rtsa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The meaning is that they are the channels of the joints.

original: las gcig tu zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dus rnams su 'khrul 'khor gcig ste ji ltar mos par yongs su btu bar bya'o zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
analyzed: las gcig tu zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dus rnams su 'khrul 'khor gcig ste ji ltar mos par yongs su btu bar bya'o zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
translated: The one action is the one wheel at the times of the actions of pacification, etc., and it is to be fully understood according to one's devotion.

original: rnam shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas yid 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: rnam shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas yid 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rtogs par sla'o //
translated: From consciousness up to mind-destroying is easy to understand.

original: da ni slar yang rim pa ji lta bas sngags btu bseng ge rnam par lta ba yis bshad pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni slar yang rim pa ji lta bas sngags btu bseng ge rnam par lta ba yis bshad pa gsungs pa /
translated: Now, again, he teaches the mantra-selection according to the sequence, with the lion's gaze:

original: theg mar rnam snang phyag 'tshal ba //
analyzed: theg mar rnam snang phyag 'tshal ba //
translated: Homage to Vairocana at the beginning,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: thog mar rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni thog mar rnam par snang mdzad phyag 'tshal ba ste sngags thams cad kyi thog mar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: thog mar rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba ni thog mar rnam par snang mdzad phyag 'tshal ba ste sngags thams cad kyi thog mar gnas pa'o //
translated: At the beginning, Vairocana means homage to Vairocana at the beginning, present at the beginning of all mantras.

original: chos kyi dbyings ni zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa'i gzugs kyis sngon du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis aom gyi yi ge'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings so zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa'i gzugs kyis sngon du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis aom gyi yi ge'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings so zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The realm of phenomena is the syllable Om, which is the nature of the realm of phenomena, by the previously explained characteristics, with the form of the transcendent state.

original: ta sde'i lnga pa'i yi @52b ge ni //
analyzed: ta sde'i lnga pa'i yi @52b ge ni //
translated: The syllable of the fifth of the ta group

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi lnga pa'i yi ge ni na'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi lnga pa'i yi ge ni na'i yi ge'o //
translated: is the syllable Na of the ta group.

original: lnga pa'i ni sde tshan no //
analyzed: lnga pa'i ni sde tshan no //
translated: The fifth is the group.

original: rnal 'byor ma gzugs nam mkha' brten //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma gzugs nam mkha' brten //
translated: The forms of the yoginis are based in space.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar aa'i sde tshan la ltos nas ta'i sde tshan lnga pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar aa'i sde tshan la ltos nas ta'i sde tshan lnga pa'o //
translated: Thus, in dependence on the A group, the fifth of the ta group is the syllable Na.

original: de'i phyir lnga pa'i na'i yi ge zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i phyir lnga pa'i na'i yi ge zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the syllable Na of the fifth is the meaning of the syllable Na of the fifth.

original: de yang nam mkha'i dbus su brten pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs rnams kyis te aa wa dh'u t'i'i dbus su zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽pa mtha'i sa bon ao dang ldan //
analyzed: de yang nam mkha'i dbus su brten pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs rnams kyis te aa wa dh'u t'i'i dbus su zhes bya ba'i don to // pa mtha'i sa bon ao dang ldan //
translated: Moreover, the forms of the yoginis are based in the middle of space, meaning in the middle of the avadhuti.🔽The seed of the final pa is endowed with O.

original: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni ma'i yi ge ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni ma'i yi ge ste /
translated: The final of the pa group is the syllable Ma.

original: ao dbyangs ldan zhes bya ba ni ao'i dbyangs dang ldan pa ste mdor na mo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ao dbyangs ldan zhes bya ba ni ao'i dbyangs dang ldan pa ste mdor na mo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The one endowed with the vowel o is endowed with the vowel o, in brief, the letter mo.

original: de'i khyad par gsungs pa /🔽gti mug 'joms par byed pa yi //
analyzed: de'i khyad par gsungs pa / gti mug 'joms par byed pa yi //
translated: Its distinction is stated:🔽the emanation of the assembly of yoginis,

original: rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs spro ba'o //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs spro ba'o // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: the destroyers of delusion.

original: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sna tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma gti mug la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa dang thig le spro ba'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i sna tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma gti mug la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa dang thig le spro ba'o //
translated: The yoginis such as the dakinis emanate the drops that destroy delusion and so forth.

original: de yi bzhi pa'i sa bon ni //
analyzed: de yi bzhi pa'i sa bon ni //
translated: The seed of its fourth is

original: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi bzhi pa'i sa bon ni bha'i yi ge ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi bzhi pa'i sa bon ni bha'i yi ge ste /
translated: the one endowed with the vowel o, the seed of the fourth of the ka group is the letter bha.

original: sa gsum du ni khyab pa ste //
analyzed: sa gsum du ni khyab pa ste //
translated: It pervades the three realms,

original: rnal 'byor ma ni spro ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni spro ba'o //
translated: the emanation of the yoginis.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar bha'i yi ge las lus dang ngag dang yid dang khams gsum khyab pa'i rnal 'byor ma spro ba'o //🔽thog ma yi ni gsum pa ste //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar bha'i yi ge las lus dang ngag dang yid dang khams gsum khyab pa'i rnal 'byor ma spro ba'o // thog ma yi ni gsum pa ste //
translated: Thus, from the letter bha, the yoginis who pervade the body, speech, mind, and the three realms emanate.🔽The third of the first

original: zhes bya ba ni thog ma ka'i sde tshan gyi gsum pa ni ga'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thog ma ka'i sde tshan gyi gsum pa ni ga'i yi ge'o //
translated: is the one endowed with the vowel o, the third of the first ka group is the letter ga.

original: de yang khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /🔽gsungs pa / 'gro ba drug po nyams byed pa'i //🔽mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro //
analyzed: de yang khyad par ji lta bu zhe na / gsungs pa / 'gro ba drug po nyams byed pa'i // mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro //
translated: What is its special feature?

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is said:🔽The wheel of dakinis🔽is emanated, destroying the six migrations.

original: sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba drug 'joms pa'i rgyu ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba drug 'joms pa'i rgyu ste /
translated: The wheel of dakinis, which is the cause of destroying the six migrations of all sentient beings,

original: chos dang chos can rab tu 'jug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo spro ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos dang chos can rab tu 'jug pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo spro ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: is emanated, which is the engagement of the phenomena and the possessor of phenomena.

original: ya sde'i mtha' yi sa bon ni //
analyzed: ya sde'i mtha' yi sa bon ni //
translated: The seed of the last of the ya group

original: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: is the nature of the enlightened mind.

original: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' wa'i yi ge ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' wa'i yi ge ste /
translated: The last of the ya group is the letter va,

original: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no //🔽lnga pa'i sde yi thog ma ste //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin no // lnga pa'i sde yi thog ma ste //
translated: which is the nature of the enlightened mind.🔽The first of the fifth group

original: zhes bya ba ni lnga pa ni lnga pa ni ta'i sde tshan gyi thog ma ste ta'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lnga pa ni lnga pa ni ta'i sde tshan gyi thog ma ste ta'i yi ge'o //
translated: is the first of the ta group, the letter ta.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi sa bon te //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi sa bon te //
translated: The seed of suchness

original: ae yi dbyangs kyis mgo la reg / ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ae yi dbyangs kyis mgo la reg / ces bya ba ste /
translated: is touched by the vowel e.

original: de yang ta'i yi ge la ae'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na te'i yi ge ste /
analyzed: de yang ta'i yi ge la ae'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na te'i yi ge ste /
translated: The letter Ta is endowed with the letter A, that is, in brief, the letter Te.

original: de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature of reality and the perfect limit.

original: chu yi yi ge yongs bsags pa //
analyzed: chu yi yi ge yongs bsags pa //
translated: The letter of water is fully collected,

original: zhes bya ba ni chu'i sa bon yongs bsags @53a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chu'i sa bon yongs bsags @53a * //
translated: that is, the seed of water is fully collected, the letter Pa.

original: pa ni pa'i yi ge ste yon tan gsungs pa /
analyzed: pa ni pa'i yi ge ste yon tan gsungs pa /
translated: The qualities are stated:

original: thams cad byed pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: thams cad byed pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of all activity.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad pa'i sngags kyi yi ge rnams dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rgyu byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'bab pas bde ba'i gnas kyi dngos po'i gzugs zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽rtsa sde'i dbus gnas bzung nas ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad pa'i sngags kyi yi ge rnams dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rgyu byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'bab pas bde ba'i gnas kyi dngos po'i gzugs zhes bya ba'i don to // rtsa sde'i dbus gnas bzung nas ni //
translated: The meaning is that the form of the entity of the abode of bliss is the cause of the yoginīs and the mantra letters previously explained, by the descent of the bodhicitta.🔽Having taken up the one that abides in the middle of the group of nāḍīs,

original: zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i sde tshan gyi dbus na gnas pa ni dza'i yi ge ste de gzung bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtsa'i sde tshan gyi dbus na gnas pa ni dza'i yi ge ste de gzung bar bya ba'o //
translated: the one that abides in the middle of the group of nāḍīs is the letter Ja.

original: nyi ma yi ni gdan ldan pa //
analyzed: nyi ma yi ni gdan ldan pa //
translated: It is endowed with the seat of the sun.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar dza'i yi ge nyi mas brgyan pa ste ra'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar dza'i yi ge nyi mas brgyan pa ste ra'i yi ge'o //
translated: Thus, the letter Ja is adorned with the sun, that is, the letter Ra.

original: des 'og gi char ldan par bya ba ste mdor na dzra'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: des 'og gi char ldan par bya ba ste mdor na dzra'i yi ge'o //
translated: It is endowed with the letter below it, that is, the letter La. In brief, it is the letter Jra.

original: yon tan ci zhe na /
analyzed: yon tan ci zhe na /
translated: What is its quality?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / las kyi dus su khyad par 'bar //
analyzed: gsungs pa / las kyi dus su khyad par 'bar //
translated: It blazes in the time of action.

original: zhes bya ba ste khyad par gyi las su yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang byed pa rang gi rtog pa dang bral ba'i las sems can rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis de thams cad 'bar bar gyur pa ste 'od gsal ba'i ye
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste khyad par gyi las su yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang byed pa rang gi rtog pa dang bral ba'i las sems can rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis de thams cad 'bar bar gyur pa ste 'od gsal ba'i ye
translated: Even in special actions, the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas, free from their own conceptualization, by the power of the conceptualization of sentient beings, all of that blazes, that is, it is radiant with the pristine consciousnesses of manifest

original: shes rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽phag mo yi ni sa bon ni //
analyzed: shes rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to // phag mo yi ni sa bon ni //
translated: awakening.🔽The seed of Varahi

original: zhes bya ba ni phag mo'i sa bon ba'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phag mo'i sa bon ba'i yi ge'o //
translated: is the seed of Varahi, the letter Va.🔽It is touched by the letter A,

original: aa yi yi ges rnam par reg / ces bya ba ni de de ltar a'a'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na b'a'o //
analyzed: aa yi yi ges rnam par reg / ces bya ba ni de de ltar a'a'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na b'a'o //
translated: that is, it is endowed with the letter A. In brief, it is the letter Va.

original: yon tan kyang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yon tan kyang gsungs pa /
translated: Its quality is also stated:

original: sa gsum ye shes rang bzhin mnyam //
analyzed: sa gsum ye shes rang bzhin mnyam //
translated: The three worlds are equal in the nature of pristine consciousness.

original: zhes bya ba ste sa gsum gyi ye shes ni rang gi rig pa'i bde ba ste ye shes tshad med pa des rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rang bzhin gyi ye shes 'char ba zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽me yi sa bon dbyangs gnyis ldan //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste sa gsum gyi ye shes ni rang gi rig pa'i bde ba ste ye shes tshad med pa des rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rang bzhin gyi ye shes 'char ba zhes bya ba'i don to // me yi sa bon dbyangs gnyis ldan //
translated: The gnosis of the three stages is the bliss of one's own awareness. By that immeasurable gnosis, the yogins and yoginis experience the arising of natural gnosis.🔽The seed of fire is endowed with the second vowel.

original: zhes bya ba ni me'i sa bon ni ra'i yi ge ste dbyangs kyi gnyis pa a'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni me'i sa bon ni ra'i yi ge ste dbyangs kyi gnyis pa a'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed of fire is the letter ra, and the second vowel is the letter a.

original: de dang ldan pa ste mdor na r'a zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa ste mdor na r'a zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Endowed with that, in brief, it is ra.

original: 'khor ba'i las kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i las kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the karma of samsara.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar r'a'i yi ge 'khor ba'i las kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar r'a'i yi ge 'khor ba'i las kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: Thus, the letter ra is the nature of the karma of samsara.

original: gang gi phyir mdzes pa dang 'bar bar 'gyur bas r'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mdzes pa dang 'bar bar 'gyur bas r'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: Since it is beautiful and blazing, it is the letter ra.

original: de'i phyir ye shes dang bral bas las gang byed pa yang dag par bcom nas de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir ye shes dang bral bas las gang byed pa yang dag par bcom nas de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Therefore, since it is devoid of gnosis, whatever karma is created is destroyed, and all of that is the nature of the buddhas.

original: sa mtha'i mgo la ai dbyangs reg / ces bya ba ni sa'i yi ge'i pha rol ni sa'i pha rol te ha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: sa mtha'i mgo la ai dbyangs reg / ces bya ba ni sa'i yi ge'i pha rol ni sa'i pha rol te ha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The head of the letter of earth is touched by the vowel i.🔽The other side of the letter of earth is the letter ha.

original: de yang mgo bo la a'i'i dbyangs kyis reg pa ste mdor na h'i'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: de yang mgo bo la a'i'i dbyangs kyis reg pa ste mdor na h'i'i yi ge'o //
translated: And that is touched by the head of the vowel i, in brief, the letter hai.

original: don gsungs @53b pa ;
analyzed: don gsungs @53b pa ;
translated: The meaning is stated:

original: rtag tu tshangs pa'i rang bzhin blta //
analyzed: rtag tu tshangs pa'i rang bzhin blta //
translated: Always look at the nature of Brahma.

original: zhes bya ba ste h'a'i ni rtag tu mchog gi tshangs pa'i rang bzhin du blta bar bya ste gang gi phyir sems can thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste h'a'i ni rtag tu mchog gi tshangs pa'i rang bzhin du blta bar bya ste gang gi phyir sems can thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The letter hai should always be looked at as the nature of supreme Brahma, because it is the nature of the wisdom of all sentient beings.

original: dbyangs kyi gnyis pa bzung nas ni //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi gnyis pa bzung nas ni //
translated: Having taken the second vowel,

original: de ltar mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs //
analyzed: de ltar mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs //
translated: in that way the form of the dakini.

original: zhes bya ba ni dbyangs kyi gnyis pa'i yi ge a'a gzung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dbyangs kyi gnyis pa'i yi ge a'a gzung ba'o //
translated: The second vowel is the letter a.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba dang mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni sa bon gyi yi ge de mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs so //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba dang mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni sa bon gyi yi ge de mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs so //
translated: In that way and the form of the dakini refer to the seed syllable as the form of the dakini.

original: de'i phyir 'di gsungs pa //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di gsungs pa //
translated: Therefore, this is stated:

original: sems can sgrol bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sems can sgrol bar byed pa'o //
translated: It liberates sentient beings.

original: zhes bya ba ste mkha' 'gro ma gang gi gzugs kyis sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste mkha' 'gro ma gang gi gzugs kyis sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed do //
translated: By this, she is a dakini in the form of whom all sentient beings are liberated.

original: gang gi phyir mkha' la 'gro ba sa sprul pas nam mkha' la sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bas na da na n'a ao ste nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i khams kyi lugs kyis te 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi dngos po'i phyir dang sems
analyzed: gang gi phyir mkha' la 'gro ba sa sprul pas nam mkha' la sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bas na da na n'a ao ste nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i khams kyi lugs kyis te 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi dngos po'i phyir dang sems
translated: Since she moves through the sky by means of her emanations, she is a dakini, and since she moves through the various worlds in the sky, she is a dakini in the system of the realm of space. This is the meaning of the term dakini.

original: can thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mkha' 'gro ma'i snying du rab tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽ya yig gnas pa ra dang ldan //
analyzed: can thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mkha' 'gro ma'i snying du rab tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i don to // ya yig gnas pa ra dang ldan //
translated: She is the essence of the movement of all sentient beings, and she is the one who has entered the heart of all sentient beings.🔽The syllable ya is endowed with ra.

original: zhes bya ba ni ya'i yi ge gnas pa la r'a'i yi ges ldan pa'o //🔽slar yang a'a yi dbyangs sbyor ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ya'i yi ge gnas pa la r'a'i yi ges ldan pa'o // slar yang a'a yi dbyangs sbyor ro //
translated: The syllable ya is endowed with the syllable ra.🔽Again, the vowel sound a is applied.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar yang a'i dbyangs kyi yi ge sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar yang a'i dbyangs kyi yi ge sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Again, the vowel sound a is applied.

original: mdor na yarya'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mdor na yarya'i yi ge'o //
translated: In brief, the syllable yari.

original: 'di'i don ni //
analyzed: 'di'i don ni //
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: khams gsum rnal 'byor ma spro ba'o /
analyzed: khams gsum rnal 'byor ma spro ba'o /
translated: The emanation of the yoginis of the three realms.

original: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnams su rnal 'byor ma rnams spro ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum rnams su rnal 'byor ma rnams spro ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This means the emanation of the yoginis in the three realms.

original: drug pa'i sde yi dang po ni //
analyzed: drug pa'i sde yi dang po ni //
translated: The first of the sixth

original: zhes bya ba ni drug pa'i sde tshan gyi dang po ni pa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni drug pa'i sde tshan gyi dang po ni pa'i yi ge'o //
translated: This means the first of the sixth group, the letter pa.

original: rnal 'byor ma sngags kun rang bzhin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma sngags kun rang bzhin //
translated: The nature of all yoginis' mantras.

original: zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi gzugs kyi padma'i snying po la byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i rang bzhin las kyang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi gzugs kyi padma'i snying po la byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'i rang bzhin las kyang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that from the essence of the bindu of bodhicitta in the heart of the lotus of all forms, the yoginis are coemergent, this is the meaning.

original: r'a gnas pa ni aa dbyangs ldan //
analyzed: r'a gnas pa ni aa dbyangs ldan //
translated: The ra is endowed with the vowel a.

original: zhes bya ba ni r'a'i yi ge gnas pa a'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni r'a'i yi ge gnas pa a'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste /
translated: This means that the letter ra is endowed with the vowel a.

original: mdor na ra zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mdor na ra zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In brief, it is called ra.

original: de'i yang rang bzhin ci zhe na /
analyzed: de'i yang rang bzhin ci zhe na /
translated: What is its nature?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / sdang pa'i sems can gsod byed 'gyur //
analyzed: gsungs pa / sdang pa'i sems can gsod byed 'gyur //
translated: It becomes the killer of hateful beings.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This means

original: snang ba'i sems can rnams snying rje'i rgyu yis gsod par gsungs so //
analyzed: snang ba'i sems can rnams snying rje'i rgyu yis gsod par gsungs so //
translated: The Bodhisattva, out of compassion, kills those sentient beings who are to be killed.

original: 'o na gsad pa'i las rnams kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro //🔽slar yang byang chub sems @54a * //
analyzed: 'o na gsad pa'i las rnams kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'gyur ro // slar yang byang chub sems @54a * //
translated: But the actions of killing harm sentient beings!

original: dpa' rnams kyi dmyal ba nyid de ji ltar snying rje'i gang gis 'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: dpa' rnams kyi dmyal ba nyid de ji ltar snying rje'i gang gis 'gro ba'i don byed par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Again, the Bodhisattvas are in hell itself. How can they benefit sentient beings out of compassion?

original: de nyid bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa /
translated: He explains that very point:

original: khyed kyi ngag bden te 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa la brtson pa ste /
analyzed: khyed kyi ngag bden te 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa la brtson pa ste /
translated: You are right, but the Bodhisattvas are intent on generating the thought to benefit others,

original: rang la phan pa'i bsam pa ni med do //
analyzed: rang la phan pa'i bsam pa ni med do //
translated: not the thought to benefit themselves.

original: gcig tu na gzhan la gnod pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig tu na gzhan la gnod pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma yin te /
translated: In one way, it is not the Bodhisattvas who harm others,

original: rtag tu de ltar smon lam 'debs pa dang / gsod pa la sogs pa'i las rnams kyis kyang bdag nyid las mngon sum du dmyal ba la sogs par 'gro bar gyur pa mchog yin no zhes so //
analyzed: rtag tu de ltar smon lam 'debs pa dang / gsod pa la sogs pa'i las rnams kyis kyang bdag nyid las mngon sum du dmyal ba la sogs par 'gro bar gyur pa mchog yin no zhes so //
translated: but rather, by the actions of killing, etc., they themselves go directly to hell, etc. This is the best way to make the aspiration prayer to always benefit others.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: sdang ba'i sems can gcig gis kyang sems can du ma rnams la gnod pa byed do //
analyzed: sdang ba'i sems can gcig gis kyang sems can du ma rnams la gnod pa byed do //
translated: Because even a single hostile sentient being can harm many sentient beings.

original: des de ltar las kyis grangs med pa'i bskal pa rnams su dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ste /
analyzed: des de ltar las kyis grangs med pa'i bskal pa rnams su dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ste /
translated: Thus, through karma, one experiences the suffering of the hells and so on for countless eons.

original: de'i de ltar dgrol ba'i rgyud nyid pas skyon med de 'di ni mdor bsdus pa'i don yin pas rgya che ba yang sna tshogs pa'i mdo sde la sogs pa dang bstan bcos rnams su shes par bya'o //🔽dza yi yi ges yongs gzung ste //🔽ai yi dbyangs dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: de'i de ltar dgrol ba'i rgyud nyid pas skyon med de 'di ni mdor bsdus pa'i don yin pas rgya che ba yang sna tshogs pa'i mdo sde la sogs pa dang bstan bcos rnams su shes par bya'o // dza yi yi ges yongs gzung ste // ai yi dbyangs dang yang dag ldan //
translated: Since that is the nature of being liberated, there is no fault. This is the concise meaning. The extensive meaning should be understood from the various sūtras and so on and the treatises.🔽The syllable ja is fully grasped🔽and endowed with the vowel i.

original: zhes bya ba ni dza'i yi ge yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dza'i yi ge yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The syllable ja is fully grasped.

original: ai'i yi ge dang yongs su ldan par bya ste /
analyzed: ai'i yi ge dang yongs su ldan par bya ste /
translated: It is endowed with the vowel i.

original: mdor na dzi yi yi ge'o //
analyzed: mdor na dzi yi yi ge'o //
translated: In brief, it is the syllable ji.

original: de yang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Moreover, it is the nature of illusion.

original: zhes bya ba ste sgyu ma chen po dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku la zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste sgyu ma chen po dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku la zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The great illusion and the emanation body of the Buddhas are intended.

original: so yi sa bon rna ba la //
analyzed: so yi sa bon rna ba la //
translated: The seed of the tooth is in the ear,

original: ae yi dbyangs kyis reg pas dbye //
analyzed: ae yi dbyangs kyis reg pas dbye //
translated: divided by the touch of the sound of E.🔽The seed of the tooth is in the ear, divided by the touch of the sound of E,

original: zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ges las rnams su phye ba ste reg pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ges las rnams su phye ba ste reg pa'o //
translated: that is, divided into the actions by the letter E, the touch.
