original: mdor na ter 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mdor na ter 'gyur ro //
translated: In brief, it becomes TE.

original: glu yi sngags kyis sbyar ba ste //
analyzed: glu yi sngags kyis sbyar ba ste //
translated: It is joined by the mantra of song.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar de'i yi ge sngags kyi dbyangs kyis sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar de'i yi ge sngags kyi dbyangs kyis sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, the letter of that is to be joined by the sound of the mantra.

original: de ltar yang gang gi glu yin /
analyzed: de ltar yang gang gi glu yin /
translated: In that case, whose song is it?

original: ci bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /🔽tre yi yi ges sa gsum kun //
analyzed: ci bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa / tre yi yi ges sa gsum kun //
translated: What is to be done, and so on, is stated:🔽The three worlds are all🔽by the letter TRE.

original: zhes bya ba ste de'i yi ges khams gsum la thams cad glu'i rnam par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste de'i yi ges khams gsum la thams cad glu'i rnam par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: By that letter, all in the three worlds are to be joined in the form of song.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ye shes kyis ni khyad par sngags //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ye shes kyis ni khyad par sngags // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The mantra is distinguished by wisdom.

original: de ltar sngags ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar sngags ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyid do //
translated: Thus, the mantra is of the nature of wisdom.

original: de lta bu'i rnam pa des chos thams cad bsgrag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pa des chos thams cad bsgrag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni khyad par ro //
translated: That is the form of all dharmas.

original: la yi yi ge ao dang ldan //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: la yi yi ge ao dang ldan // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The syllable la is endowed with the syllable o.

original: la'i yi ge @54b la ao'i yi ges ldan par bya ba ste /
analyzed: la'i yi ge @54b la ao'i yi ges ldan par bya ba ste /
translated: The syllable la is endowed with the syllable o.

original: mdor na lo'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mdor na lo'i yi ge'o //
translated: In brief, the syllable lo.

original: 'di'i don ni /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of this is:

original: 'jig rten rnams kyis 'dzin pa'o //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten rnams kyis 'dzin pa'o // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The world is held.

original: 'jig rten rnams kyi rten du gyur pa sa lta bu'i ye shes kyi rlung lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten rnams kyi rten du gyur pa sa lta bu'i ye shes kyi rlung lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The wisdom vāyu that is like the earth, the support of the world, is the connate wisdom.🔽That is the dharma that generates enlightenment.

original: de yang byang chub byed pa ni chos zhes bya ba ste rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bsgom pa goms pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i mthar thug pa thob pa ste /
analyzed: de yang byang chub byed pa ni chos zhes bya ba ste rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bsgom pa goms pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i mthar thug pa thob pa ste /
translated: The ultimate of the connate joy is attained through the meditation of yogins and yoginīs.

original: de nyid byang chub rnams kyi byed pa bzhi pa bdag po yang dag pa'i nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid byang chub rnams kyi byed pa bzhi pa bdag po yang dag pa'i nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That is the fourth function of the buddhas, the perfect experience.

original: thog ma'i ka ni ya stan ldan //
analyzed: thog ma'i ka ni ya stan ldan //
translated: The initial ka is endowed with ya.

original: zhes bya ba ni thog mar ka'i yi ge la sbyin par bya ste ya'i gdan no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thog mar ka'i yi ge la sbyin par bya ste ya'i gdan no //
translated: The ka syllable is to be given first, the seat of the ya [syllable].

original: mdor na kya'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mdor na kya'i yi ge'o //
translated: In brief, the ka syllable.

original: 'di'i rang bzhin gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di'i rang bzhin gsungs pa /
translated: Its nature is stated:

original: 'chi dang lhan skyes dbye ba med //🔽ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'chi dang lhan skyes dbye ba med // ces bya ba ste /
translated: Death and Innate are inseparable.

original: ka'i yi ge de nam mkha' ste 'chi ba'i rlung gis rlung med pa'o //
analyzed: ka'i yi ge de nam mkha' ste 'chi ba'i rlung gis rlung med pa'o //
translated: The ka syllable is space, the wind of death, without wind.

original: de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes dang rnam par shes pa de yod na srog dang sems dag cing zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes dang rnam par shes pa de yod na srog dang sems dag cing zhes pa'o //
translated: If there is such a nature of intuition and consciousness, then the life and mind are pure.

original: pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge'o //🔽aa yi yi ge'i dbyangs sbyar bya //
analyzed: pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge'o // aa yi yi ge'i dbyangs sbyar bya //
translated: The end of pa is the ma syllable, the end of the pa group.🔽The vowel of the a syllable is to be applied.

original: zhes bya ba ni a'i yi ge dbyangs kyis sogs pa ste mdor na m'a zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni a'i yi ge dbyangs kyis sogs pa ste mdor na m'a zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The vowel of the a syllable is applied, in brief, ma.

original: sa gsum gyi ni ma'i rang bzhin //
analyzed: sa gsum gyi ni ma'i rang bzhin //
translated: The nature of the ma is the three worlds.

original: zhes bya ba ni yi ge m'a de sa gsum gyi ma dang rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin lus dang ngag dang yid bskyed ma zhes bya ba ste aa wa dh'u t'i'i zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽ta yig ai yi yi ges brgyan //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yi ge m'a de sa gsum gyi ma dang rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin lus dang ngag dang yid bskyed ma zhes bya ba ste aa wa dh'u t'i'i zhes bya ba'i don to // ta yig ai yi yi ges brgyan //
translated: This is the letter Ma, which is the nature of the three worlds, the Yoginis, and the generation of body, speech, and mind, that is, the meaning of the Avadhuti.🔽The letter Ta is adorned with the letter I.

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i rnam pa'i yi ge ai'i yi ges brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i rnam pa'i yi ge ai'i yi ges brgyan pa'o //
translated: This is the letter Ta in the form of the letter I.

original: mdor na tir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mdor na tir 'gyur ro //
translated: In brief, it is the Ti.

original: bde ba 'dzin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba 'dzin par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the holder of bliss.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar ta'i yi ge bde ba 'dzin pa ste rtsa thams cad nas 'pho ba'i dus su zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar ta'i yi ge bde ba 'dzin pa ste rtsa thams cad nas 'pho ba'i dus su zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, the letter Ta is the holder of bliss, at the time of the movement of all the channels.

original: slar yang pa'i sde'i mtha' ma ste pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni yi ge ma'o //
analyzed: slar yang pa'i sde'i mtha' ma ste pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni yi ge ma'o //
translated: Again, the last of the Pa group, the last of the Pa group is the letter Ma.

original: tshad med pa'i lhan skyes kyi dbus na gnas pa'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i bde ba'i rtsa'i der ma'i yi ge tshad med pa'i dbus su lhan skyes kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i lhan skyes kyi dbus na gnas pa'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i bde ba'i rtsa'i der ma'i yi ge tshad med pa'i dbus su lhan skyes kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature of the innate in the middle of the immeasurable, that is, the letter Ma of the bliss channel explained there is the nature of the innate in the middle of the immeasurable.

original: sa'i mtha' ma a'a dang ldan //
analyzed: sa'i mtha' ma a'a dang ldan //
translated: It is endowed with the last of the Sa group and the letter A.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa'i pha rol ha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa'i pha rol ha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter Ha is the one beyond the letter Sa.

original: de ltar a'a'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na h'a zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar a'a'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na h'a zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, endowed with the letter A, in brief, it is Ha.

original: rdor sems ye shes gzhom med pa'o //
analyzed: rdor sems ye shes gzhom med pa'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is the indestructible intuition.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' gzhom du med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gzhom bar bya ba dang 'joms par byed pa spangs pa @55a * //🔽zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' gzhom du med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gzhom bar bya ba dang 'joms par byed pa spangs pa @55a * // zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that Vajrasattva is the nature of indestructible intuition, free from that which is to be destroyed and the destroyer.

original: ya sde'i mtha' ma ai dbyangs ldan //🔽zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma'i yi ge wa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ya sde'i mtha' ma ai dbyangs ldan // zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma'i yi ge wa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The last of the Ya group, endowed with the vowel I.🔽The meaning is that the last letter of the Ya group is the letter Va.

original: de yang ai'i dbyangs dang ldan pa ste mdor na wi'o //
analyzed: de yang ai'i dbyangs dang ldan pa ste mdor na wi'o //
translated: Endowed with the vowel I, in brief, it is Vi.

original: mi shes rang bzhin 'joms byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi shes rang bzhin 'joms byed pa'o //
translated: It destroys the nature of ignorance.

original: zhes bya ba ni mi shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi cho gas nges 'joms par byed pa ste wi'i yi ger bshad ces bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mi shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi cho gas nges 'joms par byed pa ste wi'i yi ger bshad ces bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that it is explained as the letter Vi, which destroys the nature of ignorance by the power of the mantra.

original: dye sngags chos dbyings rang bzhin te //
analyzed: dye sngags chos dbyings rang bzhin te //
translated: The mantra Dya is the nature of the ultimate realm.

original: zhes bya ba ni dye'i yi ge'i sngags chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dye'i yi ge'i sngags chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: This is the mantra of the letter “d”, the nature of the Dharma-element.

original: thams cad rang bzhin khyab pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad rang bzhin khyab pa'o //
translated: All is pervaded by the nature.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar yi ge de thams cad kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs pa'i chos khyab pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar yi ge de thams cad kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs pa'i chos khyab pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Thus, the nature of all those letters is pervaded by the Dharma of variety.

original: gang dbang po la sogs pas mchod pa'o //
analyzed: gang dbang po la sogs pas mchod pa'o //
translated: That which is worshipped by the senses, etc.

original: bu ga rnams nas 'dzag pa sa //
analyzed: bu ga rnams nas 'dzag pa sa //
translated: The one who drips from the holes.

original: zhes bya ba ni bu ga thams cad nas byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa po ni sa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bu ga thams cad nas byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa po ni sa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter “s” is the one who drips the bodhicitta from all the holes.

original: 'bab pa'i sa bon nyi ma ldan //
analyzed: 'bab pa'i sa bon nyi ma ldan //
translated: The seed of dripping, endowed with the sun.

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems 'bab pa'i sa bon ni ba'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems 'bab pa'i sa bon ni ba'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed of the dripping bodhicitta is the letter “v”.

original: nyi ma'i ni ra'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na rba'o //🔽chu srin dbang po yi ni sngags //
analyzed: nyi ma'i ni ra'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na rba'o // chu srin dbang po yi ni sngags //
translated: The sun is the letter “r”, and in brief, it is “rv”.🔽The mantra of the lord of the sea-monsters.

original: zhes bya ba ni chu srin dbang po yis ni 'dod pa ste 'dod chags chen po thams cad du rjes su son pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chu srin dbang po yis ni 'dod pa ste 'dod chags chen po thams cad du rjes su son pa'i sngags so //
translated: The lord of the sea-monsters is desire, the mantra of the universal attainment of great passion.

original: de'i rang bzhin rba'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin rba'i yi ge'o //
translated: Its nature is the letter “rv”.

original: pa sde'i bzhi pa'i sa bon ni pa'i sde tshan gyi bzhi pa'i sa bon bha'i yi ger gnas pa'o //
analyzed: pa sde'i bzhi pa'i sa bon ni pa'i sde tshan gyi bzhi pa'i sa bon bha'i yi ger gnas pa'o //
translated: The seed of the fourth of the pa group is the seed of the fourth of the pa group, the syllable b.

original: a'u'i dbyangs stan dang ldan pa ste //
analyzed: a'u'i dbyangs stan dang ldan pa ste //
translated: The vowel au is its seat.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar bha'i yi ge a'u'i stan dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar bha'i yi ge a'u'i stan dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: Thus, the syllable b is endowed with the seat of the vowel au.

original: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams byed pa'o //
translated: It destroys the suffering of samsara.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar gnyis kyi bh'u'i yi ges 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar gnyis kyi bh'u'i yi ges 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams par byed pa'o //
translated: Thus, the syllable bhu of the two destroys the suffering of samsara.

original: ta yi sngags kyis dgra nyams byed //
analyzed: ta yi sngags kyis dgra nyams byed //
translated: The mantra of ta destroys the enemy.

original: ces bya ba ni sngags kyi ta'i rnam pa'i yi ge'i sngags kyis dgra de sna tshogs pa'i bgegs 'joms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sngags kyi ta'i rnam pa'i yi ge'i sngags kyis dgra de sna tshogs pa'i bgegs 'joms par byed pa'o //
translated: The mantra of the syllable ta in the form of a mantra destroys the enemy, the various obstacles.

original: slar yang pa sde'i bzhi pa ni //
analyzed: slar yang pa sde'i bzhi pa ni //
translated: Again, the fourth of the pa group

original: zhes bya ba ni slar yang pa'i sde tshan gyi bzhi pa bha'i yi ge'o //🔽sgra chen po ni sgrogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni slar yang pa'i sde tshan gyi bzhi pa bha'i yi ge'o // sgra chen po ni sgrogs pa'o //
translated: is again the fourth of the pa group, the syllable b.🔽It proclaims the great sound.

original: zhes bya ba ni bha zhes bya ba'i yi ge chen po'i sgra sgrogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bha zhes bya ba'i yi ge chen po'i sgra sgrogs pa ste /
translated: The syllable b proclaims the great sound.

original: rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyi 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽rlung gi sa bon a'a yig reg / ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyi 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba'i don to // rlung gi sa bon a'a yig reg / ces bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning of the term “clear light” is the self-awareness intuition.🔽The seed of wind is the letter A, and the contact.

original: rlung gi sa bon ni ya'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: rlung gi sa bon ni ya'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed of wind is the letter Ya.

original: de de ltar a'a'i yi ges reg pa'o //
analyzed: de de ltar a'a'i yi ges reg pa'o //
translated: That is the contact with the letter A.

original: sngags ni nor bur 'bab @55b bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sngags ni nor bur 'bab @55b bzhin pa'o //
translated: The mantra is like a descent into the jewel.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar mdor na ya'i yi ge ste rtsa thams cad kyi rang bzhin rdo rje nor bu de la gzhol bas mtshon pa rlung chen po'i bdag nyid bde ba de'i sngags de de bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar mdor na ya'i yi ge ste rtsa thams cad kyi rang bzhin rdo rje nor bu de la gzhol bas mtshon pa rlung chen po'i bdag nyid bde ba de'i sngags de de bzhin no //
translated: Thus, in brief, the letter Ya, the nature of all the channels, is the vajra jewel, and the great wind, the nature of that bliss, is the mantra.

original: chu yi sa bon rnar gzung ba //
analyzed: chu yi sa bon rnar gzung ba //
translated: The seed of water is held in the ear.

original: zhes bya ba ni chu'i sa bon ni ba'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chu'i sa bon ni ba'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed of water is the letter Va.

original: de yang rna bas gzung ba ste //
analyzed: de yang rna bas gzung ba ste //
translated: That is held in the ear.

original: sgyu ma yi ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sgyu ma yi ni rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature of illusion.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis sgra gang ci thos pa dang sangs rgyas de thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis sgra gang ci thos pa dang sangs rgyas de thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Whatever sound the lord of yogins hears, all that is the nature of illusion.

original: de ltar gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: zhal rnam par dag pa bha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhal rnam par dag pa bha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The pure face is the syllable bha.

original: mig rnam par dag pa ya'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mig rnam par dag pa ya'i yi ge'o //
translated: The pure eye is the syllable ya.

original: de bzhin du pa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du pa'i yi ge'o //
translated: Likewise, the syllable pa.

original: sa yi pha rol ae yig ldan //
analyzed: sa yi pha rol ae yig ldan //
translated: The earth beyond that is endowed with the syllable ai.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa'i yi ge'i pha rol ni ha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa'i yi ge'i pha rol ni ha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The syllable ha is beyond the syllable of the earth.

original: ae'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na he'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ae'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na he'i yi ge'o //
translated: It is endowed with the syllable ai, in brief, the syllable he.

original: sa gsum gyis ni 'khrul 'joms rgyu //
analyzed: sa gsum gyis ni 'khrul 'joms rgyu //
translated: The three earths destroy delusion.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa gsum rnams su lus dang dag dang yid kyis 'khrul pa de nyid gti mug la sogs pas 'khor ba thams cad kyi rdzas yod pa nyid dang 'khrul pa dang bcas pa yang ring du byed pa'i sa he'i yi ge zhes bya ba bshad🔽do // pa sde'i mtha' ma rkang rang bzhin //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa gsum rnams su lus dang dag dang yid kyis 'khrul pa de nyid gti mug la sogs pas 'khor ba thams cad kyi rdzas yod pa nyid dang 'khrul pa dang bcas pa yang ring du byed pa'i sa he'i yi ge zhes bya ba bshad do // pa sde'i mtha' ma rkang rang bzhin //
translated: The delusion of body, speech, and mind in the three earths is that very ignorance, etc. The existence of all of cyclic existence is made distant by the syllable he, which is explained as the earth.🔽The last of the pa group is the nature of the foot.

original: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge'o //
translated: The syllable ma is the last of the pa group.

original: rkang gi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni de ltar ma'i rnam pa'i yi ge'i dbus ma'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rkang gi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni de ltar ma'i rnam pa'i yi ge'i dbus ma'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The nature of the foot is the nature of the gnosis of the central letter of the mother's form.

original: sa yi pha rol aa dang ldan //
analyzed: sa yi pha rol aa dang ldan //
translated: Endowed with the A of the other side of the earth.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa'i pha rol gyi yi ge ni ha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa'i pha rol gyi yi ge ni ha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter on the other side of the earth is the letter Ha.

original: a'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na h'ar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: a'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na h'ar 'gyur ro //
translated: Endowed with the letter A, in brief it becomes HAR.

original: ngo mtshar che ba yi ni chos //
analyzed: ngo mtshar che ba yi ni chos //
translated: The Dharma of great wonder.

original: zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar che ba'i gzugs kyi chos te kye bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar che ba'i gzugs kyi chos te kye bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang ngo //
translated: The Dharma of the form of great wonder, O Blessed One, the form of the Dharma, and so on.

original: ya sde'i mtha' ma zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ya sde'i mtha' ma zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The last of the Ya group is the letter Va, the last of the Ya group.

original: yi ge mchog ni padma'i rtsa ba'i yi ge sa bon las so //
analyzed: yi ge mchog ni padma'i rtsa ba'i yi ge sa bon las so //
translated: The supreme letter is from the seed syllable of the lotus root.

original: mchog tu mi 'gyur dngos po zhes bya ba ni rtsa thams cad kyir bshad do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: mchog tu mi 'gyur dngos po zhes bya ba ni rtsa thams cad kyir bshad do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The supreme unchanging reality is explained as all the channels.

original: tsa sde'i dbus ma'i sa bon ni //
analyzed: tsa sde'i dbus ma'i sa bon ni //
translated: The seed of the central one of the Ca group.

original: zhes bya ba'i tsa'i sde tshan gyi dbus ma'i sa bon dza'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tsa'i sde tshan gyi dbus ma'i sa bon dza'i yi ge'o //
translated: The middle seed of the CA class is the letter JA.

original: ra ni mgo la gnas pa ste //
analyzed: ra ni mgo la gnas pa ste //
translated: RA is on the head.

original: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge mgo la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge mgo la gnas pa'o //
translated: The letter RA is on the head.🔽It is distinguished by the letter AI,

original: ae'i yi ges phye ba zhes bya ba ni 'di ae'i yi ges phye ba ste mdor na dzre'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ae'i yi ges phye ba zhes bya ba ni 'di ae'i yi ges phye ba ste mdor na dzre'i yi ge'o //
translated: which means that it is distinguished by the letter AI, in brief, the letter JRE.

original: lha dang lha min rang bzhin no //
analyzed: lha dang lha min rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature of gods and demigods.

original: @56a * // zhes bya ba ni de ltar dzre'i yi ge ni lha dang lha ma yin gyi rang bzhin te khams gsum rnams su lha dang lha ma yin de nam mkha' spro ba zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: @56a * // zhes bya ba ni de ltar dzre'i yi ge ni lha dang lha ma yin gyi rang bzhin te khams gsum rnams su lha dang lha ma yin de nam mkha' spro ba zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Thus, the letter JRE is the nature of gods and demigods, and the gods and demigods of the three realms are considered to be the emanation of space.

original: de ltar sngags tshig drug po ste //
analyzed: de ltar sngags tshig drug po ste //
translated: Thus, the mantra is six syllables,

original: rnal 'byor ma dang tshogs spro ba //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma dang tshogs spro ba //
translated: emanating the yoginis and the assembly.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar sngags kyi rkang ba drug ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar sngags kyi rkang ba drug ste /
translated: Thus, the mantra has six parts.🔽What are they?

original: gang zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: bha ga ba ti badzra b'a r'a h'i /
analyzed: bha ga ba ti badzra b'a r'a h'i /
translated: Bhagavati Vajravarahi,

original: a'ary'a pa r'a dzi te tree lo kya m'a te /
analyzed: a'ary'a pa r'a dzi te tree lo kya m'a te /
translated: Arya Aparajita, Trelkaya Mati,

original: ma h'a bi dye /
analyzed: ma h'a bi dye /
translated: Mahavidya,

original: sarba bh'u ta bha y'a wa he /
analyzed: sarba bh'u ta bha y'a wa he /
translated: Sarvabhuta Bhayavahini,

original: ma h'a badzre zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma h'a badzre zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Mahāvajre.

original: aom na mo'i yi ge gsum gyi tshig rkang thams cad la mngon par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom na mo'i yi ge gsum gyi tshig rkang thams cad la mngon par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Om na mo is to be applied to all the lines of the three syllables.

original: de rnams kyis kyang rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs spro ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis kyang rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs spro ba'o //
translated: By them also, the assembly of yoginīs is emanated.

original: de ci'i don du zhe na /🔽gsungs pa / las kun rang bzhin 'khor lo yi //
analyzed: de ci'i don du zhe na / gsungs pa / las kun rang bzhin 'khor lo yi //
translated: For what purpose?

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is said, All actions are the nature of the wheel.

original: bshad pa'i yi ge re re'i rgyu yang don sna tshogs pa rig ste /
analyzed: bshad pa'i yi ge re re'i rgyu yang don sna tshogs pa rig ste /
translated: Each of the explained syllables is also known to have various meanings.

original: don des rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo las thams cad byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don des rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo las thams cad byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By that meaning, it means all actions are performed by the wheel of yoginīs.

original: 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje phag mo'i rang gi rgyud yongs su spangs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje phag mo'i rang gi rgyud yongs su spangs pa'o //
translated: This is said and so forth rejects the tantra of Vajravārāhī herself.

original: lhag ma ni rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'di rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang po'o //
analyzed: 'di rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang po'o //
translated: This is the first wheel of the cakra of the root mantra of Vajravārāhī.

original: slar yang gnyis pa sbal pa mchod pas gsungs pa /
analyzed: slar yang gnyis pa sbal pa mchod pas gsungs pa /
translated: Again, the second is taught by the worship of the tortoise:

original: gnyis pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The second and so forth.

original: phag mo rdo rje gtso mo yi //
analyzed: phag mo rdo rje gtso mo yi //
translated: The chief of the vajra sows is the sow,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i sngags te rlung dang rnam par shes pa yang dag par sbyor ba las ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i sngags te rlung dang rnam par shes pa yang dag par sbyor ba las ye shes so //
translated: Vajra means indivisible mantra, and from the union of wind and consciousness, there is gnosis.

original: de'i gtso mo ni sngon du phag mo rtsa gsum gyi bu ga nas rdo rje gtso mo de'i 'khrul 'khor gnas ji lta ba las bskyed pa'i yi ge'i rigs pas 'khrul 'khor te de bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
analyzed: de'i gtso mo ni sngon du phag mo rtsa gsum gyi bu ga nas rdo rje gtso mo de'i 'khrul 'khor gnas ji lta ba las bskyed pa'i yi ge'i rigs pas 'khrul 'khor te de bshad par bya'o zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
translated: The chief of that is the sow, who is the chief of the three channels. The chief of the vajra sows is the chief of the vajra sows. The machine of that is the machine generated from the aperture of the three channels. The machine is the machine of the syllables. That should be explained.

original: yi ge btu ba gsungs pa /
analyzed: yi ge btu ba gsungs pa /
translated: The extraction of the syllables is stated:

original: ya sde'i mchog ces bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ya sde'i mchog ces bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The supreme of the ya class is the syllable va, which is the last of the ya class.

original: byang chub sa bon rang bzhin no //
analyzed: byang chub sa bon rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the seed of enlightenment

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar wa'i yi ge byang chub kyi sa bon gyi rang bzhin rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i me long gis gzugs brnyan rnam pa dang bcas pa'i ye shes sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa yang ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar wa'i yi ge byang chub kyi sa bon gyi rang bzhin rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i me long gis gzugs brnyan rnam pa dang bcas pa'i ye shes sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa yang ste /
translated: is the nature of the seed of enlightenment, the syllable va. The mirror of the meditation of the yogin is the various aspects of the gnosis with aspects.

original: rnal 'byor sgom pa aa wadh'u t'i la dmigs pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i sems rnam pa dang bcas pa nyid kyis zhugs pas sems can gyi don byed pa'i smon lam rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor sgom pa aa wadh'u t'i la dmigs pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i sems rnam pa dang bcas pa nyid kyis zhugs pas sems can gyi don byed pa'i smon lam rnams kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the yogī, having entered into the supreme unchanging mind with the aspect of the focus on the avadhūti meditation, makes the prayers for the benefit of sentient beings.

original: lce gnyis zhes bya ba ni dza'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: lce gnyis zhes bya ba ni dza'i yi ge'o //
translated: The “two-tongued” is the letter jha.

original: ra yig ldan zhes bya @56b ba ni ra'i yi ge dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ra yig ldan zhes bya @56b ba ni ra'i yi ge dang ldan pa'o //
translated: “Endowed with the letter ra” is endowed with the letter ra.

original: rnal 'byor ma sngags aa yig dgang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma sngags aa yig dgang //
translated: The yoginī’s mantra is filled with the letter a.

original: zhes bya ba ni aa'i rnam pa'i yi ges bkang ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni aa'i rnam pa'i yi ges bkang ba ste /
translated: The meaning is that it is filled with the letter a in the form of the letter jha.

original: mdor na dzra'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mdor na dzra'i yi ge'o //
translated: In brief, it is the letter jha.

original: don ci zhe na /
analyzed: don ci zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning?

original: rnal 'byor ma'i sngags zhes bya ba ste gang gi phyir rnal 'byor ma'i sngags zhes bya ba'i rnam pa'i gzugs dang sems kyang ngo //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i sngags zhes bya ba ste gang gi phyir rnal 'byor ma'i sngags zhes bya ba'i rnam pa'i gzugs dang sems kyang ngo //
translated: The so-called yoginī’s mantra is the form of the mind that is called the yoginī’s mantra.

original: sa gnas pa ni zhes bya ba ni sa'i yi ge dngos su brjod pa'i phyir gnas pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sa gnas pa ni zhes bya ba ni sa'i yi ge dngos su brjod pa'i phyir gnas pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Abiding in the stage” is called abiding because the letter of the stage is directly expressed.

original: mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba ni de ltar ye shes dang shes bya rnams gnyis su med pa nyid kyis g-yo ba med pas bskyed par bya zhes bya ba'o //🔽na yi yi ge ae dang ldan //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba ni de ltar ye shes dang shes bya rnams gnyis su med pa nyid kyis g-yo ba med pas bskyed par bya zhes bya ba'o // na yi yi ge ae dang ldan //
translated: “Unmoving” means that, in this way, by the non-duality of intuition and the knowable, there is no movement, and so it is said “to be generated. ”🔽The letter “na” is endowed with “e. ”

original: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge aa'i yi ge dang yongs su ldan pa ste mdor na ne'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge aa'i yi ge dang yongs su ldan pa ste mdor na ne'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter “na” is endowed with the letter “ai, ” and so in brief it is the letter “ne. ”

original: thams cad sprul pa'i rgyu mtshan no //
analyzed: thams cad sprul pa'i rgyu mtshan no //
translated: It is the sign of the emanation of all.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar yang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba la sems can thams cad kyi sprul pa nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyu mtshan du gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar yang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba la sems can thams cad kyi sprul pa nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyu mtshan du gsungs so //
translated: Thus, it is said that the sign of the emanation of all sentient beings is the non-dual union.

original: thog nas dbyangs ni thog ma'i mgon //
analyzed: thog nas dbyangs ni thog ma'i mgon //
translated: The “first sound” is the “lord of the beginning. ”

original: zhes bya ba ni thog ma'i dbyangs ni aa'i yi ge gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thog ma'i dbyangs ni aa'i yi ge gnas pa'o //
translated: The “first sound” is the letter “ai, ” which is the abode.

original: de yang thog ma'i yon tan mgon po zhes bya ba ste sems can yon tan gyi gzugs kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid sprul pa'i sku 'dzin pas so //
analyzed: de yang thog ma'i yon tan mgon po zhes bya ba ste sems can yon tan gyi gzugs kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid sprul pa'i sku 'dzin pas so //
translated: Moreover, it is the “lord of the beginning qualities, ” because it holds the emanation body, which is characterized by the store consciousness, the form of the qualities of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pa yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba'i don ni /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pa yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba'i don ni /
translated: The meaning of the word “protector” is as follows:

original: lce gnyis ai dbyangs mgo la reg / ces bya ba ni aa'i yi ge'i dbyangs kyis brgyan pa ste mdor na dza'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: lce gnyis ai dbyangs mgo la reg / ces bya ba ni aa'i yi ge'i dbyangs kyis brgyan pa ste mdor na dza'i yi ge'o //
translated: The two-tongued [letter] is adorned with the vowel [sign] of the i [sound] and is joined to the head [of the letter].🔽The meaning of the word “nature” is as follows:

original: sa gsum khams kyi rang bzhin no //🔽zhes bya ba ni sa gsum gyi sna tshogs pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sa gsum khams kyi rang bzhin no // zhes bya ba ni sa gsum gyi sna tshogs pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The three worlds are of the nature of the various elements.🔽The meaning of the word “victorious” is as follows:🔽The letter ta is endowed with the vowel [sign] of the a [sound].🔽The meaning of the word “below” is as follows:

original: gang gi phyir dza'i yi ges rgyal ba ste sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir dza'i yi ges rgyal ba ste sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The letter ta is endowed with the vowel [sign] of the a [sound].🔽The meaning of the word “nature” is as follows:🔽The letter ta is endowed with the vowel [sign] of the a [sound].🔽The meaning of the word “nature” is as follows:🔽The letter ta is endowed with the vowel [sign] of the a [sound].🔽The meaning of the word “nature” is as follows:🔽The letter ta is endowed with the vowel [sign] of the a [sound].🔽The meaning of the word “nature” is as follows:🔽The letter ta is endowed with the vowel [sign] of the a [sound].🔽The meaning of the word “nature” is as follows:

original: ta yi yi ge ae dang ldan //
analyzed: ta yi yi ge ae dang ldan //
translated: The letter ta is endowed with the vowel [sign] of the a [sound].🔽The meaning of the word “nature” is as follows:🔽The letter ta is endowed with the vowel [sign] of the a [sound].🔽The meaning of the word “nature” is as follows:

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge ae dang ldan pa ste mdor na ta'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge ae dang ldan pa ste mdor na ta'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter ta is endowed with the vowel [sign] of the a [sound].🔽The meaning of the word “nature” is as follows:🔽The letter ta is endowed with the vowel [sign] of the a [sound].🔽The meaning of the word “nature” is as follows:🔽The letter ta is endowed with the vowel [sign] of the a [sound].🔽The meaning of the word “nature” is as follows:

original: lte ba'i 'og tu gru gsum pa'i dbus su srog nges par phab nas lhan cig skyes pa'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: lte ba'i 'og tu gru gsum pa'i dbus su srog nges par phab nas lhan cig skyes pa'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The letter ta is endowed with the vowel [sign] of the a [sound].

original: lnga pa yi ni thog ma ste //
analyzed: lnga pa yi ni thog ma ste //
translated: The meaning of the word “nature” is as follows:🔽The letter ta is endowed with the vowel [sign] of the a [sound].

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar sngon du bshad pa'i te'i yi ge lnga pa'i sde tshan gyi thog ma ni ta'i sde tshan gyi'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar sngon du bshad pa'i te'i yi ge lnga pa'i sde tshan gyi thog ma ni ta'i sde tshan gyi'o //
translated: Thus, the first of the group of the five letters beginning with ta is the group of ta.🔽The reality of the yoginis

original: rnal 'byor ma yi de nyid dngos //🔽zhes bya ba ste //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi de nyid dngos // zhes bya ba ste //
translated: The reality of the yoginis.🔽🔽

original: rnal 'byor ma'i de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni aa wa dh'u t'i nas byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'bab pa'i dus rnams su 'chad pa med pa'i rgyun gyi ye shes @57a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni aa wa dh'u t'i nas byang chub kyi sems rab tu 'bab pa'i dus rnams su 'chad pa med pa'i rgyun gyi ye shes @57a * //
translated: The nature of the reality of the yoginis is the gnosis of the uninterrupted stream that arises at the time of the descent of the bodhicitta from the avadhuti.

original: shar bas gang cung zad rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis smra bar bya ba skyes pa'i rabs la sogs pa dge ba dang mi dge ba de thams cad rnal 'byor ma'i de kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba'i dbang gis shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: shar bas gang cung zad rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis smra bar bya ba skyes pa'i rabs la sogs pa dge ba dang mi dge ba de thams cad rnal 'byor ma'i de kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba'i dbang gis shes par bya ba'o //
translated: Whatever is to be spoken of by the yoginis, whether virtuous or nonvirtuous, such as the Jatakamala, is all to be known by the power of the application of the reality of the yoginis.

original: ya'i sde bzhir gnas pa'i sa bon //
analyzed: ya'i sde bzhir gnas pa'i sa bon //
translated: The seed syllable of the fourth of the ya group🔽.

original: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi bzhi pa'i sa bon wa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi bzhi pa'i sa bon wa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed syllable of the fourth of the ya group is the syllable va.🔽The nature of the chief of all

original: kun gyi gtso mo'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: kun gyi gtso mo'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the chief of all.🔽

original: zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi gtso mo'i rang bzhin ni rtsa'i sna tshogs pa'i ste aa wa dh'u t'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi gtso mo'i rang bzhin ni rtsa'i sna tshogs pa'i ste aa wa dh'u t'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the nature of the chief of all, of the various channels, the so-called avadhūtī.

original: brgyad pa'i sde yi thog sa bon //
analyzed: brgyad pa'i sde yi thog sa bon //
translated: The seed of the first of the eighth

original: zhes bya ba ni brgyad pa'i sde tshan gyi thog ma'i sa bon sa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni brgyad pa'i sde tshan gyi thog ma'i sa bon sa'i yi ge'o //
translated: is the seed of the first of the eighth group, the letter of the earth.

original: stong pa yis ni brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: stong pa yis ni brgyan pa ste //
translated: It is adorned with the void

original: zhes bya ba ni stong pas brgyan pa ni thig les te mdor na sam gi yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni stong pas brgyan pa ni thig les te mdor na sam gi yi ge'o //
translated: is adorned with the void, that is, with a drop, in brief, the letter sa.

original: khu ba'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: khu ba'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid //
translated: The nature of the semen

original: ces bya ba ni de ltar tshigs thams cad nas 'dzag pas khu ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni de ltar tshigs thams cad nas 'dzag pas khu ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: thus, since it drips from all the joints, it is of the nature of the semen.

original: gnyis par gnas pa'i thog ma ni //
analyzed: gnyis par gnas pa'i thog ma ni //
translated: The first of the second

original: zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ka'i sde tshan gyi thog ma ka'i yi ge'o //🔽keng rus thig le 'dzin pa yi //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ka'i sde tshan gyi thog ma ka'i yi ge'o // keng rus thig le 'dzin pa yi //
translated: is the first of the second group, the letter of the ka.🔽The skeleton holds the drop

original: zhes bya ba ni keng rus mngon par 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni keng rus mngon par 'dzin pa ste /
translated: is the holding of the skeleton.

original: thig le'i sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med par byas pa zhes bya ba'o //🔽ya sde'i gnyis pa'i sa bon ni //
analyzed: thig le'i sbyor bas zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med par byas pa zhes bya ba'o // ya sde'i gnyis pa'i sa bon ni //
translated: By the union of the drops, i.e., by the absence of intrinsic reality.🔽The seed of the second of the ya class

original: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni ra'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni ra'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed of the second of the ya class is the letter ra.

original: ai yi dbyangs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ai yi dbyangs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Endowed with the vowel i

original: zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ge dbyangs dang ldan pa ste mdor na ri'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ge dbyangs dang ldan pa ste mdor na ri'i yi ge'o //
translated: Endowed with the vowel i, in brief, the letter ri.

original: rdo rje snying gnas mgon po ste //
analyzed: rdo rje snying gnas mgon po ste //
translated: The lord in the vajra heart

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rdo rje'i lte ba dang mgrin pa dang snying ga'i 'dod chags chen po'i me'i rang bzhin du yongs su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rdo rje'i lte ba dang mgrin pa dang snying ga'i 'dod chags chen po'i me'i rang bzhin du yongs su gnas pa'o //
translated: The lord is situated in the nature of the fire of great passion in the centers of one's body, speech, and mind, i.e., in the navel, throat, and heart.

original: mgon po zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i dbang gis phung po dang khams la sogs pa thams cad du bde bas yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mgon po zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i dbang gis phung po dang khams la sogs pa thams cad du bde bas yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The lord is the one who completely protects all aggregates, elements, etc., by means of bliss, by the power of going and coming in the three wheels.

original: ta mtha' ae yi yi ges brgyan //
analyzed: ta mtha' ae yi yi ges brgyan //
translated: The last of the ta class, adorned with the letter e

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma na'i yi ge ste ae'i yi ges rna ba la brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma na'i yi ge ste ae'i yi ges rna ba la brgyan pa'o //
translated: The last letter of the Ta group, the letter Na, is adorned with the letter E of the ear.

original: mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
translated: In brief, the letter Na.

original: skye gnas la ni spras pa'o //
analyzed: skye gnas la ni spras pa'o //
translated: It is adorned with the places of birth.

original: zhes bya ba ni skye gnas rnams la spras pa ste rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi la ye shes kyis so /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni skye gnas rnams la spras pa ste rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi la ye shes kyis so /
translated: It is adorned with the places of birth, with the wisdom of the yoginis.

original: rnam par shes pa'i zag pa med pa la brgyan pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //🔽ta yig @57b nyi ma dang ni ldan //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i zag pa med pa la brgyan pa zhes bya bar dgongs so // ta yig @57b nyi ma dang ni ldan //
translated: It is adorned with the undefiled consciousness, is the idea.🔽The letter Ta is endowed with the sun.

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge la nyi ma ste ra'i yi ge dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge la nyi ma ste ra'i yi ge dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The letter Ta is endowed with the sun, the letter Ra.

original: mdor na tra'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mdor na tra'i yi ge'o //
translated: In brief, the letter Tra.

original: 'dzag pa yi ni rgyal po'o //
analyzed: 'dzag pa yi ni rgyal po'o //
translated: It is the king of the drips.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med par rgyal pa'i phyir byang chub sems kyi 'dzag pa rnams kyi zhes pa'o //🔽bha ni nyi ldan aa yig brgyan //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med par rgyal pa'i phyir byang chub sems kyi 'dzag pa rnams kyi zhes pa'o // bha ni nyi ldan aa yig brgyan //
translated: It is the king of the drips of bodhicitta, because it is victorious as nondual.🔽The letter Bha is endowed with the sun, adorned with the letter A.

original: zhes bya ba ni bha'i yi ge la nyi ma ste ra'i yi ge dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bha'i yi ge la nyi ma ste ra'i yi ge dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The letter Bha is endowed with the sun, the letter Ra,

original: aa'i yi ges brgyan zhes bya ba ni aa'i yi ges spras pa ste mdor na bhra'i yi ge'o //🔽lte ba'i thab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: aa'i yi ges brgyan zhes bya ba ni aa'i yi ges spras pa ste mdor na bhra'i yi ge'o // lte ba'i thab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: The ornamented with the letter A is the letter A, in brief, the letter BHRŪM.

original: zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i thab tu gnas pa ste sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bskyed pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i thab tu gnas pa ste sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bskyed pa nyid kyis so //
translated: It resides in the hearth of the navel means that it resides in the hearth of the navel, because it generates the form of diversity.

original: nga'i mtha' ma zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: nga'i mtha' ma zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma'i yi ge'o //
translated: The end of my means the letter at the end of the class of P.

original: gnad rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba ni rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams kyi mtshams su 'dzag pa'i dus su gnad kyi bde ba nyams su myong ba'i gzugs kyi ye shes dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gnad rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba ni rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis rnams kyi mtshams su 'dzag pa'i dus su gnad kyi bde ba nyams su myong ba'i gzugs kyi ye shes dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The nature of the vital points means that at the time of the emission at the juncture of the seventy-two thousand channels, the Bhagavān is endowed with the gnosis of the form of the experience of the bliss of the vital points, this is the thought.

original: ta mtha' zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma na'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ta mtha' zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma na'i yi ge'o //
translated: The end of TA means the letter NA at the end of the class of TA.

original: ai yi yi ges brgyan pa ste //
analyzed: ai yi yi ges brgyan pa ste //
translated: It is ornamented with the letter I

original: zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ges spras pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ges spras pa'o //
translated: means that it is adorned with the letter I.

original: 'gugs pa yi ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gugs pa yi ni rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature of the attractor🔽means that it is the nature of the attractor.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad pa'i las 'gugs pa'i rang bzhin mdor bsdus pa'i yi ge ni ni'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngon du bshad pa'i las 'gugs pa'i rang bzhin mdor bsdus pa'i yi ge ni ni'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter ni is the essence of the previously explained action of summoning, in brief.

original: bi shosha ni sngags tshig ste //
analyzed: bi shosha ni sngags tshig ste //
translated: Viśoṣaṇa is the mantra word.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar bi shosha ni'i sngags kyis tshig bzhi'i yi ge bzhi'i rang bzhin du mngon par brjod pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar bi shosha ni'i sngags kyis tshig bzhi'i yi ge bzhi'i rang bzhin du mngon par brjod pas so //
translated: Thus, by the mantra viśoṣaṇa, the four words are expressed as having the nature of the four letters.

original: dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin gyi //
analyzed: dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin gyi //
translated: The nature of the four joys

original: gter chen po yi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gter chen po yi rang bzhin no //
translated: is the nature of the great treasure.

original: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid kyi gter chen po'i sa bon te don chen po nyid pas nye bar dmigs pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽ra yig ao yi yi ges brgyan //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dga' ba bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid kyi gter chen po'i sa bon te don chen po nyid pas nye bar dmigs pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to // ra yig ao yi yi ges brgyan //
translated: The seed of the great treasure is the nature of the four joys themselves. The meaning is that it is free from the joy of the object of observation, since it has great meaning.🔽The letter ra is adorned with the letter o.

original: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge la ao'i yi ges brgyan pa ste mdor na ro'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge la ao'i yi ges brgyan pa ste mdor na ro'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter ra is adorned with the letter o. In brief, it is the letter ro.

original: rtsa drag po yi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rtsa drag po yi rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the fierce nāḍī.

original: zhes bya ba ni drag po'i rtsa'i rang bzhin du byang chub kyi sems dbus su ma bzung bar gyur pa rnam par shes pa rnam par 'phro ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni drag po'i rtsa'i rang bzhin du byang chub kyi sems dbus su ma bzung bar gyur pa rnam par shes pa rnam par 'phro ba'o //
translated: This is the consciousness that is scattered, when the bodhicitta is not held in the middle, in the nature of the rasanā.

original: sha yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni //
analyzed: sha yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni //
translated: The seed of the second of the flesh

original: zhes bya ba ni sha'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i sa bon sha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sha'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i sa bon sha'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the letter of the flesh, the seed of the second of the flesh group.

original: snying po yi ni gzugs su'o //
analyzed: snying po yi ni gzugs su'o //
translated: In the form of the essence

original: zhes bya ba ni snying po'i gzugs mda' lta bur sems byang chub tu 'gro ba zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni snying po'i gzugs mda' lta bur sems byang chub tu 'gro ba zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is the form of the essence, which is like an arrow, the mind going to enlightenment.

original: ni yig rang bzhin gyis bzung ba //🔽zhes bya ba ni ni'i yi @58a * //
analyzed: ni yig rang bzhin gyis bzung ba // zhes bya ba ni ni'i yi @58a * //
translated: Held by the nature of the letter ni

original: gi rang bzhin gyis bzung ba ste rang bzhin mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gi rang bzhin gyis bzung ba ste rang bzhin mngon par brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is held by the nature of the letter ni, because the nature is expressed.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i de nyid ngo bo //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i de nyid ngo bo //
translated: The reality of the yoginīs

original: zhes bya ba ni de yang rnal 'byor ma'i de kho na nyid rang nyid rgyun du 'char ba'i ye shes rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi bde ba la gnas pa n'a da'i gzugs des de ltar sems can rnams kyis dga' ba byed do //🔽ka yig ra yig ao yig ldan //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de yang rnal 'byor ma'i de kho na nyid rang nyid rgyun du 'char ba'i ye shes rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi bde ba la gnas pa n'a da'i gzugs des de ltar sems can rnams kyis dga' ba byed do // ka yig ra yig ao yig ldan //
translated: That is, the yoginīs’ bliss is the gnosis that is the reality of the yoginīs themselves, which arises continuously. The form of that bliss is the syllable kṣa.🔽The syllable kṣa is endowed with the syllable ka, the syllable ra, and the syllable o.

original: zhes bya ba ni ka'i yi ge dang ra'i yi ge dang ao'i yi ge yongs su sbyar bas yi ge gcig pa kro'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ka'i yi ge dang ra'i yi ge dang ao'i yi ge yongs su sbyar bas yi ge gcig pa kro'i yi ge'o //
translated: The syllable kṣa is the single syllable that is the combination of the syllable ka, the syllable ra, and the syllable o.

original: dbu ma brkyang ma ro rang bzhin //
analyzed: dbu ma brkyang ma ro rang bzhin //
translated: The syllable kṣa is the nature of the central channel, the rasanā, and the lalanā.

original: zhes bya ba ni aa wa dh'u t'i dang la la n'a dang ra sa n'a'i rang bzhin grong gsum la zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽ta pa'i bar nas gzung bar bya //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni aa wa dh'u t'i dang la la n'a dang ra sa n'a'i rang bzhin grong gsum la zhes bya ba'i don to // ta pa'i bar nas gzung bar bya //
translated: The syllable kṣa is the nature of the three towns, the avadhūti, the lalanā, and the rasanā.🔽The syllable kṣa is to be taken from between the syllables ta and pa.

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan dang pa'i sde tshan dag gi yi ge gang zhig dha'i yi ge gzung ba ste gzung bar bya'o //🔽rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyi ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan dang pa'i sde tshan dag gi yi ge gang zhig dha'i yi ge gzung ba ste gzung bar bya'o // rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs kyi ni //
translated: The syllable kṣa is to be taken, that is, is to be grasped, from between the syllables of the ta class and the pa class.

original: rkang pa brgyad pa sgrub rang bzhin //
analyzed: rkang pa brgyad pa sgrub rang bzhin //
translated: The syllable kṣa is the nature of the accomplishment of the assembly of yoginīs.🔽The syllable kṣa is the nature of the accomplishment of the assembly of yoginīs.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis las brgyad rnams kyis lhan cig pa nyid kyi tshigs rnams su yang las brgya rnams rtsa'i gzugs rnams su sgrub par byed do //🔽ta sde'i mtha' ma ai yig brgyan //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis las brgyad rnams kyis lhan cig pa nyid kyi tshigs rnams su yang las brgya rnams rtsa'i gzugs rnams su sgrub par byed do // ta sde'i mtha' ma ai yig brgyan //
translated: Thus, by the eight actions of the yoginis' assembly, the eight actions are accomplished in the form of the channels in the body.🔽The last of the ta group is adorned with the vowel i.

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni na'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni na'i yi ge'o //
translated: The last of the ta group is the letter ni.

original: ai yi yi ges brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: ai yi yi ges brgyan pa ste /
translated: Adorned with the vowel i,

original: mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
translated: in brief, the letter ni.

original: thod pa'i dbus kyi rtsa rang bzhin /
analyzed: thod pa'i dbus kyi rtsa rang bzhin /
translated: The nature of the channel in the middle of the skull.

original: zhes bya ba ni thod pa'i ga pur byang chub kyi sems kyi dbus su rtsa'i gzugs kyi bde ba 'bab pa 'di ni ye shes kyi rtsa zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽ka ru mngon brjod gzung bar bya //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thod pa'i ga pur byang chub kyi sems kyi dbus su rtsa'i gzugs kyi bde ba 'bab pa 'di ni ye shes kyi rtsa zhes bya ba'i don to // ka ru mngon brjod gzung bar bya //
translated: In the middle of the skull-garland bodhicitta, the descent of bliss in the form of a channel is called the wisdom channel.🔽The kara should be taken as the expression.

original: zhes bya ba ni ka'i yi ge'i rang bzhin mngon par brjod pas gzung pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ka'i yi ge'i rang bzhin mngon par brjod pas gzung pa'o //
translated: The kara should be taken as the expression of the nature of the ka group.

original: de yi las rnams zad par byed //
analyzed: de yi las rnams zad par byed //
translated: It destroys all of its actions.

original: ces bya ba ni ka'i yi ge de yang gti mug la sogs pa'i las thams cad zad pa'i rnam par shes par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni ka'i yi ge de yang gti mug la sogs pa'i las thams cad zad pa'i rnam par shes par rig par bya'o //
translated: This is the letter ka, which should be known as the consciousness of the exhaustion of all actions such as delusion and so forth.

original: ra yig aa yi yi ges gzung //
analyzed: ra yig aa yi yi ges gzung //
translated: The letter ra is taken by the letter a.

original: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge aa'i yi ge des gzung ba ste mdor na gnyis po las r'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge aa'i yi ge des gzung ba ste mdor na gnyis po las r'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the letter ra, which is taken by the letter a. In brief, from the two, the letter ra.

original: mgo bo'i dbus zhes bya ba ni mgo bo'i dbus nas so //
analyzed: mgo bo'i dbus zhes bya ba ni mgo bo'i dbus nas so //
translated: In the middle of the head means from the middle of the head.

original: n'a da chen po 'dzag ces bya ba ni sgra chen po thos par 'gyur te rnal 'byor ma dang yongs su sbyor bas dang byang chub kyi sems rnam par gzung bas so //
analyzed: n'a da chen po 'dzag ces bya ba ni sgra chen po thos par 'gyur te rnal 'byor ma dang yongs su sbyor bas dang byang chub kyi sems rnam par gzung bas so //
translated: The great nāḍī drips means a great sound is heard, due to union with the yoginī and the retention of bodhicitta.

original: sa gzhi'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni la'i yi ge'i sa bon no //
analyzed: sa gzhi'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni la'i yi ge'i sa bon no //
translated: The seed of the earth means the seed of the letter la.

original: ai yig ldan zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste gnyis @58b las li'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ai yig ldan zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste gnyis @58b las li'i yi ge'o //
translated: Endowed with the letter i means endowed with the letter i. From the two, the letter li.

original: gru gsum gyi ni dbus su'o //
analyzed: gru gsum gyi ni dbus su'o //
translated: In the middle of the triangle.

original: zhes bya ba ni gru gsum gyi dbus te lte ba'i 'og tu bskyed pa rlung dang rnam par shas pa 'dzin pa mo'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gru gsum gyi dbus te lte ba'i 'og tu bskyed pa rlung dang rnam par shas pa 'dzin pa mo'o //
translated: This is the generation in the middle of the triangle, below the navel, of the wind and consciousness that hold the female.

original: ta'i mtha' ma zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ni na'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ta'i mtha' ma zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ni na'i yi ge'o //
translated: The end of ta is the letter ni, the end of the class of ta.

original: ais brgyan pa /
analyzed: ais brgyan pa /
translated: It is adorned with ai.

original: sprul pa'i steng dang 'og tu'o //
analyzed: sprul pa'i steng dang 'og tu'o //
translated: Above and below the snake.

original: zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ges brgyan pa ste mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ges brgyan pa ste mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is adorned with the letter ai, in brief the letter ni.

original: de yang sprul pa'i lte ba'i 'og dang steng du lhag ma ma lus pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa mo lte ba'i yi ges bskyed pa'o //🔽ta yig ra yig a'a yig sbyar //
analyzed: de yang sprul pa'i lte ba'i 'og dang steng du lhag ma ma lus pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa mo lte ba'i yi ges bskyed pa'o // ta yig ra yig a'a yig sbyar //
translated: Moreover, above and below the navel of the snake, it is generated by the navel letter, the destroyer of all remaining conceptual thoughts.🔽The letter ta, the letter ra, and the letter a are combined.

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge dang ra'i yi ge dang a'a'i yi ge rnams yongs su sbyar bas tr'a'i yi ger 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge dang ra'i yi ge dang a'a'i yi ge rnams yongs su sbyar bas tr'a'i yi ger 'gyur ro //
translated: The letter ta, the letter ra, and the letter a are combined to form the letter tra.

original: chos kyi dbyings ni gru gsum ste //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings ni gru gsum ste //
translated: The triangle is the realm of phenomena.

original: de'i phyir sa gsum bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sa gsum bskyed pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it generates the three worlds.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar tr'a'i yi ge gru gsum gyi bdag nyid can chos kyi dbyings rnams su yang ste khams gsum gyi sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar tr'a'i yi ge gru gsum gyi bdag nyid can chos kyi dbyings rnams su yang ste khams gsum gyi sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the syllable tar, which has the nature of the triangle, is in the dharmadhatus, that is, in the beings of the three realms, and is generated by the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: gru gsum sku yang ngo //
analyzed: gru gsum sku yang ngo //
translated: The triangle is also the body.

original: sa gsum dbu ma bcas sa bon //
analyzed: sa gsum dbu ma bcas sa bon //
translated: The seed of the three stages with the central stage.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa'i yi ge gzung bas khu ba dang lhan cig aa wa dh'u t'i'i rtsar dus thams cad du 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa'i yi ge gzung bas khu ba dang lhan cig aa wa dh'u t'i'i rtsar dus thams cad du 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: The syllable of the earth, which is the sa, is held, and always falls into the avadhuti channel together with the semen.

original: na yig ai dang ldan rang bzhin //
analyzed: na yig ai dang ldan rang bzhin //
translated: The syllable na, endowed with i, is the nature.

original: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge ai'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na na'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge ai'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na na'i yi ge'o //
translated: The syllable na is endowed with the syllable i, that is, in brief, the syllable na.

original: de yang ye shes kyi rang bzhin te ye shes kyang sprul pa'i sku la sems can rnams la rang gi sems rab tu shes so //🔽pa sde'i mtha' ma aa yis brgyan //
analyzed: de yang ye shes kyi rang bzhin te ye shes kyang sprul pa'i sku la sems can rnams la rang gi sems rab tu shes so // pa sde'i mtha' ma aa yis brgyan //
translated: That is also the nature of gnosis, and gnosis is the emanation body, which knows the minds of sentient beings.🔽The last of the pa group is adorned with a.

original: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni ma'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni ma'i yi ge'o //
translated: The last of the pa group is the syllable ma.

original: aa yi yi ges klubs pas gnyis po las m'a'i yi ger 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aa yi yi ges klubs pas gnyis po las m'a'i yi ger 'gyur ro //
translated: The letter Ma is formed from the two, covered by the letter A.

original: sgyu ma'i ngo bo'i padma'i rtsa //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i ngo bo'i padma'i rtsa //
translated: The lotus channel of the nature of illusion

original: zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis rtsa'i padma ste sna tshogs pas rab tu gsal ba'i mtshan nyid rnams nyin mo dang mtshan mo la sogs par ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyis rtsa'i padma ste sna tshogs pas rab tu gsal ba'i mtshan nyid rnams nyin mo dang mtshan mo la sogs par ye shes kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The lotus channel is of the nature of illusion, and is characterized by the various clear appearances of the day and night, and so on. The meaning is that it is the nature of wisdom.

original: gnyis gang gnas pa rna rang bzhin //
analyzed: gnyis gang gnas pa rna rang bzhin //
translated: The two abiding in the nature of the ear

original: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge gang du gnas pa ste rna ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni rna ba'i rang bzhin gyi rtsa dang lha'i sgra thos pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge gang du gnas pa ste rna ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni rna ba'i rang bzhin gyi rtsa dang lha'i sgra thos pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The letter Ra abides in the two, and the nature of the ear is the nature of the ear channel, and the meaning is that it hears the sounds of the gods.

original: ta sde'i mtha' ma yi sa bon //
analyzed: ta sde'i mtha' ma yi sa bon //
translated: The seed of the last of the Ta🔽group

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma'i sa bon na'i yi ge'o //🔽ai dang ldan zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ge dang ldan pa @59a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma'i sa bon na'i yi ge'o // ai dang ldan zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ge dang ldan pa @59a * //
translated: The seed of the last of the Ta group is the letter Na.🔽Endowed with I

original: ste mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ste mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
translated: means endowed with the letter I, and in brief, the letter Ni.🔽The mind of all sentient beings

original: ma lus dbyer med sems can gyi //
analyzed: ma lus dbyer med sems can gyi //
translated: is indivisible from the mind of all buddhas.

original: khams 'dzin pa yi mgon po'o //
analyzed: khams 'dzin pa yi mgon po'o //
translated: The lord who holds the realm of beings.

original: zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa dbyer med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dzin par 'gyur ba yang dag pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir rang gi bdag nyid dang 'dra ba zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ma lus pa dbyer med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dzin par 'gyur ba yang dag pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir rang gi bdag nyid dang 'dra ba zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that he is the lord who holds the realm of beings, which is indivisible and complete, in order to attain perfect enlightenment, which is like his own nature.

original: de'i phyir mgon po ste dbyer med pa'i gzugs nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽de ltar sngags tshig bcu brjod de //
analyzed: de'i phyir mgon po ste dbyer med pa'i gzugs nyid kyi phyir ro // de ltar sngags tshig bcu brjod de //
translated: Therefore, he is the lord, because he is the indivisible form itself.🔽Thus, the ten-syllable mantra is recited.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar sngags kyi tshig rkang pa bcu rnams bshad de //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar sngags kyi tshig rkang pa bcu rnams bshad de //
translated: Thus, the ten-syllable mantra is explained.

original: badzr'a sa ni /
analyzed: badzr'a sa ni /
translated: Vajrasattva,

original: aa dzi te /
analyzed: aa dzi te /
translated: Ajita,

original: ba shyam ka ri /
analyzed: ba shyam ka ri /
translated: Vasyaṃkari,

original: ne tra bhr'a ma ni bi sha ni /
analyzed: ne tra bhr'a ma ni bi sha ni /
translated: Netra-bhrama-viniścana,

original: shosha ni / ro sha ni /
analyzed: shosha ni / ro sha ni /
translated: Śoṣaṇi, Roṣaṇi,

original: kro sha ni /
analyzed: kro sha ni /
translated: Krośaṇi,

original: kro dha ka r'a yi ni /
analyzed: kro dha ka r'a yi ni /
translated: Krodha-kārayiṇi,

original: tr'a sa ni /
analyzed: tr'a sa ni /
translated: Trāsani,

original: m'a ra ni /
analyzed: m'a ra ni /
translated: Māraṇi,

original: zhes bya ba ste tshig bcu'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste tshig bcu'o //
translated: are the ten syllables.

original: dus tshod bzhi yi tshad can no //
analyzed: dus tshod bzhi yi tshad can no //
translated: It has the measure of four times.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar sngags kyi tshig kyang dus bzhi'i tshad de rnams rim pa ji lta bas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar sngags kyi tshig kyang dus bzhi'i tshad de rnams rim pa ji lta bas so //
translated: Thus, the ten-syllable mantra has the measure of four times, in that order.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?🔽It is said:

original: gsungs pa / rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi rkang ba bzhi'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / rdzogs ldan gyi dus kyi rkang ba bzhi'o //
translated: The four lines of the Satyayuga.

original: gsum ldan tshig gsum mo //
analyzed: gsum ldan tshig gsum mo //
translated: Three lines in the Tretāyuga.

original: gnyis ldan gnyis so //
analyzed: gnyis ldan gnyis so //
translated: Two lines in the Dvāparayuga.🔽One line in the Kaliyuga.

original: rtsod dus su rkang pa gcig ces bya ba ni tshad do //
analyzed: rtsod dus su rkang pa gcig ces bya ba ni tshad do //
translated: This is the measure.

original: 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa sdud pa mo rang gi skyon yongs su spangs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa sdud pa mo rang gi skyon yongs su spangs pa'o //
translated: This is said and so on refers to the exclusion of one's own faults.

original: lha zhes bya ba ni shin tu lha ste /
analyzed: lha zhes bya ba ni shin tu lha ste /
translated: The god is the supreme god.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: dus tshod kyi gzugs kyi rang bzhin //
analyzed: dus tshod kyi gzugs kyi rang bzhin //
translated: The nature of the form of the time.

original: zhes bya ba ste 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dus tshod rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dus tshod rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the times that will be explained.

original: dang po'i lha dang 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
analyzed: dang po'i lha dang 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
translated: The first god is the cakravartin.

original: kun zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams sam dum bu rnams su rnal 'byor ma'i las kyi longs spyod byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kun zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams sam dum bu rnams su rnal 'byor ma'i las kyi longs spyod byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: All refers to the twelve wheels or parts in which the yoginīs engage in the enjoyment of action.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs kyi yi ge'i rigs pas sems can rnams kyi las byed pa bo'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs kyi yi ge'i rigs pas sems can rnams kyi las byed pa bo'o //
translated: The yoginīs' forms are the letters that perform the actions of sentient beings.

original: 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis rnams su'o //🔽gnas dang 'du bar mkha' 'gro ma'i //
analyzed: 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis rnams su'o // gnas dang 'du bar mkha' 'gro ma'i //
translated: The “wheel” is the twelve.🔽The ḍākinīs’ places and meeting places

original: zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i las kyis gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i las kyis gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pas so //
translated: are the places and secondary places, etc. , as will be explained.

original: las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni khri phrag gnyis dang brgya phrag bcu drug go //
analyzed: las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni khri phrag gnyis dang brgya phrag bcu drug go //
translated: “ Action” and so forth means two hundred thousand and sixteen hundred.

original: de ye shes kyi dus kyi rig pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de ye shes kyi dus kyi rig pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: That is the cause of the knowledge of the time.

original: des zhi ba la sogs pa'i las byed bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
analyzed: des zhi ba la sogs pa'i las byed bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar 'brel lo //
translated: By that, one will perform the actions of pacification, etc.

original: de yang dus rdul phran grangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de yang dus rdul phran grangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: That is also the time of the particles, etc.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i sngags kyi ming gis yi ge rnams kyi ming ngo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i sngags kyi ming gis yi ge rnams kyi ming ngo //
translated: The names of the letters are the various mantra names of all sentient beings.

original: des yi ge'i dus rnams su yang bya'o //
analyzed: des yi ge'i dus rnams su yang bya'o //
translated: By that, the times of the letters are also to be done.

original: @59b sngags sbyar zhes bya ba ni yi ge so so la phag mo'i sngags brjod par bya'o /
analyzed: @59b sngags sbyar zhes bya ba ni yi ge so so la phag mo'i sngags brjod par bya'o /
translated: “ Mantra application” means that the mantra of Vārāhī is to be recited for each letter.

original: ; lhag ma rtogs sla'o //
analyzed: ; lhag ma rtogs sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'di ni 'khor lo gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'khor lo gnyis pa'o //
translated: This is the second wheel.

original: da ni de'i phyi rol du gsum pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni de'i phyi rol du gsum pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: Now, after that, it is stated from the perspective of the third [syllable].

original: sngon du pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sngon du pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares, “First, the syllable pa,” and so on.

original: sngon du pa la ra bstan no //
analyzed: sngon du pa la ra bstan no //
translated: First, the syllable pa is taught.

original: zhes bya ba ni thog mar pa'i yi ge la ra'i yi ge sbyar te mdor na bra'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thog mar pa'i yi ge la ra'i yi ge sbyar te mdor na bra'i yi ge'o //
translated: “In brief, the syllable bha” means that the syllable pa is combined with the syllable ra, and in brief, the syllable bha.

original: thog ma yi ni chos gzugs so //
analyzed: thog ma yi ni chos gzugs so //
translated: “The form of the dharma is first.”

original: zhes bya ba ni thog mar chos kyi gzugs kyis 'khor lo la ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thog mar chos kyi gzugs kyis 'khor lo la ste /
translated: The form of the dharma is first in the wheel,

original: sems can rnams kyi thog ma'i las la yang ngo //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi thog ma'i las la yang ngo //
translated: and also in the first action of sentient beings.

original: de yi bzhi par gnas pa la //
analyzed: de yi bzhi par gnas pa la //
translated: “The fourth of that,”

original: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi bzhi par bha'i yi ge gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi bzhi par bha'i yi ge gnas pa'o //
translated: the fourth of the class of pa is the syllable bha.

original: ae yi yi ges rnar brgyan pa //
analyzed: ae yi yi ges rnar brgyan pa //
translated: “Adorned with the syllable ai,

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sngags so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sngags so //
translated: the mantra of the yoginīs.”

original: zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ges brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ges brgyan pa ste /
translated: Adorned with the syllable ai,

original: mdor na bhe'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mdor na bhe'i yi ge'o //
translated: in brief, the syllable bhe.

original: rnal 'byor ma'i sngags kyi sa bon las thams cad sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i sngags kyi sa bon las thams cad sgrub pa'o //
translated: From the seed of the mantra of the yoginīs, everything is accomplished.

original: ta sde'i dbus nas zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi dbus ma ni nga'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ta sde'i dbus nas zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi dbus ma ni nga'i yi ge'o //
translated: The “middle of the ta group” is the letter ṇ, which is in the middle of the ta group.

original: ci 'dod ster zhes bya ni ji ltar bsams pa'i don ster ba'o //🔽na yig ai yi yi ge ldan //
analyzed: ci 'dod ster zhes bya ni ji ltar bsams pa'i don ster ba'o // na yig ai yi yi ge ldan //
translated: “Granting whatever is desired” is granting the object of thought.🔽The letter na is endowed with the letter i.

original: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge ai'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge ai'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The letter na is endowed with the letter i,

original: mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
translated: in brief, the letter ṇ.

original: sna tshogs sprul pa byed pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs sprul pa byed pa'o //
translated: It creates emanations of various kinds.

original: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum du sprul pa byed pa'o //🔽pa yig spros pa dang bcas pa //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum du sprul pa byed pa'o // pa yig spros pa dang bcas pa //
translated: It creates emanations of various kinds in the three worlds.🔽The letter pa is with elaboration.

original: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi thog ma pa'i yi ge ni mngon sum du ste spros pa dang bcas pa'o //🔽ra yi yi ge a'a dang ldan //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi thog ma pa'i yi ge ni mngon sum du ste spros pa dang bcas pa'o // ra yi yi ge a'a dang ldan //
translated: The first letter of the pa group, the letter p, is manifest, with elaboration.🔽The letter ra is endowed with the letter ā.

original: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge la a'a'i yi ges chen por song ba ste mdor na r'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge la a'a'i yi ges chen por song ba ste mdor na r'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter ra is endowed with the letter ā, which is great, in brief, the letter ṛ.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor los sgyur //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor los sgyur //
translated: It is the universal monarch of yoginīs.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar r'a'i yi ge 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ste bde ba chen po'i dus zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar r'a'i yi ge 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ste bde ba chen po'i dus zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, the letter Ra is the king who turns the wheel, the time of great bliss.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi rtsa yang ngo //🔽tsa sde'i dbus gnas sa bon gzung //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi rtsa yang ngo // tsa sde'i dbus gnas sa bon gzung //
translated: The channel of the yoginis.🔽The seed in the middle of the Ca class should be taken.

original: zhes bya ba ni tsa'i sde tshan gyi dbus ma'i sa bon dza'i yi ge gzung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tsa'i sde tshan gyi dbus ma'i sa bon dza'i yi ge gzung ba'o //
translated: The seed in the middle of the Ca class is the letter Ja.

original: gang lta de lta'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gang lta de lta'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature is just like that.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba gsum gyi gzugs lus la sogs pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //🔽rlung bsags pa ni zhes bya ba ni rlung ni ya'i yi ge ste bsags pa ni ae dang ldan pa ste ae'i yi ge dang lhan cig ldan pa'o //🔽mdor na ya'i yi ge'o //🔽aa ham yi @60a * //🔽ge'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba gsum gyi gzugs lus la sogs pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no // rlung bsags pa ni zhes bya ba ni rlung ni ya'i yi ge ste bsags pa ni ae dang ldan pa ste ae'i yi ge dang lhan cig ldan pa'o // mdor na ya'i yi ge'o // aa ham yi @60a * // ge'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the body, etc. of the three worlds is great bliss.

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes aa ham gi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi chos zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽ya yi sde yi mtha' ma la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes aa ham gi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi chos zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽ya yi sde yi mtha' ma la //
