translated: The wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation is the letter E, the wind is the letter Ya, the accumulation

original: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni wa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni wa'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the letter Va, the last of the Ya class.

original: dbyangs kyi gsum pas mgo la brgyan //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi gsum pas mgo la brgyan //
translated: Adorned on the head with the third vowel.

original: zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'i yi ge ai'i yi ge des mgo la brgyan pa ste mdor na wi'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsum pa'i yi ge ai'i yi ge des mgo la brgyan pa ste mdor na wi'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the letter Ai, the third vowel, which adorns the head. In brief, it is the letter Vi.

original: sna tshogs ye shes sngags rang bzhin //
analyzed: sna tshogs ye shes sngags rang bzhin //
translated: The nature of the mantra of the knowledge of variety.

original: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i sngags ye shes kyi rang bzhin rnam par zhu ba'i rnam pa byang chub kyi sems ye shes kyi khu ba zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs pa'i sngags ye shes kyi rang bzhin rnam par zhu ba'i rnam pa byang chub kyi sems ye shes kyi khu ba zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The nature of the mantra of the knowledge of variety is the form of the melted bodhicitta, the juice of knowledge, is the intention.

original: dza'i sa bon ni dza'i yi ge'i sa bon no //
analyzed: dza'i sa bon ni dza'i yi ge'i sa bon no //
translated: The seed of Ja is the seed of the letter Ja.

original: mtha' med 'bar bar gyur pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: mtha' med 'bar bar gyur pa'i gzugs //
translated: The form of the endless blazing.

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes sgron ma'i rnam pa mtha' med pa'i gzugs sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku'o //🔽yi ge ya ni ae yig ldan //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes sgron ma'i rnam pa mtha' med pa'i gzugs sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku'o // yi ge ya ni ae yig ldan //
translated: The form of the endless light of knowledge is the emanation body of the buddhas.🔽The letter Ya is endowed with the letter E.

original: zhes bya ba ni ya'i yi ge la ae'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na ye'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ya'i yi ge la ae'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na ye'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter Ya is endowed with the letter E. In brief, it is the letter Ye.

original: theg pa kun gyi dpe yi gzugs //
analyzed: theg pa kun gyi dpe yi gzugs //
translated: The form of the example of all vehicles.

original: zhes bya ba ni theg pa thams cad kyi dpe'i gzugs te nyan thos la sogs par mngon par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni theg pa thams cad kyi dpe'i gzugs te nyan thos la sogs par mngon par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This is the form of the example of all vehicles, which should be applied to the śrāvakas and so on.

original: de la gang rnams nyan thos kyi chos de rnams sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa bden pa ma yin brdzun pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la gang rnams nyan thos kyi chos de rnams sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa bden pa ma yin brdzun pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Among them, those dharmas of the śrāvakas are like an illusion, like a dream, and so on, which are neither true nor false.

original: tsa sde'i gsum pa'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni tsa'i sde tshan gyi gsum pa'i sa bon dza'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: tsa sde'i gsum pa'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni tsa'i sde tshan gyi gsum pa'i sa bon dza'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed of the third of the ca group is the letter ja, the seed of the third of the ca group.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs shes bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs shes bya //
translated: It is called the form of the yoginī.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma byang chub kyi gzugs dang ye shes kyis kyang stong pa la sogs pa'i brtags pa'i ye shes ma yin pa nyams su myong ba nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i gzugs su 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma byang chub kyi gzugs dang ye shes kyis kyang stong pa la sogs pa'i brtags pa'i ye shes ma yin pa nyams su myong ba nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i gzugs su 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one asks, “Is it not the case that the form of the yoginī, the form of enlightenment, and the wisdom of emptiness and so on become formless because of the experience of the wisdom of imagination?”

original: mi bden pa'i bden pa nyid med do //
analyzed: mi bden pa'i bden pa nyid med do //
translated: The truth of unreality does not exist.

original: de yod pa nyid ni byis pa rnams kyis yongs su brtags pa'o //
analyzed: de yod pa nyid ni byis pa rnams kyis yongs su brtags pa'o //
translated: Its existence is imagined by fools.

original: de'i gsal ba rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs ye shes dang shes bya la sogs pas mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gsal ba rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs ye shes dang shes bya la sogs pas mtshon pa'o //
translated: Its clarity is the form of the Yoginī, illustrated by intuition and the knowable, etc.

original: de yang sgyu ma dang rmi lam bden par smra ba rnams kyis bstan pa'i stobs kyis bsgrubs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba byang chub kyi gzugs grub pa'o //
analyzed: de yang sgyu ma dang rmi lam bden par smra ba rnams kyis bstan pa'i stobs kyis bsgrubs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba byang chub kyi gzugs grub pa'o //
translated: Moreover, that is established by the power of the teaching of those who speak of the truth of illusion and dream, and is the accomplishment of the form of enlightenment which follows the intention of the Lord.

original: pa mtha' de yi bzhi pa la'o //
analyzed: pa mtha' de yi bzhi pa la'o //
translated: The fourth of that, at the end of pa.

original: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge ste de nyid kyi bzhi pa'i stan ni ma bha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge ste de nyid kyi bzhi pa'i stan ni ma bha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The last of the pa group is the letter ma, and the fourth of that is the letter bha.

original: mdor na mbha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mdor na mbha'i yi ge'o //
translated: In brief, it is the letter m-b-h-a.

original: sngags @60b thams cad kyi bla ma'o //
analyzed: sngags @60b thams cad kyi bla ma'o //
translated: It is the supreme of all mantras.

original: zhes bya ba ni sngags thams cad kyi bla ma nyams su myong ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sngags thams cad kyi bla ma nyams su myong ba nyid kyis so //
translated: This is because it is the supreme of all mantras, due to its experience.

original: ta sde'i mtha' ma dbyangs gsum ldan //
analyzed: ta sde'i mtha' ma dbyangs gsum ldan //
translated: The last of the ta group, endowed with the third vowel.

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni na'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni na'i yi ge'o //
translated: The last of the ta group is the letter na.

original: gsum pa'i yi ge ni ai'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste gnyis pos ni'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: gsum pa'i yi ge ni ai'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste gnyis pos ni'i yi ge'o //
translated: Endowed with the third vowel, the letter i, the two together are the letter ni.

original: ma lus sems can 'bod pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: ma lus sems can 'bod pa'i gzugs //
translated: The form of the one who calls out all sentient beings.

original: zhes bya ba ni lus pa med pa 'bod pa'i gzugs te sems can rnams byang chub la 'dzud par byed pa dang mya ngan las 'da' bar byed du 'dzud pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lus pa med pa 'bod pa'i gzugs te sems can rnams byang chub la 'dzud par byed pa dang mya ngan las 'da' bar byed du 'dzud pa'o //
translated: This is the form of the one who calls out without remainder, who causes sentient beings to enter into enlightenment and to enter into nirvana.🔽The third of the warm,

original: dro ba'i gsum pa zhes bya ba ni dro ba'i gsum pa sa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: dro ba'i gsum pa zhes bya ba ni dro ba'i gsum pa sa'i yi ge'o //
translated: the third of the warm is the letter Ṣ.🔽The seat of the ta,

original: ta stan ldan zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge'i stan te mdor na sta'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ta stan ldan zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge'i stan te mdor na sta'i yi ge'o //
translated: the seat of the letter Ta, in brief, is the letter Ṣ.

original: 'gro dang mi 'gro bcas 'gro sgrol //
analyzed: 'gro dang mi 'gro bcas 'gro sgrol //
translated: The going and non-going are liberated.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir phyi rol pa rnams kyis 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'i 'jig rten pa rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las so //🔽de bzhin mbha'i yi ge gzung //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir phyi rol pa rnams kyis 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'i 'jig rten pa rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las so // de bzhin mbha'i yi ge gzung //
translated: The going and non-going worlds of the outsiders are liberated from the ocean of samsara in order to be liberated.🔽Likewise, the letter Mbh should be taken.

original: zhes bya ba ni mbha'i yi ge rang de ltar gzung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mbha'i yi ge rang de ltar gzung ba'o //
translated: The letter Mbh should be taken just like that.

original: sa ni bcu bzhi pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: sa ni bcu bzhi pa'i gzugs so //
translated: The earth is the fourteenth form.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa bcu pa'i gzugs chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid kyis sems can rnams byang chub kyi skyed pa po zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa bcu pa'i gzugs chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid kyis sems can rnams byang chub kyi skyed pa po zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is the intention: the form of the tenth stage, by means of the nature of the Dharma Body, is the generator of the enlightenment of sentient beings.

original: sngags ni na'i yi ge'i sngags so //
analyzed: sngags ni na'i yi ge'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is the mantra of the letter ṇ.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi /
translated: The yoginīs

original: brda yis su ni 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: brda yis su ni 'jug pa'o //
translated: enter by means of the symbolic language.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi brda'i ye shes sprul pas zhugs pa khyod kyi ste thig le'i gzugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi brda'i ye shes sprul pas zhugs pa khyod kyi ste thig le'i gzugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning: you, who have entered by means of the knowledge of the symbolic language of the yoginīs, the form of the drop.

original: pa sde'i mtha' ma ao yig reg / ces bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i ye ge'o //
analyzed: pa sde'i mtha' ma ao yig reg / ces bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i ye ge'o //
translated: The last of the pa group is the letter ō, touched by the letter a.

original: ao'i yi ges cod pan reg pa ste mdor na mo'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ao'i yi ges cod pan reg pa ste mdor na mo'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter ō is touched by the letter a, in brief, the letter ṃ.

original: sna tshogs ye shes 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs ye shes 'dzin pa'o //
translated: It is the bearer of the knowledge of the variety.

original: zhes bya ba ni gti mug gi ye shes te sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi de 'dzin pa dang 'gro ba po dag gti mug gi mun nag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gti mug gi ye shes te sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi de 'dzin pa dang 'gro ba po dag gti mug gi mun nag go //
translated: This is the knowledge of delusion, which is the bearer of the world of the variety, and the bearer of the delusion of the darkness of the world.

original: sa mtha' ha yi yi ge'o //
analyzed: sa mtha' ha yi yi ge'o //
translated: The last of the letters is the letter ha.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: the nature of Vajrasattva.

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems zhu ba rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste ye shes kyi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems zhu ba rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste ye shes kyi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the melting of the thought of awakening, the nature of Vajrasattva, the meaning of the nectar of intuition.

original: na'i yi ge ni na'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: na'i yi ge ni na'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter ṇ is the letter ṇ.

original: chos dang chos min sun 'byin pa'o //
analyzed: chos dang chos min sun 'byin pa'o //
translated: It is the refutation of virtue and nonvirtue.

original: zhes bya ba ni chos de sbyin pa la sogs pa dang chos ma yin pa brdzun la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos de sbyin pa la sogs pa dang chos ma yin pa brdzun la sogs pa ste /
translated: This is the refutation of virtue such as generosity and nonvirtue such as lying.

original: de rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa brten par mi @61a * //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa brten par mi @61a * //
translated: It does not allow the complete conceptualization of those to stand.

original: byed pa'o // ya sde'i mtha' ma ni zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: byed pa'o // ya sde'i mtha' ma ni zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The last of the ya group is the letter va, the last of the ya group.

original: rnal 'byor ma ste nam mkha'i gzugs //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ste nam mkha'i gzugs //
translated: The yoginī is the form of space.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi nam mkha'i gzugs aa wa dh'u t'i dang rtsa thams cad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi nam mkha'i gzugs aa wa dh'u t'i dang rtsa thams cad ces bya ba'o //
translated: This is the form of space of the yoginīs, the avadhūtī and all the channels.

original: dza yig ra yig stan can ni//
analyzed: dza yig ra yig stan can ni//
translated: The letter ja with the seat of the letter ra

original: zhes bya ba ni dza'i yi ge'i ra'i stan no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dza'i yi ge'i ra'i stan no //
translated: This is the seat of the letter ra of the letter ja.

original: de lta bu'i sngags ni //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sngags ni //
translated: Such a mantra is

original: khu ba 'bab pa shar ba'o //
analyzed: khu ba 'bab pa shar ba'o //
translated: the rising of the semen.

original: zhes bya ba ni mdor na dzra'i yi ge khu ba shar ba'i rang bzhin ni n'i yi ge gtum mo'i skad cig la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mdor na dzra'i yi ge khu ba shar ba'i rang bzhin ni n'i yi ge gtum mo'i skad cig la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: In brief, the letter jra, which is the nature of the rising of the semen, is the letter na, in the moment of candali.

original: slar yang rlung gi mtha' ma ni //
analyzed: slar yang rlung gi mtha' ma ni //
translated: Again, the end of the wind

original: zhes bya ba ni slar yang rlung gi sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ste wa'i yi ge'o //🔽aa yi yi ges gzi bskyed pa //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni slar yang rlung gi sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ste wa'i yi ge'o // aa yi yi ges gzi bskyed pa //
translated: is the letter va, which is the end of the group of wind.🔽The letter a increases its brilliance

original: zhes bya ba ni aa'i yi ges gzi brjid byas pa ste w'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni aa'i yi ges gzi brjid byas pa ste w'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: is the letter va, which is made brilliant by the letter a.

original: tshangs pa padma yi ni gzugs //
analyzed: tshangs pa padma yi ni gzugs //
translated: The form of the lotus of Brahma

original: zhes bya ba ni mchog gi tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi padma chen po ste kun gzhi rnam par shes pas lus mi 'chi bas las kyi ngo bo ji ltar de ltar rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi gzugs kun gyi gzhir bshad pa'i mchog gi tshangs pa'i padma
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mchog gi tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi padma chen po ste kun gzhi rnam par shes pas lus mi 'chi bas las kyi ngo bo ji ltar de ltar rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi gzugs kun gyi gzhir bshad pa'i mchog gi tshangs pa'i padma
translated: is the great lotus of the form of the supreme Brahma, which is the foundation consciousness. Since the body does not die, it is explained that the form of gnosis of the yogins and yoginis is the supreme Brahma lotus, which is the foundation of all.

original: ste chos thams cad kyi rten gyi gzugs nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //🔽ra yig aa yi ge ldan //
analyzed: ste chos thams cad kyi rten gyi gzugs nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so // ra yig aa yi ge ldan //
translated: because it is the form that is the basis of all phenomena.🔽The letter ra, endowed with the letter a,

original: zhes bya ba ni r'a'i yi ge aa'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste r'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni r'a'i yi ge aa'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste r'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: means the letter ra endowed with the letter a, that is, the letter ra.

original: 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the unchanging,

original: zhes bya ba ni mchog gi tshangs pa'i gzugs de padma mi zad pa'i gzugs chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mchog gi tshangs pa'i gzugs de padma mi zad pa'i gzugs chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: means that supreme Brahman form, the form of the imperishable lotus, because of being the realm of phenomena itself.

original: sa mtha' ni ha'i yi ge ste /
analyzed: sa mtha' ni ha'i yi ge ste /
translated: The end of the earth is the letter ha.

original: gsum pa'i yi ge ni ai'i yi ges mgo la gzung ba ste /
analyzed: gsum pa'i yi ge ni ai'i yi ges mgo la gzung ba ste /
translated: The third letter is the letter i, which is taken at the beginning,

original: gnyis las ha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: gnyis las ha'i yi ge'o //
translated: and from the two, the letter ha.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi ste babs pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i gzugs nyid pas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi ste babs pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i gzugs nyid pas so //
translated: The yoginis means all yoginis. The form of the descent means the form of the navel itself.

original: ma ni dbus ma'i de nyid gzugs //
analyzed: ma ni dbus ma'i de nyid gzugs //
translated: The form of the middle reality is ma.

original: zhes bya ba ni ma'i yi ge dbus ma de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin rang gis rig pa skyed pa po pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la gnas pa po rang nyid de ltar rtogs pa ste 'di ni ma'i yi ge'i nges pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ma'i yi ge dbus ma de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin rang gis rig pa skyed pa po pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la gnas pa po rang nyid de ltar rtogs pa ste 'di ni ma'i yi ge'i nges pa'o //
translated: This is the ascertainment of the letter MA.

original: sa mtha' a'a yis bkang pa ste //
analyzed: sa mtha' a'a yis bkang pa ste //
translated: The last of the vowels filled with A.

original: zhes bya ba ni ha'i yi ge a'a'i yi ges bkang ba ste gnyis las h'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ha'i yi ge a'a'i yi ges bkang ba ste gnyis las h'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter HA is filled with the letter A, and from the two comes the letter HA.

original: rnal 'byor ma gzugs sgor brjod pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma gzugs sgor brjod pa'o //
translated: The form of the Yoginis is said to be the door.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs ni ha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs ni ha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The form of the Yoginis is the letter HA.

original: de'i @61b khar aa'i yi ge brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de'i @61b khar aa'i yi ge brjod pa ste /
translated: The letter A is placed above it.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: aa'i yi ge ni chos thams cad gdod ma nyid nas skye ba med pa'i sgo nyid do zhes bya ba de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: aa'i yi ge ni chos thams cad gdod ma nyid nas skye ba med pa'i sgo nyid do zhes bya ba de'i phyir ro //
translated: The letter A is the door of the non-arising of all phenomena from the very beginning.

original: yang na ha'i yi ge brjod pa rnam par shes pa rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs nyid kyis so //
analyzed: yang na ha'i yi ge brjod pa rnam par shes pa rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs nyid kyis so //
translated: Or else, the letter HA is said to be the form of the consciousness of the Yoginis.

original: ya yig ao yis cod pa na brgyan //
analyzed: ya yig ao yis cod pa na brgyan //
translated: The letter YA is adorned with the diadem of O.

original: zhes bya ba ni ya'i yi ge la ao'i yi ges cod pan la brgyan pa ste mdor na yo'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ya'i yi ge la ao'i yi ges cod pan la brgyan pa ste mdor na yo'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the letter Ya, adorned with the letter Oṃ on the head, in brief, the letter Yo.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the innate.

original: zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs kyi rnal 'byor gyis gang mthong ba de'i gzugs gang dang gang de lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs kyi rnal 'byor gyis gang mthong ba de'i gzugs gang dang gang de lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that whatever form is seen by the yoga of the innate form, that form is the innate.

original: ka sde'i dbus gnas zhes bya ba ni ka'i sde tshan gyi dbus na gnas pa ga'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ka sde'i dbus gnas zhes bya ba ni ka'i sde tshan gyi dbus na gnas pa ga'i yi ge'o //
translated: The middle of the Ka group means the letter Gha, which is in the middle of the Ka group.

original: dbyangs gsum pa zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ges mgo bo brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: dbyangs gsum pa zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ges mgo bo brgyan pa'o //
translated: The third vowel means the letter Ai, which is the head ornament.

original: de nyid med pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nyid med pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of non-reality.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar ga'i yi ge mdor na gi'i yi ge ste de kho na nyid med pa'i rang bzhin te chos kyi ro sna tshogs pa myangs pas tshim pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar ga'i yi ge mdor na gi'i yi ge ste de kho na nyid med pa'i rang bzhin te chos kyi ro sna tshogs pa myangs pas tshim pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that the letter Gha, in brief, is the letter Gi, the nature of non-reality, the meaning of which is “satisfied by tasting the various flavors of phenomena.”

original: ni'i yi ge ni ni'i yi ge mngon sum du mngon par brjod pas so //
analyzed: ni'i yi ge ni ni'i yi ge mngon sum du mngon par brjod pas so //
translated: The letter Ni is the letter Ni, which is directly expressed.

original: rang bzhin med pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba ni gang brtags pa de yang rang bzhin med pa'i ye shes so //🔽gnyis ni thog ma la //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba ni gang brtags pa de yang rang bzhin med pa'i ye shes so // gnyis ni thog ma la //
translated: The so-called wisdom without intrinsic nature is that which is imagined, and that is also wisdom without intrinsic nature.🔽The two are at the beginning.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'i thog ma ni ka'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'i thog ma ni ka'i yi ge'o //
translated: The first of the two is the letter ka.

original: a'a yi yi ges gsal bar bya //
analyzed: a'a yi yi ges gsal bar bya //
translated: It is illuminated by the letter a.

original: zhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ges shin tu sbyar ba ste mdor na k'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ges shin tu sbyar ba ste mdor na k'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter a is applied to it, and in brief it is the letter ka.

original: 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature of the desire realm.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnyis gnyis kyi sbyor bas 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnyis gnyis kyi sbyor bas 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the desire realm is by the application of the two.

original: ba sde'i mtha' ma zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ba sde'i mtha' ma zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge'o //
translated: The last of the va group is the letter ma.

original: ae dang ldan zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste gnyis las me'i yi ge'o //🔽thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ae dang ldan zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste gnyis las me'i yi ge'o // thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Endowed with e means endowed with the letter e, and from the two it is the letter i.🔽Everything is of the nature of illusion.

original: zhes bya ba ni thams cad du sgyu ma chen po'i rang bzhin du lta ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thams cad du sgyu ma chen po'i rang bzhin du lta ba'o //
translated: Everything is seen as having the nature of great illusion.

original: ba'i sa bon mthar zhes bya ba ni ba'i yi ge'i rtsar sha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ba'i sa bon mthar zhes bya ba ni ba'i yi ge'i rtsar sha'i yi ge'o //
translated: that is, the letter śa is at the base of the letter va.

original: ya sde'i mtha' yig stan can ni //
analyzed: ya sde'i mtha' yig stan can ni //
translated: The last letter of the ya class is the seat,

original: ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'i stan te gnyis kyis shva'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'i stan te gnyis kyis shva'i yi ge'o //
translated: that is, the letter va is the seat of the last letter of the ya class, and the two together are the letter śva.

original: khu ba dang ni rlung dbyer med //
analyzed: khu ba dang ni rlung dbyer med //
translated: The semen and the wind are inseparable,

original: ces bya ba ni khu ba rlung dang srog dbyer med pas gnas te 'gro ba dang thim pa'i rab tu dbye bas so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni khu ba rlung dang srog dbyer med pas gnas te 'gro ba dang thim pa'i rab tu dbye bas so //
translated: that is, the semen and the wind are inseparable with the life force, abiding in the division of going and dissolving.

original: me'i sa bon ni me'i sa bon ra'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: me'i sa bon ni me'i sa bon ra'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed of the fire is the seed of the letter ra.

original: ai dbyangs mgor gnas zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi @62a * //
analyzed: ai dbyangs mgor gnas zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi @62a * //
translated: The vowel i is at the head,

original: ge mgo la gnas pa ste mdor na ri'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ge mgo la gnas pa ste mdor na ri'i yi ge'o //
translated: that is, the letter i is at the head, and in brief, the letter ri.

original: sgrub pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The accomplishment is the nature of illusion,

original: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub chen po ster ba po'i gzugs pas ye shes kyi chu'i rgya mtsho chen po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dngos grub chen po ster ba po'i gzugs pas ye shes kyi chu'i rgya mtsho chen po'o //
translated: that is, the great accomplishment is the great ocean of the water of gnosis, the form of the bestower of the great accomplishment.🔽The dakini is the fire,

original: mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad za bas me'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad za bas me'o //
translated: because she consumes all conceptual thoughts.

original: ka'i gnyis pa'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni ka'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i sa bon kha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ka'i gnyis pa'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni ka'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i sa bon kha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed of the second of the ka group is the seed of the second of the ka group, the letter kha.

original: nam mkha'i rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs //
translated: The form of the sky-yoginī

original: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs sems so sor snang ba rang gis rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i rnal 'byor ma'i gzugs sems so sor snang ba rang gis rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is the mind, because the appearance of the individual mind is self-cognizant.

original: sa bon de'i mtha'i yi ge zhes bya ba ni kha'i yi ge'i 'gram gyi sa bon ni ga'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: sa bon de'i mtha'i yi ge zhes bya ba ni kha'i yi ge'i 'gram gyi sa bon ni ga'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed at the end of that is the seed at the end of the letter kha, the letter ga.

original: ai yi yi ges rnar brgyan pa //
analyzed: ai yi yi ges rnar brgyan pa //
translated: Adorned with the ear of the letter i

original: zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ges rna ba la brgyan pa ste ga'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ges rna ba la brgyan pa ste ga'i yi ge'o //
translated: is adorned with the ear of the letter e, the letter ga.

original: dpa' bo gcig pu mi bskyod pa //
analyzed: dpa' bo gcig pu mi bskyod pa //
translated: The single hero is Akṣhobhya

original: zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo gcig pu mi bskyod pa nyid kyis chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid pas so //🔽de ltar 'khor lo mkha' rang bzhin //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo gcig pu mi bskyod pa nyid kyis chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid pas so // de ltar 'khor lo mkha' rang bzhin //
translated: is the single hero Akṣhobhya himself, because of the nature of the dharmakāya.🔽Thus, the wheel is the nature of the sky

original: zhes bya ba de ltar bshad pa'i 'khor lo nam mkha'i rang bzhin de lhan cig skyes ma'i mtha' nyid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba de ltar bshad pa'i 'khor lo nam mkha'i rang bzhin de lhan cig skyes ma'i mtha' nyid kyis so //
translated: thus, the wheel explained in this way is the nature of the sky, because of the end of the co-emergent.

original: de ltar rkang pa dgu ba'o zhes bya ba ni sngags de yang rkang ba dgu pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar rkang pa dgu ba'o zhes bya ba ni sngags de yang rkang ba dgu pa ste /
translated: The mantra also has nine feet.

original: bra bhed ni /
analyzed: bra bhed ni /
translated: brahmaṇe

original: aa pa r'a dza yi /
analyzed: aa pa r'a dza yi /
translated: aparāje

original: bi dza yi /
analyzed: bi dza yi /
translated: vijayi🔽jaṃbhani

original: dzambha ni / stambha ni /
analyzed: dzambha ni / stambha ni /
translated: stambhani

original: mo ha ni /
analyzed: mo ha ni /
translated: mohani

original: badzra w'a r'a h'i /
analyzed: badzra w'a r'a h'i /
translated: vajravarāhi

original: ma h'a yo gi n'i /
analyzed: ma h'a yo gi n'i /
translated: mahāyoginī🔽kāmadvakṣa

original: k'a me dva kha ge / zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rkang pa rnams so //
analyzed: k'a me dva kha ge / zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi rkang pa rnams so //
translated: The mantra has these feet.

original: rnal 'byor mchog yi ge ste //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mchog yi ge ste //
translated: The supreme yoga is the syllable,

original: sa gsum gyi ni rang bzhin sngags //
analyzed: sa gsum gyi ni rang bzhin sngags //
translated: the mantra is the nature of the three realms.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi yi ge sngags kyi gzugs 'di khams gsum kyang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi yi ge sngags kyi gzugs 'di khams gsum kyang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The syllable of the assembly of yoginīs is this mantra form, and the three realms are also that.

original: 'di skad gsungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa te ;
analyzed: 'di skad gsungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa te ;
translated: This is what was said, etc.

original: dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po dngos grub kyi gtso bor rab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po dngos grub kyi gtso bor rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: All powers is the chief power of the great seal.

original: de ster bar nges pa'o //
analyzed: de ster bar nges pa'o //
translated: It is certain that it grants that.

original: kun spyod ces bya ba ni rang gi dus shar ba'i rtsa'i ste phyi rol du 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs su nye bar 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: kun spyod ces bya ba ni rang gi dus shar ba'i rtsa'i ste phyi rol du 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs su nye bar 'gro ba'o //
translated: The conduct is the channel that arises at its own time, and externally it goes to the various worlds.

original: mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phag mo aa wa dh'u t'i'i nang na gnas pa dang rnal 'byor chen po'i bdag nyid kyi dus su gnas pa de'i dus su thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed do //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phag mo aa wa dh'u t'i'i nang na gnas pa dang rnal 'byor chen po'i bdag nyid kyi dus su gnas pa de'i dus su thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed do //
translated: The dakini is Vajravarahi, who resides within the avadhuti, and at the time of the nature of the great yoga, at that time she makes everything perfect.

original: gsum pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: gsum pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The third and so forth are easy to understand.

original: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo bzhi pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo bzhi pa gsungs pa /
translated: The four wheels are taught externally, beginning with arising again.

original: slar yang langs nas zhes bya ba las @62b ba ste rdo rje phag mo slar yang rang gi sngags kyi yi ge rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir las 'di byas pa'o //
analyzed: slar yang langs nas zhes bya ba las @62b ba ste rdo rje phag mo slar yang rang gi sngags kyi yi ge rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir las 'di byas pa'o //
translated: Having arisen again, that is, Vajravarahi, having arisen again, this activity is done in order to complete the syllables of her mantra.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: The vajra is Vajrasattva.

original: de yang gzhan gyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa ni 'khor lo bzhi pa'i rnal 'byor 'dzin pa po bdag med ma yis 'khyud pa'i mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgrub pa po'o //
analyzed: de yang gzhan gyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa ni 'khor lo bzhi pa'i rnal 'byor 'dzin pa po bdag med ma yis 'khyud pa'i mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgrub pa po'o //
translated: He is the one who has the wheel yoga of others, the one who holds the yoga of the four wheels, the one who is embraced by Nairatmya, the one who accomplishes the supreme unchanging.🔽By the yoga of the wheel of mantra

original: sngags kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: sngags kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: And the yoga of the mantra wheel.🔽

original: zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar sngags kyi 'khor lo btu ba gsungs ba /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar sngags kyi 'khor lo btu ba gsungs ba /
translated: Thus, the wheel of mantra is taught.

original: ta'i sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ta'i sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The mantra of the letter ta, etc.

original: ta'i sngags zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge'i sngags so //
analyzed: ta'i sngags zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra of the letter ta is the mantra of the letter ta.

original: gnyis pa sbyor zhes pa ni gnyis pa sbyor ba po ste rnal 'byor gyi gtum mo 'bar ba mthar phyin pa'i bde ba'o //🔽dya gnas me dang rlung sa bon //
analyzed: gnyis pa sbyor zhes pa ni gnyis pa sbyor ba po ste rnal 'byor gyi gtum mo 'bar ba mthar phyin pa'i bde ba'o // dya gnas me dang rlung sa bon //
translated: The second is the union, the second is the unifier, the bliss of the perfection of the blazing of the yoga candali.🔽The seed of dya is in the fire and wind.

original: zhes bya ba ni dya'i yi ge me dang rlung gi rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //🔽bde ba chen po 'dod chags che //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dya'i yi ge me dang rlung gi rang bzhin du gnas pa'o // bde ba chen po 'dod chags che //
translated: The seed of the letter dya is in the nature of fire and wind.🔽Great bliss is great passion.

original: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'dod chags 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'dod chags 'bar ba'o //
translated: Great bliss is the blazing of passion.🔽Its second seed is

original: de yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni //
analyzed: de yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni //
translated: The seed of the second is🔽

original: aa yi yi ges dgang ba'o //
analyzed: aa yi yi ges dgang ba'o //
translated: It is filled with the letter A.

original: zhes bya ba ni de'i zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i sa bon th'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de'i zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i sa bon th'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter Tha is the seed of the second of the Ta group.

original: a'a'i yi ges bkang pa ste mdor na th'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: a'a'i yi ges bkang pa ste mdor na th'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: It is filled with the letter A, and so in brief it is the letter Tha.

original: 'byung chen bzhi yi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'byung chen bzhi yi rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature of the four great elements.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa khams bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs pa khams bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature of the four elements, earth and so forth.

original: de yang chos 'byung gi khu ba dang me dang bde ba'o //🔽ba yig ra yig ao yig sbyar //
analyzed: de yang chos 'byung gi khu ba dang me dang bde ba'o // ba yig ra yig ao yig sbyar //
translated: And that is the fluid of the source of phenomena, fire, and bliss.🔽The letter Ba is joined with the letter Ra and the letter O.

original: zhes bya ba ni pa'i yi ge dang ra'i yi ge dang ao'i yi ge sbyar bas bro'i yi ger 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pa'i yi ge dang ra'i yi ge dang ao'i yi ge sbyar bas bro'i yi ger 'gyur ro //
translated: The letter Ba is joined with the letter Ra and the letter O, and so the letter Bha arises.

original: gsum pa rlung gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gsum pa rlung gi rang bzhin no //
translated: It is the nature of the third, wind.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar yi ge gsum rlung gi las la yongs su gnas pa rdo rje lta bu'i rang bzhin no //🔽ta yi yi ge aam yig ldan //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar yi ge gsum rlung gi las la yongs su gnas pa rdo rje lta bu'i rang bzhin no // ta yi yi ge aam yig ldan //
translated: Thus the three letters are fully present in the function of wind, and so they are of the nature of the vajra.🔽The letter Ta is endowed with the letter A.

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge la aam gi yi ge dang ldan pa ste tam ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge la aam gi yi ge dang ldan pa ste tam ngo //
translated: The letter Ta is endowed with the letter A, and so it is the letter Tam.

original: slar yang rnam shes sa bon no //
analyzed: slar yang rnam shes sa bon no //
translated: Again, it is the seed of consciousness.

original: zhes bya ba ni slar yang rlung gsum gyi rnam par shes pa gsum ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni slar yang rlung gsum gyi rnam par shes pa gsum ste /
translated: This is the three consciousnesses of the three winds again.

original: de yang 'jug pa'i dang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang kun gzhir bshad pa'o //🔽ka yi sde yi dbus gnas pa /
analyzed: de yang 'jug pa'i dang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang kun gzhir bshad pa'o // ka yi sde yi dbus gnas pa /
translated: And that is explained as the engaged, afflicted mind, and the all-base.🔽The middle of the ka group.

original: zhes bya ba ni ka'i sde tshan gyi dbus na gnas pa ga'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ka'i sde tshan gyi dbus na gnas pa ga'i yi ge'o //
translated: The middle of the ka group is the letter ga.

original: ae yi yi ges rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: ae yi yi ges rnam par brgyan //
translated: Adorned with the letter e.

original: zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ges rna ba la brgyan pa ste gnyis kyi ge'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ges rna ba la brgyan pa ste gnyis kyi ge'i yi ge'o //
translated: Adorned with the letter e on the ear, the letter ya.🔽The seal of the yoginis.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi phyag rgya dang // zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gyis 'gro ba'i @63a * //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi phyag rgya dang // zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gyis 'gro ba'i @63a * //
translated: Because of the nature of the seal of the yoginis, it goes.

original: phyir ro // slar la yang ni brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir ro // slar la yang ni brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be uttered again.

original: zhes bya ba ni slar yang bzlas nas de ltar tshig brjod par bya'o //🔽pro tam ge /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni slar yang bzlas nas de ltar tshig brjod par bya'o // pro tam ge /
translated: Uttering it again, it should be uttered in that way.🔽Protam ge.

original: pro tam ge zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: pro tam ge zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Protam ge is the thought.

original: tshig 'di thabs shes dbyer med do //
analyzed: tshig 'di thabs shes dbyer med do //
translated: This word is the indivisibility of means and knowledge.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar tshig gnyis pa yang thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar tshig gnyis pa yang thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i gzugs so //
translated: Thus, the second word is the form of the indivisibility of means and insight.

original: sa'i mtha' ma ha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: sa'i mtha' ma ha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The final letter of the earth is the letter ha.

original: na'i sngags ni na'i yi ge'i sngags so //
analyzed: na'i sngags ni na'i yi ge'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra of the na is the mantra of the letter na.

original: ha na'i tshig go //
analyzed: ha na'i tshig go //
translated: The word hana is the word hana.

original: bskyar la yang ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: bskyar la yang ni brjod par bya //
translated: It should be repeated again.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar ha na'i sgra slar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar ha na'i sgra slar brjod par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the sound hana should be repeated again.

original: ha na ha na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ha na ha na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is hana hana.

original: bskyed cing sdud par byed gzugs so //
analyzed: bskyed cing sdud par byed gzugs so //
translated: It is the form of creation and dissolution.

original: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa dang sdud pa'i gzugs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa dang sdud pa'i gzugs byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The form of creation and dissolution is the meaning of the words existence and nirvana of the bodhisattvas.

original: ba ra a'a yig sa bon gcig / ces bya ba ni yi ge dang ra'i yi ge dang a'a'i yi ge rnams gcig pa ste pr'a'i yi ge'i sa bon no //
analyzed: ba ra a'a yig sa bon gcig / ces bya ba ni yi ge dang ra'i yi ge dang a'a'i yi ge rnams gcig pa ste pr'a'i yi ge'i sa bon no //
translated: The seed of the single letter va ra a is the seed of the letter pra,

original: don dam pa yi yi ge'o //
analyzed: don dam pa yi yi ge'o //
translated: the ultimate letter.

original: zhes bya ba ni rlung rnam par shes pa dang byang chub kyi sems su bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin don dam pa ste de ltar bla ma'i gdams ngag gi dbang gis mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rlung rnam par shes pa dang byang chub kyi sems su bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin don dam pa ste de ltar bla ma'i gdams ngag gi dbang gis mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the ultimate nature of the wind, consciousness, and the bodhicitta of great bliss. Thus, it is the meaning of “performed by the power of the guru’s instruction.”

original: ta mtha' zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma na'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ta mtha' zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma na'i yi ge'o //
translated: The final part of ta is the na letter at the end of the ta group.

original: a'a dang ldan zhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste n'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: a'a dang ldan zhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste n'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: Endowed with ā is endowed with the ā letter, the na letter.

original: gzhom du med las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: gzhom du med las skyes pa'o //
translated: It arises from the invincible.

original: zhes bya ba ni aa n'a ha ha ra zhugs pas rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i chos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni aa n'a ha ha ra zhugs pas rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i chos so //
translated: The consciousness and so on are the phenomena that enter into a na ha ha ra.

original: de las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i las slar yang lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i las slar yang lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: From that, the enjoyment body arises again, the innate.

original: yang lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs las skye ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs las skye ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Again, the arising from the innate form is called “arising.”

original: te'i mtha' ma zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma na'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: te'i mtha' ma zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma na'i yi ge'o //
translated: The final part of te is the na letter at the end of the te group.

original: kun 'dzoms pa'o zhes bya ba ni rab tu 'joms pa ste bdud kyi stobs dang gti mug la sogs pa'o //🔽ka ka dang ni na gnas la //
analyzed: kun 'dzoms pa'o zhes bya ba ni rab tu 'joms pa ste bdud kyi stobs dang gti mug la sogs pa'o // ka ka dang ni na gnas la //
translated: The all-gathering is the complete destruction of the power of Mara, delusion, and so on.

original: zhes bya ba ni ka'i yi ge gnyis dang na'i yi ge gnas pa'o //🔽dbyangs gsum sbyar zhing thig le sbyin //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ka'i yi ge gnyis dang na'i yi ge gnas pa'o // dbyangs gsum sbyar zhing thig le sbyin //
translated: The ka and ni are the two ka syllables and the ni syllable.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar ka'i yi ge la sogs pa gsum pa'i dbyangs te ai'i yi ge sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar ka'i yi ge la sogs pa gsum pa'i dbyangs te ai'i yi ge sbyin par bya'o //
translated: The three vowels are the three vowels of the ka syllable, the i vowel.

original: thig le gnyis sbyin zhes bya ba ni thig le gnyis par sbyin par bya'o //🔽mdor na kim ki ni'o //
analyzed: thig le gnyis sbyin zhes bya ba ni thig le gnyis par sbyin par bya'o // mdor na kim ki ni'o //
translated: The two drops are the two drops of the i vowel.

original: rnal 'byor ma kun 'bod pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma kun 'bod pa'o //
translated: In brief, kim ki ni is the invocation of all the yoginis.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma 'di thams cad la bod pa ste ci khyod kyis @63b sems can gyi don mdzod cig gnyis pa ngo mtshar che zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma 'di thams cad la bod pa ste ci khyod kyis @63b sems can gyi don mdzod cig gnyis pa ngo mtshar che zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The all is the invocation of all these yoginis, meaning Do you, O Goddess, accomplish the welfare of sentient beings! The second is the exclamation Wonderful!

original: ma lus sangs rgyas thob par mdzod cig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ma lus sangs rgyas thob par mdzod cig ces bya ba'o //
translated: The third is May you attain complete Buddhahood!

original: de bzhin du ni kha ba dang // gsum pa na ru gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ni kha ba dang // gsum pa na ru gnas pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the kha and va are the third and fourth.

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du yang kha'i yi ge gnyis dang na'i yi ge yang ste gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsum ka la ai'i yi ge sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du yang kha'i yi ge gnyis dang na'i yi ge yang ste gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsum ka la ai'i yi ge sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the two letters kha and the letter na, the three, and so on, all three are endowed with the letter i.

original: sngon bzhin ta mdor na khim khi ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon bzhin ta mdor na khim khi ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: As before, ta, in short, khim khim.

original: dub ba sel bar byed pa'i rgyu //
analyzed: dub ba sel bar byed pa'i rgyu //
translated: The cause of dispelling fatigue.

original: zhes bya ba ni sems dub pa sel bar byed pa'i rgyu nyid dang sna tshogs sgra dang smra ba rnams kyi yang ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sems dub pa sel bar byed pa'i rgyu nyid dang sna tshogs sgra dang smra ba rnams kyi yang ngo //
translated: The cause of dispelling mental fatigue, and also of various sounds and speech.

original: dh'u na'i sngags kyi tshig ces bya ba ni dh'u na'i yi ge dag gi sngags kyi tshig ste /
analyzed: dh'u na'i sngags kyi tshig ces bya ba ni dh'u na'i yi ge dag gi sngags kyi tshig ste /
translated: The words of the dhūna mantra. The words of the mantra of the dhūna letters.

original: lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya //
translated: Should be uttered twice.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar gnyis brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar gnyis brjod par bya ste /
translated: Thus, it should be uttered twice.

original: dh'u na dh'u na'i yi ge dag go //
analyzed: dh'u na dh'u na'i yi ge dag go //
translated: Dhūna dhūna, the dhūna letters.

original: rtog pa thams cad 'joms par byed //
analyzed: rtog pa thams cad 'joms par byed //
translated: Conquers all conceptual thoughts.

original: ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms pa dang spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba'i las kyang ngo //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms pa dang spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba'i las kyang ngo //
translated: Conquers all conceptual thoughts, and also the activity of various conduct.

original: ya sde'i mtha' ma yi ni sngags //
analyzed: ya sde'i mtha' ma yi ni sngags //
translated: The last of the Ya class is the mantra.

original: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The last of the Ya class is the letter Va.

original: rdo rje'i bu gar brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bu gar brgyan pa'o //
translated: It is adorned with the vajra hole.

original: zhes bya ba ni de yang rdo rje'i bu gar sa bon 'dzin pas dbab par dang bral bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de yang rdo rje'i bu gar sa bon 'dzin pas dbab par dang bral bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The seed syllable is held in the vajra hole, so it is free from emission.

original: rtsa sde'i dbus gnas sa kho na ni //
analyzed: rtsa sde'i dbus gnas sa kho na ni //
translated: The one in the middle of the Na class is the earth.

original: zhes bya ba ni tsa'i sde tshan gyi dbus na gnas pa dza'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni tsa'i sde tshan gyi dbus na gnas pa dza'i yi ge'o //
translated: The one in the middle of the Na class is the letter Ja.

original: ra yi stan la yongs su gnas //
analyzed: ra yi stan la yongs su gnas //
translated: It is situated on the seat of Ra.

original: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge'i stan la yongs su gnas pa ste mdor na dzva'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge'i stan la yongs su gnas pa ste mdor na dzva'i yi ge'o //
translated: It is situated on the seat of the letter Ra, in brief, the letter Jva.

original: gti mug za bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gti mug za bar byed pa'o //
translated: It devours delusion.

original: zhes bya ba ni gti mug can gyi mu stegs pa rnams kyi gti mug go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gti mug can gyi mu stegs pa rnams kyi gti mug go //
translated: It is the delusion of the deluded tirthikas.

original: sa mtha' ni ha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: sa mtha' ni ha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The end of the Sa class is the letter Ha.

original: gzhom med dbus ma'o zhes bya ba ni aa wa dh'u t'i'i n'a da rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: gzhom med dbus ma'o zhes bya ba ni aa wa dh'u t'i'i n'a da rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku'o //
translated: The middle of the indestructible is the nada of the avadhuti, the gnosis body of the yogis.

original: sha sde'i gsum pa zhes bya ba ni sha'i sde tshan gyi gsum pa sa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: sha sde'i gsum pa zhes bya ba ni sha'i sde tshan gyi gsum pa sa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The third of the flesh group is the letter S.

original: ta stan gnas zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge'i stan la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ta stan gnas zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge'i stan la gnas pa'o //
translated: The seat of the letter T is the seat of the letter T.

original: ae yi yi ges rna bar brgyan //
analyzed: ae yi yi ges rna bar brgyan //
translated: The ear is adorned with the letter E.

original: zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ges rna ba brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ges rna ba brgyan pa'o //
translated: The ear is adorned with the letter E.

original: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs //
analyzed: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs //
translated: The form of the variegated dakini

original: 'bod par byed pa yi ni sngags //
analyzed: 'bod par byed pa yi ni sngags //
translated: is the mantra of the one who calls.

original: zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi sngags rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi ming brjod pa'i bod pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi sngags rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi ming brjod pa'i bod pa ste /
translated: The mantra of the dakinis is the invocation of the names of all yogins and yoginis.

original: rab tu myos pas myos pa'i dus su ting nge 'dzin byed du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽sha sho ya'i @64a * //
analyzed: rab tu myos pas myos pa'i dus su ting nge 'dzin byed du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to // sha sho ya'i @64a * //
translated: The meaning is that one should practice samadhi at the time of intoxication with complete intoxication.🔽The mantra word of the flesh and the moon

original: sngags kyi tshig / ces bya ba ni sngags kyi tshig ste /
analyzed: sngags kyi tshig / ces bya ba ni sngags kyi tshig ste /
translated: is the mantra word.

original: lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya //
translated: It should be uttered twice.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnyis brjod pa ste sho sha ya sho sha ya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnyis brjod pa ste sho sha ya sho sha ya'o //
translated: The meaning is that it should be uttered twice, “shoṣaya shoṣaya.”

original: ye shes can rlom nga rgyal 'joms //
analyzed: ye shes can rlom nga rgyal 'joms //
translated: The wise one conquers pride.

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes can rnams kyi ye shes kyi nga rgyal bcom nas nga rgyal med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes can rnams kyi ye shes kyi nga rgyal bcom nas nga rgyal med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Thus, having destroyed the pride of knowledge of the wise, the knowledge of great bliss without pride is intended to be called.

original: de'i de bzhin du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i de bzhin du gsungs pa /
translated: He says just that:

original: byang chub byang chub med de nyid //
analyzed: byang chub byang chub med de nyid //
translated: Enlightenment is the reality of non-enlightenment.

original: ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba ste /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: byang chub dang byang chub ma yin pa'i de kho na nyid de gang zag gi nga rgyal spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub dang byang chub ma yin pa'i de kho na nyid de gang zag gi nga rgyal spang bar bya'o //
translated: The reality of enlightenment and non-enlightenment is the pride of the person to be abandoned.

original: thams cad sgyu ma nyid pas chos kyi dbyings rang gi bar mi sems te rnam pa med pa nyid kyis de thams cad la khyab par byed pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad sgyu ma nyid pas chos kyi dbyings rang gi bar mi sems te rnam pa med pa nyid kyis de thams cad la khyab par byed pa'o //
translated: Since everything is illusion, the realm of phenomena is not thought to be one's own, and it pervades everything by being without aspect.

original: de ltar gnyis kyis lhag rkang bcu //
analyzed: de ltar gnyis kyis lhag rkang bcu //
translated: Thus, ten with two extra feet.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar gnyis kyis lhag pa'i rkang pa bcu tham pa ste tshig rkang bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar gnyis kyis lhag pa'i rkang pa bcu tham pa ste tshig rkang bcu gnyis so //
translated: Thus, there are ten with two extra feet, that is, twelve feet.

original: sa dang rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin //
analyzed: sa dang rnal 'byor ma'i rang bzhin //
translated: The nature of the stage and the yoginis.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa bcu gnyis rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin gyis byed par 'gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa'i sku las zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa bcu gnyis rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin gyis byed par 'gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa'i sku las zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus, the twelve stages are the nature of the yoginis' actions, and they are the emanation of the Bhagavat.

original: 'di skad gsungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'di skad gsungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Thus it is said and so forth.

original: de nyid mchog gi brda ru son //
analyzed: de nyid mchog gi brda ru son //
translated: It is the supreme sign of reality.

original: zhes bya ba ni brda ste yi ge gzhan gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni brda ste yi ge gzhan gang gsungs pa /
translated: The sign is any other syllable that is said.

original: kla klo'i skad kyi ye shes te //🔽yi ge de ni brda yis mchog dang khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa spangs pa'i de kho na nyid kun gyi rang bzhin dang ldan par son pa thog ma med pa'i dus rnams su gnas pa dang mi
analyzed: kla klo'i skad kyi ye shes te // yi ge de ni brda yis mchog dang khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa spangs pa'i de kho na nyid kun gyi rang bzhin dang ldan par son pa thog ma med pa'i dus rnams su gnas pa dang mi
translated: The knowledge of the barbarian language🔽is the supreme sign of the syllable.

original: gnas pa'i de kho na nyid kyang nam mkha' ji tsam pa'i sems can gyi don byed pa gcig pa nyid kyis bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas pa'i de kho na nyid kyang nam mkha' ji tsam pa'i sems can gyi don byed pa gcig pa nyid kyis bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: The supreme and exalted knowledge of reality, endowed with the nature of all things, is attained, which is free from existence and non-existence, and so forth. It abides from time without beginning, and it is the reality that is both abiding and non-abiding. It is generated by the very same one who acts for the benefit of sentient beings as far as space pervades.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi don dang ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi don dang ba'o //
translated: It is the purification of the benefit of all beings.

original: sems can de rnams med cing bdag phag mo med pa rtag tu dbyings las so //
analyzed: sems can de rnams med cing bdag phag mo med pa rtag tu dbyings las so //
translated: Those sentient beings do not exist, and I, the sow, do not exist, always from the dhātu.

original: bdag las byung zhes bya ba ni de ltar srid pa gsum gcig pa nyid kyi thams cad kyi drung las te bdag gis srid pa'i gzugs can ma rdo rje phag mo byung ba'o //
analyzed: bdag las byung zhes bya ba ni de ltar srid pa gsum gcig pa nyid kyi thams cad kyi drung las te bdag gis srid pa'i gzugs can ma rdo rje phag mo byung ba'o //
translated: “Arisen from me” means that in that way, the three existences are the same, from the presence of all, from me, the existence of Vajravārāhī, the form of existence, has arisen.

original: sems can de rnams med cing bdag phag mo med pa rtag tu byung ba byas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yang na dus thams cad du gang du yang mi 'gro zhing ma skyes pa yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sems can de rnams med cing bdag phag mo med pa rtag tu byung ba byas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yang na dus thams cad du gang du yang mi 'gro zhing ma skyes pa yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “Having made those sentient beings not exist, and I, the sow, not exist, always arisen” and so on means that at all times, I do not go anywhere, and I am not born.

original: rnam par nyams pa dngos po med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par nyams pa dngos po med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the thing that is destroyed.

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: sgyu ma rmi lam de bzhin @64b gshegs //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma rmi lam de bzhin @64b gshegs // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The Tathāgata is like an illusion, like a dream.

original: ji ltar sgyu ma dang rmi lam bden pa ma yin zhing brdzun pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar sgyu ma dang rmi lam bden pa ma yin zhing brdzun pa ma yin no //
translated: Just as an illusion and a dream are not true and are not false.

original: de bzhin du de'i dus su rang bzhin sgyu ma'i sems can rnams kyang nang du son pas sgyu ma dang rmi lam zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o //🔽las rnams ji lta bar ni 'byung //
analyzed: de bzhin du de'i dus su rang bzhin sgyu ma'i sems can rnams kyang nang du son pas sgyu ma dang rmi lam zhes bya ba ni nges pa'o // las rnams ji lta bar ni 'byung //
translated: Likewise, at that time, the illusory beings by nature also enter within, and so it is certain that they are called “illusory” and “dream-like.”

original: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la ji ltar rigs pa'i sngags kyi yi ge las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la ji ltar rigs pa'i sngags kyi yi ge las 'byung ba'o //
translated: “ They arise just like the actions” means that they arise from the mantra syllables in accordance with the actions, such as pacifying and so forth.

original: dngos che zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin kyang ngo //
analyzed: dngos che zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin kyang ngo //
translated: “ Great things” means that they are also the nature of clear light.

original: thams cad la gnas brtag tu rtag pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro kun rdzob kyi gzugs dang bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan nyid ni rnal 'byor ma'i yang rang bzhin no //
analyzed: thams cad la gnas brtag tu rtag pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro kun rdzob kyi gzugs dang bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan nyid ni rnal 'byor ma'i yang rang bzhin no //
translated: “ Always abiding in everything” means that the nature of the Vajraḍāka, the relative form of the Blessed One, is also the nature of the yoginī.

original: 'di skad gsungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sa dang mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i bar du tshigs su bcad pa gsum ni sdud par byed pa po'i tshig go //
analyzed: 'di skad gsungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sa dang mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i bar du tshigs su bcad pa gsum ni sdud par byed pa po'i tshig go //
translated: “ Thus he spoke” and so forth up to “the characteristics of the stages” are the words of the compiler.

original: gzhan rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: gzhan rtogs par sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'di ni 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo bzhi pa'o //
translated: This is the fourth chapter of the Wheel of Time Tantra.

original: da ni lnga pa de'i phyi rol du 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni lnga pa de'i phyi rol du 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the fifth, the outer wheel of the maṇḍala is taught:

original: ldang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ldang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: “Arisen” and so on.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni sngon ma la ltos pa ste bcom ldan 'das kun rdzob dag tu yang ngo //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni sngon ma la ltos pa ste bcom ldan 'das kun rdzob dag tu yang ngo //
translated: Nirvāṇa is in dependence on the previous, and the Bhagavān is also in the relative.

original: de'i phyir 'khor lo lnga pa mya ngan las 'das pa brjod par bya ste rtag pa'i gzugs nyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'khor lo lnga pa mya ngan las 'das pa brjod par bya ste rtag pa'i gzugs nyid kyang ngo //
translated: Therefore, the fifth wheel is called nirvāṇa, and it is also the form of permanence.

original: yang gi sgra ni sngon ma ltos pa yis //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni sngon ma ltos pa yis //
translated: The word “also” is in dependence on the previous.

original: gsod pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi ma rig pa la sogs pa yan lag bcu gnyis rnams so //
analyzed: gsod pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi ma rig pa la sogs pa yan lag bcu gnyis rnams so //
translated: “Killing” is the twelve members, such as ignorance, of all.🔽The word “and so on” refers to the sentient beings who are the enemies of the six migrations.

original: sogs pa'i sgras 'gro ba drug rnams kyi sdang ba'i sems can rnams kyi ste de ston pa yis dang grol ba dang thams cad nas thams cad du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog par 'gyur ba yang ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras 'gro ba drug rnams kyi sdang ba'i sems can rnams kyi ste de ston pa yis dang grol ba dang thams cad nas thams cad du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog par 'gyur ba yang ngo //
translated: The teacher, having liberated them, also establishes them in nirvāṇa in every way.

original: gsungs pa zhes bya ba ste ci gsungs la /
analyzed: gsungs pa zhes bya ba ste ci gsungs la /
translated: “It is said” means what is said.

original: yi ge btu ba bcom ldan 'das kyis so //
analyzed: yi ge btu ba bcom ldan 'das kyis so //
translated: “The extraction of the syllables” is by the Bhagavān.

original: ka yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni //
analyzed: ka yi gnyis pa'i sa bon ni //
translated: The seed of the second of the ka

original: zhes bya ba ni ka'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i yi ge ni kha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ka'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i yi ge ni kha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The second letter of the ka group is the letter kha.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs de nyid do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs de nyid do //
translated: That is the reality of the yoginis' assembly.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma 'bar ma de kho na nyid de dus thams cad du gtum mo'i rtsa mi 'dor ba ste rang bzhin med pa'i ye shes kyi zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma 'bar ma de kho na nyid de dus thams cad du gtum mo'i rtsa mi 'dor ba ste rang bzhin med pa'i ye shes kyi zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That is the reality of the yogini Cchandini, who is never abandoned in the channel of fierce fire at all times, which means the wisdom of the absence of inherent existence.

original: ta gzung zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: ta gzung zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The ta is to be taken.🔽The ta group's last is the seat.

original: ya mtha'i stan can zhes bya ba ste ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni wa'i yi ge'i stan no //
analyzed: ya mtha'i stan can zhes bya ba ste ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ni wa'i yi ge'i stan no //
translated: The ta group's last is the letter va.

original: aam gis cod pan brgyan par bya //
analyzed: aam gis cod pan brgyan par bya //
translated: It is adorned with the crown of the am.

original: zhes bya ba ni aam gi yi ge dbyangs kyi thig les @65a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni aam gi yi ge dbyangs kyi thig les @65a * //
translated: The letter am is adorned with the drop of vowel i.

original: cod pan la brgyan pa'o //🔽de bzhin a'a yi yi ges dgang //
analyzed: cod pan la brgyan pa'o // de bzhin a'a yi yi ges dgang //
translated: The a is the garland.

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du a'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du a'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter a is the garland.

original: 'gro ba drug gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba drug gi rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the six realms.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba drug gi rang bzhin te wa'i yi ge ni sa 'og go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba drug gi rang bzhin te wa'i yi ge ni sa 'og go //
translated: This is the nature of the six destinies. The letter va is the underworld.

original: ta'i yi ges stong gis 'jig rten no //
analyzed: ta'i yi ges stong gis 'jig rten no //
translated: The letter ta is the world system of a thousand worlds.

original: thig le ni mtho ris so //🔽ka sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni //
analyzed: thig le ni mtho ris so // ka sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni //
translated: The bindu is heaven.🔽The seed in the middle of the ka group

original: zhes bya ba ni ka'i sde tshan gyi dbus ma'i sa bon ga'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ka'i sde tshan gyi dbus ma'i sa bon ga'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the seed of the middle of the ka group, the letter ga.

original: dug gis reg pa 'phrog par byed //
analyzed: dug gis reg pa 'phrog par byed //
translated: It snatches away the touch of poison.

original: ces bya ba ni dug gis reg pa 'phrog pa'i sngags te ga'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni dug gis reg pa 'phrog pa'i sngags te ga'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the mantra for snatching away the touch of poison, the letter ga.

original: nam mkha' lding gi sa bon te brda yis gdengs ka can rnams kyi yang ngo //
analyzed: nam mkha' lding gi sa bon te brda yis gdengs ka can rnams kyi yang ngo //
translated: It is the seed of Garuḍa, and also of those with hoods.

original: ka yi sa bon stong rang bzhin //
analyzed: ka yi sa bon stong rang bzhin //
translated: The seed of ka is the nature of emptiness.

original: zhes bya ba ni ka'i yi ge'i sa bon stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i khams kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ka'i yi ge'i sa bon stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i khams kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is the seed of the letter ka, the nature of emptiness, for the sake of the realm of space.🔽The final of na

original: na'i mtha' ma zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge'i mtha' ma pa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: na'i mtha' ma zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge'i mtha' ma pa'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the final of the letter na, the letter pa.🔽Endowed with the letter a

original: a'a yig ldan zhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ges dgang ba'o //
analyzed: a'a yig ldan zhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ges dgang ba'o //
translated: This is filled with the letter a.

original: mdor na pa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mdor na pa'i yi ge'o //
translated: In brief, it is the letter pa.

original: me 'bar ba yis dbang ldan te //
analyzed: me 'bar ba yis dbang ldan te //
translated: The blazing fire is the powerful one.

original: zhes bya ba ni me 'bar bas dbang ldan te bde byed do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni me 'bar bas dbang ldan te bde byed do //
translated: The blazing fire is the powerful one, the one who brings about bliss.

original: gtum mor son pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //🔽'dzin pa yi ni sa bon ni //
analyzed: gtum mor son pa'i byang chub kyi sems so // 'dzin pa yi ni sa bon ni //
translated: The bodhicitta that has reached the fierce one.🔽The seed of the earth is

original: zhes bya ba ni sa'i sa bon la'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa'i sa bon la'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed of the earth is the letter La.

original: bskyod pa'i khyab bdag chen po //
analyzed: bskyod pa'i khyab bdag chen po //
translated: The great lord of shaking.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar khyab bdag chen po rdo rje 'chang sku thams cad bskyed pa'o //🔽ta yi sde yi ge bzhi pa ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar khyab bdag chen po rdo rje 'chang sku thams cad bskyed pa'o // ta yi sde yi ge bzhi pa ni //
translated: Thus, the great lord Vajradhara generates all the bodies.🔽The fourth letter of the Ta group

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan kyi  bzhi pa dha'i yi ge'o /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan kyi  bzhi pa dha'i yi ge'o /
translated: The fourth letter of the Ta group is the letter Dha.

original: a'a yi dbyangs kyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: a'a yi dbyangs kyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: Adorned with the vowel A

original: zhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ge'i dbyangs kyis brgyan pa ste mdor na dh'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ge'i dbyangs kyis brgyan pa ste mdor na dh'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: Adorned with the vowel of the letter A, in brief, the letter Dha.

original: srid pa dang bral ba'i gzugs so zhes bya ba ni srid pa spangs pa gzugs kyi khams rnam par 'dzin par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: srid pa dang bral ba'i gzugs so zhes bya ba ni srid pa spangs pa gzugs kyi khams rnam par 'dzin par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The form free from existence means the one who has abandoned existence, who has become the bearer of the form realm.

original: nyi ma ai ldan zhes bya ba ni nyi ma ni ra'i yi ge ste ai'i yi ge dang ldan pas gnyis las ra'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: nyi ma ai ldan zhes bya ba ni nyi ma ni ra'i yi ge ste ai'i yi ge dang ldan pas gnyis las ra'i yi ge'o //
translated: The sun is the letter Ra, and by the addition of the vowel sign I, it becomes the letter Ri.

original: ro langs zhes bya ba ni ro langs te rnam par rtog pa thams cad za ba bo dang rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro bas so //🔽ta mtha'i sa bon gzung bar bya //
analyzed: ro langs zhes bya ba ni ro langs te rnam par rtog pa thams cad za ba bo dang rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro bas so // ta mtha'i sa bon gzung bar bya //
translated: The zombie is the eater of all conceptualizations, and it moves by magic.🔽The seed of the last of the Ta group is to be taken.

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma gzung ba'i sa bon na'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma gzung ba'i sa bon na'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed of the last of the Ta group is the letter Na.

original: dbyangs kyi gsum pas mgo la brgyan //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi gsum pas mgo la brgyan //
translated: It is adorned on the head with the third of the vowels.

original: zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ges mgo la brgyan pa ste mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ges mgo la brgyan pa ste mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
translated: It is adorned on the head with the vowel sign I, and so in brief it is the letter Ni.

original: sa gsum thams @65b cad gsod pa'o //
analyzed: sa gsum thams @65b cad gsod pa'o //
translated: It kills all three realms.

original: zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa la sogs pa thams cad gzung ba dang / lus dang ngag dang yid dang sa gsum ma lus pa'i bdud kyi bdag po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa la sogs pa thams cad gzung ba dang / lus dang ngag dang yid dang sa gsum ma lus pa'i bdud kyi bdag po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It kills all ignorance and so forth, and it is the lord of the demon of the three realms of body, speech, and mind.

original: ba sde'i mtha' ma'i sa bon ni //
analyzed: ba sde'i mtha' ma'i sa bon ni //
translated: The seed of the last of the Ba group is to be taken.

original: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma'i sa bon ma'i yi ge'o //🔽yid smra ba ni rtog med byed //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma'i sa bon ma'i yi ge'o // yid smra ba ni rtog med byed //
translated: The end of the earth is the seed of the letter Ma.🔽The mind-speech is the non-conceptual.

original: ces bya ba ni yid smra ba rnams kyis rnam par rtog pa rtog pa med par byed do //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni yid smra ba rnams kyis rnam par rtog pa rtog pa med par byed do //
translated: The mind-speech is the non-conceptualization of conceptualization.

original: sa mtha'i ni ha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: sa mtha'i ni ha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The end of the earth is the letter Ha.

original: a'a'i ngag ldan bzhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ge'i ngag dang ldan pa ste mdor na h'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: a'a'i ngag ldan bzhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ge'i ngag dang ldan pa ste mdor na h'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: The one who has the speech of the letter A is the one who has the speech of the letter A, in brief, the letter Ha.

original: thar pa'i bshes zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: thar pa'i bshes zhes bya ba ni //
translated: The friend of liberation is the friend of liberation.

original: rang gi chos la gnas pa rnams kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi thar bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi chos la gnas pa rnams kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi thar bar byed pa'o //
translated: The one who abides in one's own Dharma is liberated by the various Dharmas of the spiritual friend.

original: rtog pa zhes bya ba ni de slar yang rtog pa ste rang gi sems zhes bya bar dgongs so //🔽ma gnyis h'a gnyis brjod par bya //
analyzed: rtog pa zhes bya ba ni de slar yang rtog pa ste rang gi sems zhes bya bar dgongs so // ma gnyis h'a gnyis brjod par bya //
translated: The conceptualization is the conceptualization again, one's own mind, it is thought.🔽 The two Mas and two Has are the two Mas and two Has.

original: zhes bya ba ni ma'i yi ge dang h'a'i yi ge lan gnyis su brjod par bya ste ma h'a ma h'a zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ma'i yi ge dang h'a'i yi ge lan gnyis su brjod par bya ste ma h'a ma h'a zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The two Mas and two Has are to be uttered, that is, the two Mas and two Has are to be uttered, Ma Ha Ma Ha.

original: rmongs pa'i rang bzhin 'phrog cing 'phrog / ces bya ba ni gti mug chen po'i rang bzhin 'phrog pa ste 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid kyi sems de rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i rang bzhin 'phrog cing 'phrog / ces bya ba ni gti mug chen po'i rang bzhin 'phrog pa ste 'dod chags chen po'i bdag nyid kyi sems de rnam par rtog pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Stealing the nature of delusion, stealing, means stealing the nature of great delusion, that mind which is the nature of great passion, the meaning of the word thought.

original: ba'i sa bon ni pa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ba'i sa bon ni pa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed of the letter pha is the letter pha.
