original: sa bon la ai yig brgyan zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ges sbras ba ste gnyis las pa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: sa bon la ai yig brgyan zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ges sbras ba ste gnyis las pa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed is adorned with the letter i, means that it is combined with the letter i, the letter pha.

original: pha'i nags gzung nyams kun de nyid //
analyzed: pha'i nags gzung nyams kun de nyid //
translated: The forest of pha is grasped, the degeneration of experience, that reality.

original: ces bya ba ni pha'i nags ni dur khrod de bla ma'i gdams ngag gis rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi snying po ste sems can thams cad kyi gnas la yod par gzung bar nyams par 'gyur ro //🔽sha yi yi ge ai dang ldan //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni pha'i nags ni dur khrod de bla ma'i gdams ngag gis rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi snying po ste sems can thams cad kyi gnas la yod par gzung bar nyams par 'gyur ro // sha yi yi ge ai dang ldan //
translated: The forest of pha is the charnel ground, the essence of the yoginis by the guru's instruction, which is to be grasped as existing in the abode of all sentient beings.🔽The letter sha is endowed with the letter i.

original: zhes bya ba ni sha'i yi ge ai'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na shi'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sha'i yi ge ai'i yi ge dang ldan pa ste mdor na shi'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter sha is endowed with the letter i, in brief, the letter shi.

original: seng ge za ba yi ni sngags //
analyzed: seng ge za ba yi ni sngags //
translated: The mantra of the lion's eating,

original: zhes bya ba ni seng ges za ba'i sngags te srog byang chub kyi sems kyi lhan cig tu rnam par gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste de'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni seng ges za ba'i sngags te srog byang chub kyi sems kyi lhan cig tu rnam par gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste de'i don to //
translated: This is the mantra of the lion, which should be held together with the life-force, the bodhicitta, is the meaning.

original: ta'i sngags zhes bya ba ni ti'i yi ge'i sngags so //
analyzed: ta'i sngags zhes bya ba ni ti'i yi ge'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra of the letter ti is the mantra of the letter ti.

original: slar yang 'chi med skye zhes bya ba ni srog gis zos pa'i slar yang bde ba chen po nyid 'chi ba med pa nyid kyis bskyed pa'i lha nyid thob pa ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku zhes bya bar dgongs so //🔽ba mtha' a'a yi yi ges dgang //🔽zhes bya ba ni ba'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: slar yang 'chi med skye zhes bya ba ni srog gis zos pa'i slar yang bde ba chen po nyid 'chi ba med pa nyid kyis bskyed pa'i lha nyid thob pa ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku zhes bya bar dgongs so // ba mtha' a'a yi yi ges dgang // zhes bya ba ni ba'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge'o //
translated: Again, the birth of immortality is the attainment of the deity generated by the life-force, which is the state of great bliss, immortality, the state of Great Vajradhara, is the thought.🔽The last of the va class is filled with the letter a.

original: a'a'i yi @66a * //🔽ges dgang pa'o //🔽thig les cod pan la reg pa'o //
analyzed: a'a'i yi @66a * // ges dgang pa'o // thig les cod pan la reg pa'o //
translated: The last of the va class is the letter ma.🔽It is filled with the letter a.🔽The top of the head is touched with a drop.

original: zhes bya ba ni thig les cod pan la reg pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thig les cod pan la reg pa'o //
translated: The top of the head is touched with a drop.

original: mdor na m'am gi yi ge'o //
analyzed: mdor na m'am gi yi ge'o //
translated: In brief, the letter ma.

original: brgya la 'chi ba rtog pa yin //
analyzed: brgya la 'chi ba rtog pa yin //
translated: If death is imagined,

original: zhes bya ba ni sems la nam yang 'chi ba med pa'am rig pa sna tshogs pa'i sems can kyang ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sems la nam yang 'chi ba med pa'am rig pa sna tshogs pa'i sems can kyang ngo //
translated: This is the mind that is never subject to death, or the mind of sentient beings with various cognitions.

original: de ltar rnam par rtog pas rnam par brtags pas skye ba dang 'chi ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar rnam par rtog pas rnam par brtags pas skye ba dang 'chi ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, by being imagined by conceptualization, there is birth, death, and so on.

original: ci'i phyir skye ba med do //
analyzed: ci'i phyir skye ba med do //
translated: Why is there no birth?

original: cis na 'chi bas mi 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: cis na 'chi bas mi 'chi ba'o //
translated: Why is there no death by death?

original: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur pas sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa rnam par dpyad de /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur pas sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa rnam par dpyad de /
translated: Thus, it is explained that it is like an illusion, and so on, and is analyzed.

original: le'u dang por gsungs pa yis kyang ngo //🔽sa yig dbyangs gnyis brjod phyir brgyan //
analyzed: le'u dang por gsungs pa yis kyang ngo // sa yig dbyangs gnyis brjod phyir brgyan //
translated: It is also stated in the first chapter.🔽The syllable sa is adorned with the second vowel sign.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa'i yi ge la dbyangs kyi gnyis pas brjod pa'i don du brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa'i yi ge la dbyangs kyi gnyis pas brjod pa'i don du brgyan pa'o //
translated: This is the syllable sa adorned with the second vowel sign for the purpose of expression.

original: mdor na sa'i yi ger 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mdor na sa'i yi ger 'gyur ro //
translated: In brief, it becomes the syllable sa.

original: sngon du 'phrog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sngon du 'phrog par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the initial plunderer.

original: zhes bya ba ni thog mar skye ba la sogs par so sor 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thog mar skye ba la sogs par so sor 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the initial plunderer of birth and so on.

original: sha gnas sa bon dur khrod de //
analyzed: sha gnas sa bon dur khrod de //
translated: The seed of the abode of flesh is the charnel ground.

original: zhes bya ba ni sha'i yi ger gnas pa'i sa bon gyi dur khrod de gang du dbugs kyi 'khor lo zad nas 'gro ba'o //🔽ta mtha'i yi ge ai dang ldan //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sha'i yi ger gnas pa'i sa bon gyi dur khrod de gang du dbugs kyi 'khor lo zad nas 'gro ba'o // ta mtha'i yi ge ai dang ldan //
translated: This is the cemetery of the seed-syllable located in the flesh, where the wheel of breath goes to cease.🔽The last of the Ta group, endowed with the vowel I.

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma na'i yi ge la ai'i yi ges ldan pa ste mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma na'i yi ge la ai'i yi ges ldan pa ste mdor na ni'i yi ge'o //
translated: The last of the Ta group is the letter Na, endowed with the vowel I, that is, the letter Ni.

original: thams cad rang bzhin med pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad rang bzhin med pa'o //
translated: All are devoid of intrinsic nature.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad rnam par rtog par rang bzhin med pa'i gzugs su shes par bya'o //🔽pa sde'i mtha' ma aa dbyangs ldan //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad rnam par rtog par rang bzhin med pa'i gzugs su shes par bya'o // pa sde'i mtha' ma aa dbyangs ldan //
translated: All mundane and supramundane [phenomena] should be known to be forms devoid of the intrinsic nature of conceptualization.🔽The last of the Pa group, endowed with the vowel A.

original: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge ste a'a'i dbyangs kyis bkang bas mdor na ma'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge ste a'a'i dbyangs kyis bkang bas mdor na ma'i yi ge'o //
translated: The last of the Pa group is the letter Ma, filled with the vowel A, that is, the letter Ma.

original: sdang ba'i yid ni 'dzin chen po //
analyzed: sdang ba'i yid ni 'dzin chen po //
translated: The mind of hatred is the great grasping.

original: zhes bya ba ni sdang ba'i rnam par 'dzin pas yid chen po ste rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin la 'jog pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sdang ba'i rnam par 'dzin pas yid chen po ste rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin la 'jog pa'o //
translated: The mind of great grasping due to the grasping of hatred is placed in the intrinsic nature of self-awareness.

original: na yig au ldan zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge au'i stan can te mdor na nu'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: na yig au ldan zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge au'i stan can te mdor na nu'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter Na with the vowel Au is the letter Nu in short.

original: rtog kun sel zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad byang chub dang ye shes kyang ngo //
analyzed: rtog kun sel zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad byang chub dang ye shes kyang ngo //
translated: All concepts are removed means that all concepts are removed by enlightenment and wisdom.

original: sel bar byed pa'am sreg par byed pa po'o //
analyzed: sel bar byed pa'am sreg par byed pa po'o //
translated: It is the remover or the burner.

original: sha sde'i gnyis pa'i sa bon ni //
analyzed: sha sde'i gnyis pa'i sa bon ni //
translated: The seed of the second of the Sha

original: zhes bya ba ni sha'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i sa bon sha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sha'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i sa bon sha'i yi ge'o //
translated: group is the seed of the second of the Sha group, the letter Sha.

original: a'a yis mgor reg ces bya ba ni a'a'i yi ges mgo la reg pa'o //
analyzed: a'a yis mgor reg ces bya ba ni a'a'i yi ges mgo la reg pa'o //
translated: The head is touched by the letter A means that the head is touched by the letter A.

original: thig le gnas zhes bya ba @66b ni de la de ltar mgo la rjes kyi dbyangs thig le gnas pa'o //
analyzed: thig le gnas zhes bya ba @66b ni de la de ltar mgo la rjes kyi dbyangs thig le gnas pa'o //
translated: The bindu is located means that the head is touched by the letter A, and the bindu of the following vowel is located there.

original: sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni 'di byang chub sgrub pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni 'di byang chub sgrub pa'i sngags so //
translated: The accomplishment means that this is the mantra for accomplishing enlightenment.

original: gang du na thur du sel ba'i rlung du'o zhes bya ba ste thur sel gyi rlung ngo //
analyzed: gang du na thur du sel ba'i rlung du'o zhes bya ba ste thur sel gyi rlung ngo //
translated: Where? In the downward-voiding wind.

original: de ltar mdor na sh'am gi yi ge'o //
analyzed: de ltar mdor na sh'am gi yi ge'o //
translated: Thus, in short, the letter Sha or Gi.

original: ta dang nga yi yi ge gnyis //
analyzed: ta dang nga yi yi ge gnyis //
translated: The two letters Ta and Nga

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge ra'i yi ge'i stan can te gnyis kyi yi ge gcig ste mdor na tra'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge ra'i yi ge'i stan can te gnyis kyi yi ge gcig ste mdor na tra'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter ta is the seat of the letter ra, and the two are one letter. In brief, it is the letter tra.

original: sa ni 'jigs par byed sngags so //
analyzed: sa ni 'jigs par byed sngags so //
translated: The letter sa is the mantra of fear.

original: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum gyi sdang ba'i ma ma rnams 'jigs par byed pa'i yi ge'o //🔽pa ra a'a yig sa bon gcig / ces bya ba ni pa'i yi ge dang ra'i yi ge gcig pa'i sa bon te //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum gyi sdang ba'i ma ma rnams 'jigs par byed pa'i yi ge'o // pa ra a'a yig sa bon gcig / ces bya ba ni pa'i yi ge dang ra'i yi ge gcig pa'i sa bon te //
translated: The letter that terrifies the nurses of the three worlds is the letter sa. 🔽The letter pa is the seed of the letter a.

original: aa'i yi ge dang yang lhan cig ste mdor na pr'a yi yi ge'o //
analyzed: aa'i yi ge dang yang lhan cig ste mdor na pr'a yi yi ge'o //
translated: The letter pa is the seed of the letter ra, and it is also together with the letter a. In brief, it is the letter pra.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum skyo dub 'joms //🔽zhes bya ba ni sum cu rtsa gsum du skyo ba dang dub pa rnam par 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum skyo dub 'joms // zhes bya ba ni sum cu rtsa gsum du skyo ba dang dub pa rnam par 'joms pa'o //
translated: It destroys the fatigue of the gods of the Thirty-Three.

original: ya sde'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ya sde'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter va is the last of the group of letters beginning with ya.

original: ri dang ldan zhes bya ba ni ri'i yi ge dbyangs mnan pa ste mdor na bri'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ri dang ldan zhes bya ba ni ri'i yi ge dbyangs mnan pa ste mdor na bri'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter ri is the letter ri with the vowel sign suppressed. In brief, it is the letter vri.

original: ye shes kyi ni dag byed do //
analyzed: ye shes kyi ni dag byed do //
translated: It purifies wisdom.

original: zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi dag byed de bya ba thams cad kyi thams cad du'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi dag byed de bya ba thams cad kyi thams cad du'o //
translated: This is the purification of intuition, in all respects.

original: na yi 'gram gnas sa bon ni //
analyzed: na yi 'gram gnas sa bon ni //
translated: The seed that is located in the ear

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the letter ta.

original: ae yi yi ges rnar brgyan pa //
analyzed: ae yi yi ges rnar brgyan pa //
translated: The letter e adorns the ear

original: zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ges rna ba la brgyan pa ste gnyis kyis te'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ae'i yi ges rna ba la brgyan pa ste gnyis kyis te'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the letter e adorning the ear, the two of them being the letter ta.

original: rnal 'byor pa yi mi shes 'joms //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yi mi shes 'joms //
translated: It conquers the ignorance of the yogi

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis mi shes pa 'joms pa ste rnal 'byor gyi ye shes bskyed pas so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis mi shes pa 'joms pa ste rnal 'byor gyi ye shes bskyed pas so //
translated: This is the generation of the intuition of yoga by conquering the ignorance of the yogis.

original: s'a yig a'a yi yi ges dgang //
analyzed: s'a yig a'a yi yi ges dgang //
translated: The letter sa is filled with the letter a

original: zhes bya ba ni s'ai yi ge a'a'i yi ges dgang ba ste mdor na s'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni s'ai yi ge a'a'i yi ges dgang ba ste mdor na s'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the letter sa filled with the letter a, in brief, the letter sa.

original: dbugs 'chad pa ni nyams par byed //
analyzed: dbugs 'chad pa ni nyams par byed //
translated: It destroys the cessation of breath

original: ces bya ba ni dngos po rnams kyi dbugs 'chad pa 'joms par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni dngos po rnams kyi dbugs 'chad pa 'joms par byed pa'o //
translated: This is the destruction of the cessation of breath of things.

original: na sngags dbyangs gsum mgo la brgyan //
analyzed: na sngags dbyangs gsum mgo la brgyan //
translated: The mantra na is adorned with the three tones at the beginning

original: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge sngags la a'a'i yi ges brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge sngags la a'a'i yi ges brgyan pa'o //
translated: This is the letter na adorned with the letter a of the mantra.

original: chos dang chos min spong rang bzhin//
analyzed: chos dang chos min spong rang bzhin//
translated: The nature of abandoning the Dharma and non-Dharma.

original: zhes bya ba ni chos dang chos ma yi pa bzlog pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos dang chos ma yi pa bzlog pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: This is the nature of abandoning the Dharma and non-Dharma.

original: mdor na n'i'i yi ger 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mdor na n'i'i yi ger 'gyur ro //
translated: In brief, it becomes the letter Ṇ.

original: dha yig ya dang sbyar ba ste //
analyzed: dha yig ya dang sbyar ba ste //
translated: The letter Ḍha is joined with Ya.

original: zhes bya ba ni dh'i yi ge dang ya'i yi ges sbyar ba dhya'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dh'i yi ge dang ya'i yi ges sbyar ba dhya'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the letter Ḍhyā, which is joined with the letter Ḍha and the letter Ya.

original: bsam gtan sngags kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan sngags kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of the mantra of meditation.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi sngags kyi rang @67a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi sngags kyi rang @67a * //
translated: This is the nature of the mantra of meditation.

original: bzhin te rab tu dbab pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bzhin te rab tu dbab pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means to descend.

original: ta sde'i mtha' ma gzung bya ste //
analyzed: ta sde'i mtha' ma gzung bya ste //
translated: The last of the Ta group should be taken.

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma na'i yi ge gzung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma na'i yi ge gzung ba'o //
translated: This is taking the letter Ṇ, which is the last of the Ta group.

original: grong khyer ltar snang dngos po med //
analyzed: grong khyer ltar snang dngos po med //
translated: The city-like appearance is unreal.

original: ces bya ba ni ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer yod pa nyid na med pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer yod pa nyid na med pa'o //
translated: This means that just as a gandharva city exists but is not real,

original: de bzhin du chos 'di thams cad dngos po med pa de'i dngos po'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos 'di thams cad dngos po med pa de'i dngos po'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: in the same way, all these phenomena are unreal, and that is their reality.

original: ya sde'i gnyis pa'i sa bon ni //
analyzed: ya sde'i gnyis pa'i sa bon ni //
translated: The seed of the second of the Ya group.

original: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i sa bon ra'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i sa bon ra'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the seed syllable of the second [letter] of the YA class, the letter RA.

original: gti mug rang bzhin 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: gti mug rang bzhin 'bar ba'o //
translated: Ignorance is the nature of blazing.

original: zhes bya ba ni gti mug gi rang bzhin 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gti mug gi rang bzhin 'bar ba'o //
translated: This is the nature of ignorance, blazing.

original: sa yig ai yi yi ges dbye //
analyzed: sa yig ai yi yi ges dbye //
translated: The syllable SA is divided by the syllable I.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa'i yi ge ai'i yi ges phye bas mdor na si'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa'i yi ge ai'i yi ges phye bas mdor na si'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the syllable SA divided by the syllable I, in brief the syllable SI.

original: seng ge ma he 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: seng ge ma he 'joms pa'o //
translated: It destroys lions and buffaloes.

original: zhes bya ba ni seng ge rnams dang ma he rnams kyi lus 'joms shing 'chi byed kyi gzugs nyid pas sdang ba'i sems can de rnams kyi nga rgyal 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni seng ge rnams dang ma he rnams kyi lus 'joms shing 'chi byed kyi gzugs nyid pas sdang ba'i sems can de rnams kyi nga rgyal 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that it destroys the bodies of lions and buffaloes, and since it is the form of the destroyer, it has the meaning of destroying the pride of those hostile beings.

original: nyi mar yang ni gnas pa ni //
analyzed: nyi mar yang ni gnas pa ni //
translated: It abides in the sun.

original: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma ni ra'i yi ge ste yongs su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma ni ra'i yi ge ste yongs su gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the syllable RA of the sun, which is fully present.

original: rnal 'byor ma kun rgyal po'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma kun rgyal po'o //
translated: It is the king of all yoginis.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi rgyal srid la rgyal zhing 'bar bas na rgyal po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi rgyal srid la rgyal zhing 'bar bas na rgyal po'o //
translated: This is the king who is victorious and blazing over the kingdom of all yoginis.

original: pa sde mtha' ma a'a dbyangs brgyan //
analyzed: pa sde mtha' ma a'a dbyangs brgyan //
translated: The final member of the PA class is adorned with the vowel A.

original: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge la a'a'i yi ges brgyan pa ste gnyis las yang m'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni pa'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma ma'i yi ge la a'a'i yi ges brgyan pa ste gnyis las yang m'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: The last letter of the “pa” group, the letter “ma,” is adorned with the letter “a,” and from the two, the letter “ma.”

original: sgyu mar sems can kun nges 'dzin //🔽zhes bya ba ni sgyu mar sems can thams cad nges par 'dzin pa ste de rnams kyi bdag nyid dang bral ba nyid kyis gti mug la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: sgyu mar sems can kun nges 'dzin // zhes bya ba ni sgyu mar sems can thams cad nges par 'dzin pa ste de rnams kyi bdag nyid dang bral ba nyid kyis gti mug la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: One should know the seed of the earth.🔽One should know the seed of the earth, the letter “la.”🔽One should know the seed of the earth.

original: 'dzin pa'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni sa'i sa bon la'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni sa'i sa bon la'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed of the earth is the letter “la.”🔽Adorned with the letter “a,”

original: a'a yig brgyan zhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ge'i steng du brgyan pa ste mdor na l'a'i yi ger 'gyur ro //
analyzed: a'a yig brgyan zhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ge'i steng du brgyan pa ste mdor na l'a'i yi ger 'gyur ro //
translated: adorned with the letter “a,” that is, with the letter “a” above, in brief, the letter “la.”

original: de kho na yi ye shes 'thob //
analyzed: de kho na yi ye shes 'thob //
translated: One should know the wisdom of reality.

original: ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor bas thob pa'i de kho na nyid kyi ye shes shes par bya ba'o //🔽de ltar rkang pa bcu bzhi po //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor bas thob pa'i de kho na nyid kyi ye shes shes par bya ba'o // de ltar rkang pa bcu bzhi po //
translated: One should know the wisdom of reality that is attained by the yogin.🔽Thus, the fourteen lines.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar rkang pa bcu bzhi ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar rkang pa bcu bzhi ni /
translated: Thus, the fourteen lines,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely,🔽kha,🔽ka,

original: kha dv'am ga / ka p'a la /
analyzed: kha dv'am ga / ka p'a la /
translated: pala,

original: dh'a ri ni /
analyzed: dh'a ri ni /
translated: dhāriṇī,

original: ma h'a ma h'a /
analyzed: ma h'a ma h'a /
translated: Mahāmahā.🔽Piśitā.

original: pi shit'a / m'am sa /
analyzed: pi shit'a / m'am sa /
translated: Māṃsa.

original: aa sha ni /
analyzed: aa sha ni /
translated: Aśani.

original: m'a nu sh'antra pr'a pritte /
analyzed: m'a nu sh'antra pr'a pritte /
translated: Mānuṣāntrapraprite.🔽Sannihyama.

original: sanni dhyam / na ra s'i ra /
analyzed: sanni dhyam / na ra s'i ra /
translated: Narasiṃha.

original: m'a la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: m'a la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The name is Māla.

original: sems can kun gyis mi shes gsod //
analyzed: sems can kun gyis mi shes gsod //
translated: All beings do not know the killing.

original: ces bya ba ni rkang pa 'di @67b rnams kyis gsod pa ste sems can rnams kyis mi shes pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rkang pa 'di @67b rnams kyis gsod pa ste sems can rnams kyis mi shes pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is the killing, which is not known by all beings, according to the intention.

original: 'di skad gsungs zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje phag mo sdud par mdzad pa mo'i chig ste lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
analyzed: 'di skad gsungs zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje phag mo sdud par mdzad pa mo'i chig ste lhag ma rtogs par sla'o //
translated: Thus spoken and so forth is the summary of the complete wheel of Vajravārāhī, the speech of the compiler. The rest is easy to understand.

original: 'di ni 'khrul 'khor gyi yi ge 'khor lo lnga pa'o//
analyzed: 'di ni 'khrul 'khor gyi yi ge 'khor lo lnga pa'o//
translated: This is the five-spoked wheel of the machine letters.

original: da ni phyi rol du 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo drug pa yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni phyi rol du 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo drug pa yang gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the six-spoked wheel of the external machine is also stated:

original: ka yi sde yi dbus ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ka yi sde yi dbus ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The middle of the ka group, and so forth.

original: ka sde'i dbus gnas ra stan can //
analyzed: ka sde'i dbus gnas ra stan can //
translated: The middle of the ka group, with the seat of ra.

original: zhes bya ba ni ka'i sde tshan gyi dbus ma ga'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ka'i sde tshan gyi dbus ma ga'i yi ge'o //
translated: The middle of the ka group is the letter ga.

original: ra'i yi ge stan can te gnyis la gra'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ra'i yi ge stan can te gnyis la gra'i yi ge'o //
translated: The letter Ra is the seat, and the two are the letter Gra.

original: gsum de'i mgo la thig le sbyin //
analyzed: gsum de'i mgo la thig le sbyin //
translated: The third has a dot placed on its head.

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du gsum pa de'i mgo la thig le sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du gsum pa de'i mgo la thig le sbyin par bya'o //
translated: As before, a dot is placed on the head of the third.

original: theg pa mchog gi chos can no //
analyzed: theg pa mchog gi chos can no //
translated: It is the Dharma of the supreme vehicle.

original: zhes bya ba ni theg pa mchog ste lhag ma ma lus par 'gro ba'i chos te de de ltar yang sa dang po zhes bya ba la nye bar spyad pa bcu gnyis so //🔽ta sde'i gnyis pa'i yi ge ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni theg pa mchog ste lhag ma ma lus par 'gro ba'i chos te de de ltar yang sa dang po zhes bya ba la nye bar spyad pa bcu gnyis so // ta sde'i gnyis pa'i yi ge ni //
translated: The supreme vehicle is the Dharma of going without remainder. Thus, the first stage is called the twelve practices.🔽The second letter of the Ta group.

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i yi ge tha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi gnyis pa'i yi ge tha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The second letter of the Ta group is the letter Tha.

original: aa yi dbyangs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: aa yi dbyangs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with the vowel of Ah.

original: zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ge'i dbyangs dang ldan pa ste gnyis las thi'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ai'i yi ge'i dbyangs dang ldan pa ste gnyis las thi'i yi ge'o //
translated: It is endowed with the vowel of the letter I, and the two are the letter Thi.

original: mu stegs rnal 'byor nyams pa'o //
analyzed: mu stegs rnal 'byor nyams pa'o //
translated: It is the degeneration of the yoga of the tirthikas.

original: zhes bya ba ni gnas pa gang zhig mu stegs la sogs pa sdang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi rnal 'byor de bzhin gyi dgongs pa mi byed pa'i phyir nyams pa ste sngags kyi yi ge 'khyog po'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnas pa gang zhig mu stegs la sogs pa sdang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi rnal 'byor de bzhin gyi dgongs pa mi byed pa'i phyir nyams pa ste sngags kyi yi ge 'khyog po'o //
translated: This is the degeneration of the yoga of the tirthikas and so on, because they do not contemplate the intended meaning.

original: ta'i yi ge rtogs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ta'i yi ge rtogs par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The letter ta is the revealer.

original: ta'i yi ge rtogs par byed de mu stegs la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor nyams par bya ba'i phyir rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor la rab tu gnas pa dang 'bong pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: ta'i yi ge rtogs par byed de mu stegs la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor nyams par bya ba'i phyir rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor la rab tu gnas pa dang 'bong pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The letter ta is the revealer, because it is the revealer of the degeneration of the yoga of the tirthikas and so on.

original: ta sde'i bzhir gnas a'a dang ldan //
analyzed: ta sde'i bzhir gnas a'a dang ldan //
translated: The fourth of the ta group, endowed with ā.

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi bzhi par gnas pa dha'i yi ge ste aa'i yi ges bkang bas gnyis las dha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi bzhi par gnas pa dha'i yi ge ste aa'i yi ges bkang bas gnyis las dha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The fourth of the ta group is the letter ḍha, filled with the letter ā, and from the two comes the letter ḍha.

original: byang chub mtha' med 'dzin pa po //
analyzed: byang chub mtha' med 'dzin pa po //
translated: The holder of the infinite enlightenment.

original: zhes bya ba ni mtha' med pa'i byang chub kyi lam 'dzin pa sngags 'di'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mtha' med pa'i byang chub kyi lam 'dzin pa sngags 'di'o //
translated: This mantra holds the path of infinite enlightenment.

original: ra gnas pa la dbyangs gsum brgyan //
analyzed: ra gnas pa la dbyangs gsum brgyan //
translated: The letter ra is adorned with three vowels.

original: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge gnas pa la gsum pa'i yi ge ais brgyan pa ste mdor na ri'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ra'i yi ge gnas pa la gsum pa'i yi ge ais brgyan pa ste mdor na ri'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the letter ra, adorned with the third [i.e. i], in short, the letter ri.

original: rnal 'byor ma kun 'char pa po //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma kun 'char pa po //
translated: The awakener of all yoginis.🔽This is the

original: zhes bya ba @68a * //🔽ni rtsa thams cad shar ba dang rnal 'byor ma'i thugs kar te ye shes kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba @68a * // ni rtsa thams cad shar ba dang rnal 'byor ma'i thugs kar te ye shes kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: meaning.

original: na sngags ai yi ga gis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: na sngags ai yi ga gis brgyan pa'o //
translated: The letter na, adorned with the letter i.

original: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge'i sngags ai'i yi ges brgyan pa ste gnyis kyis ni'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge'i sngags ai'i yi ges brgyan pa ste gnyis kyis ni'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the letter na, adorned with the letter i, the two together are the letter ni.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ni lam //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ni lam //
translated: The path of all yoginis.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi lam ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi lam ste /
translated: This is the path of all yoginis,

original: ao nyan la sogs pa'i lam du 'dzag pas sems can gyi don byed pa zhes bya ba'o //🔽sumbha ni yi tshig rkang ste //
analyzed: ao nyan la sogs pa'i lam du 'dzag pas sems can gyi don byed pa zhes bya ba'o // sumbha ni yi tshig rkang ste //
translated: the path of the ear and so forth, the meaning is that one goes by the magic of gnosis.🔽The line of sumbha.

original: sumbha'i yi ge gsum sngags kyi tshig go //
analyzed: sumbha'i yi ge gsum sngags kyi tshig go //
translated: The three letters of sumbha are the mantra.

original: lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya //
translated: It should be recited twice.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar sngags kyi tshig lan gnyis su brjod par bya ste sumbha ni sumbha zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar sngags kyi tshig lan gnyis su brjod par bya ste sumbha ni sumbha zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, the mantra words are to be uttered twice, namely, “sum-bhe sum-bhe.”

original: tshig drug rtogs pa'i de nyid do //🔽zhes bya ba ni tshig drug rtogs pa'i de kho na nyid de yi ge'i don dang / yan lag ma lus pa dang / snying po dang / drang ba'i drang /
analyzed: tshig drug rtogs pa'i de nyid do // zhes bya ba ni tshig drug rtogs pa'i de kho na nyid de yi ge'i don dang / yan lag ma lus pa dang / snying po dang / drang ba'i drang /
translated: The reality of the realization of the six words.

original: sgra ji lta ba dang / sgra ji lta ba ma yin ba dang / tshig drug gi rtogs pas sems can rnams la 'chad pa dang de kho na nyid shes pa'i phyir zhes bya bar go bar bya'o //🔽de bzhin du ni sumbha'i sngags //
analyzed: sgra ji lta ba dang / sgra ji lta ba ma yin ba dang / tshig drug gi rtogs pas sems can rnams la 'chad pa dang de kho na nyid shes pa'i phyir zhes bya bar go bar bya'o // de bzhin du ni sumbha'i sngags //
translated: The reality of the realization of the six words is to be understood as the meaning of the syllables, the complete limbs, the essence, the literal and non-literal, and the explanation to sentient beings by the realization of the six words, and because of the knowledge of reality.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi mchod rang bzhin //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi mchod rang bzhin //
translated: The Sumbha mantra is the nature of the yoginis’ worship.

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du sumbha'i sngags ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi mchod pa'i rang bzhin te 'khyud pa dang 'o bya ba la sogs pas mi 'pho ba'i de kho na nyid byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du sumbha'i sngags ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi mchod pa'i rang bzhin te 'khyud pa dang 'o bya ba la sogs pas mi 'pho ba'i de kho na nyid byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa'o //
translated: The Sumbha mantra is the nature of the worship of the yoginis, because of the falling of the reality of non-emission, the bodhicitta, by means of embracing, kissing, and so forth.

original: ha na'i sngags ni lan gnyis brjod //
analyzed: ha na'i sngags ni lan gnyis brjod //
translated: The mantra of hana is repeated twice.

original: ces bya ba ni ha na'i sngags kyi yi ge gnyis bklags pas bklag par bya ste ha na ha na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni ha na'i sngags kyi yi ge gnyis bklags pas bklag par bya ste ha na ha na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is to be read by reading the two syllables of the mantra of hana, namely hana hana.

original: sdang pa'i theg pa nyams par byed //
analyzed: sdang pa'i theg pa nyams par byed //
translated: It destroys the vehicle of hatred.

original: ces bya ba ni sdang ba thams cad kyi dman pa'i yi shes te kun du rtogs pa nges par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sdang ba thams cad kyi dman pa'i yi shes te kun du rtogs pa nges par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the inferior knowledge of all hatred, called the destroyer of conceptualization.🔽The single syllable of the letter pa and the letter a.

original: pa ra a'a yi yi ge gcig / ces bya ba ni pa'i yi ge'i dang ra'i yi ge dang a'a'i yi ge gcig pa'i yi ge ste /
analyzed: pa ra a'a yi yi ge gcig / ces bya ba ni pa'i yi ge'i dang ra'i yi ge dang a'a'i yi ge gcig pa'i yi ge ste /
translated: This is the letter pa and the letter ra and the single letter a.

original: de dag gis pra'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: de dag gis pra'i yi ge'o //
translated: By those, the letter pra.

original: dbang po rang rang ngo bo gzhan //
analyzed: dbang po rang rang ngo bo gzhan //
translated: The nature of each sense faculty is different.

original: zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rang rang gi rang bzhin gzhan te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes te ye shes kyi dbang po rnams dang mngon par shes pa drug nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rang rang gi rang bzhin gzhan te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes te ye shes kyi dbang po rnams dang mngon par shes pa drug nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the other nature of each sense faculty such as the eye, namely supramundane knowledge. The meaning is that by the knowledge faculties and the six superknowledges.

original: na a'a aam gis dgang pa'o //
analyzed: na a'a aam gis dgang pa'o //
translated: It is filled with na, a, and am.

original: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge dang a'a'i yi ge dang aam gi yi ge ste mdor @68b na nam gi yi ge ste slar yang sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge dang a'a'i yi ge dang aam gi yi ge ste mdor @68b na nam gi yi ge ste slar yang sbyin par bya'o //
translated: The na syllable, the a syllable, and the aṃ syllable, in brief, the naṃ syllable, should be given again.

original: sa bon 'di ni yon tan sngags //
analyzed: sa bon 'di ni yon tan sngags //
translated: This seed is the mantra of the qualities.

original: zhes bya ba ni de ltar sa bon gyi yon tan snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i sngags te snang ba gsum gyi rang bzhin du nges pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de ltar sa bon gyi yon tan snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i sngags te snang ba gsum gyi rang bzhin du nges pa'o //
translated: Thus, the seed mantra of the qualities, sattva, rajas, and tamas, is ascertained as the nature of the three lights.

original: sa yig ni sa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: sa yig ni sa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The syllable sa is the syllable of the earth.

original: rtsa kun 'dzag pa'o zhes bya ba ni rtsa thams cad nas 'dzag pa ste dbang po sna tshogs pa'i ming dang lta ba la sogs pa bde ba skyed pa ste /
analyzed: rtsa kun 'dzag pa'o zhes bya ba ni rtsa thams cad nas 'dzag pa ste dbang po sna tshogs pa'i ming dang lta ba la sogs pa bde ba skyed pa ste /
translated: The ku is the dripping of all the channels, the arising of bliss from the various sense organs, the eyes, and so on.

original: de nyid de ltar sems bde pa de 'dzag pas kun rdzob kyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid de ltar sems bde pa de 'dzag pas kun rdzob kyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Since that very thing drips as the bliss of the mind, it is the meaning of relative wisdom.

original: ba yig ra yi yi ges brgyan //
analyzed: ba yig ra yi yi ges brgyan //
translated: The syllable ba is adorned with the syllable ra.

original: ri zhes bya ba ni ba'i yi ge la ra'i yi ges brgyan pa ste gnyis las rba'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: ri zhes bya ba ni ba'i yi ge la ra'i yi ges brgyan pa ste gnyis las rba'i yi ge'o //
translated: The ri is the syllable ba adorned with the syllable ra, which is the syllable rva from the two.

original: ri yi sngags ni ri ri rab //
analyzed: ri yi sngags ni ri ri rab //
translated: The mantra of the ri is the ri ri rab.

original: ces bya ba ni thams cad kyi rten gyi gzugs te dngos grub rnams kyi yang ngo //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni thams cad kyi rten gyi gzugs te dngos grub rnams kyi yang ngo //
translated: This is the form of the support of all, and also of the powers.

original: ji ltar ri rab dngos grub chen po brgyad la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar ri rab dngos grub chen po brgyad la sogs pa ste /
translated: Just as Sumeru is the support of the eight great powers and so on,

original: de bzhin du sngags kyi yi ge 'di dngos grub chen po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngags kyi yi ge 'di dngos grub chen po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub pa'o //
translated: so this mantra syllable is the power of the Tathagata, the great powers and so on.

original: pa gnas zhes bya ba ni pa'i yi ge bdag nyid gnas pa ste nam mkha' la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la 'gro bas 'jug pa na chos kyi dbyings 'od gsal ba ste thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: pa gnas zhes bya ba ni pa'i yi ge bdag nyid gnas pa ste nam mkha' la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la 'gro bas 'jug pa na chos kyi dbyings 'od gsal ba ste thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: The abode of the letter pa is the abode of the nature of the letter pa. Entering space means that when entering by going in space, it is the clear light of the realm of phenomena, the nature of method and wisdom.

original: sa yi yid gnas kun gyi gzugs //
analyzed: sa yi yid gnas kun gyi gzugs //
translated: The form of all abodes of the mind of earth.

original: zhes bya ba ni sa'i yi ge gnas pa ste de yang gzugs zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sa'i yi ge gnas pa ste de yang gzugs zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad do //
translated: The abode of the letter of earth is also form, which is the realm of phenomena of all.

original: de ltar khams gsum gyi khang pa'i gzugs kyi yi ge rnal 'byor ma ye shes zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar khams gsum gyi khang pa'i gzugs kyi yi ge rnal 'byor ma ye shes zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus, the form of the house of the three realms is the mantra syllable, the yoginis, and the wisdom.

original: ya sde'i mtha' ma a'a yis dgang //
analyzed: ya sde'i mtha' ma a'a yis dgang //
translated: The end of the ya class is drawn out by a.

original: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ya'i sde tshan gyi mtha' ma wa'i yi ge'o //
translated: This is the letter Va, the last of the Ya class.

original: a'a'i yi ges dgang pa ste gnyis las w'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: a'a'i yi ges dgang pa ste gnyis las w'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: It is filled with the letter A, and from the two comes the letter Va.

original: rlung ni srog gi ye shes so //
analyzed: rlung ni srog gi ye shes so //
translated: Wind is the wisdom of life.

original: zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung aa wa dh'u t'ir zhugs pa'i ye shes ni chos thams cad rtogs pa'o //🔽na yig a'a yi yi ges dgang //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung aa wa dh'u t'ir zhugs pa'i ye shes ni chos thams cad rtogs pa'o // na yig a'a yi yi ges dgang //
translated: This is the wisdom of the life-wind entering the avadhūtī, which is the realization of all phenomena.🔽The letter Na is filled with the letter A.

original: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge'i sngags a'a'i yi ges dgang par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge'i sngags a'a'i yi ges dgang par bya'o //
translated: This is the mantra of the letter Na filled with the letter A.

original: byang chub gang du 'ang mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub gang du 'ang mi rtog pa'o //
translated: Enlightenment is not imagined anywhere.

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub la rtogs par mi byed do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub la rtogs par mi byed do //
translated: This is not imagining enlightenment.

original: de nam yang mi byed do //
analyzed: de nam yang mi byed do //
translated: That is never done.

original: thig le'i mgo la blta bar bya //
analyzed: thig le'i mgo la blta bar bya //
translated: One should look at the head of the drop.

original: zhes bya ba ni thig le stong pa mgo la ba lta'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thig le stong pa mgo la ba lta'o //
translated: This is looking at the head of the empty drop.

original: mdor na n'am gi yi ger 'gyur ro //🔽pa'i mtha' ma'i sa bon ni pa'i sde tshan gyi @69a * //
analyzed: mdor na n'am gi yi ger 'gyur ro // pa'i mtha' ma'i sa bon ni pa'i sde tshan gyi @69a * //
translated: In brief, it becomes the letter Naṃ.🔽The seed of the last of the Pa class is the letter Ma.

original: mtha' ma'i sa bon ma'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: mtha' ma'i sa bon ma'i yi ge'o //
translated: The seed of the last of the Pa class is the letter Ma.

original: sbrang rtsi chen po'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni sbrang rtsi chen po ste 'joms byed chen po'i gzugs te sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis lta ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa po mi shes pa don med par byed pa po'o //
analyzed: sbrang rtsi chen po'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni sbrang rtsi chen po ste 'joms byed chen po'i gzugs te sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis lta ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa po mi shes pa don med par byed pa po'o //
translated: The form of great honey means the form of great honey, the great destroyer, the one who destroys all views with the wisdom of the Buddha, the one who makes ignorance meaningless.

original: sa mtha' ni ha'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: sa mtha' ni ha'i yi ge'o //
translated: The end of the earth is the letter ha.

original: aa yis dgang bar bya zhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ges bkang ba ste /
analyzed: aa yis dgang bar bya zhes bya ba ni a'a'i yi ges bkang ba ste /
translated: It should be filled with a means the filling with the letter a.

original: gnyis las h'a'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: gnyis las h'a'i yi ge'o //
translated: From the two, the letter ha.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs ni srog / ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs te rtsa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems babs pas srog ces bya ba ste 'dzin pa po'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs ni srog / ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs te rtsa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems babs pas srog ces bya ba ste 'dzin pa po'o //
translated: The assembly of yoginis is life means the assembly of yoginis, the life that is the descent of the bodhicitta of all the channels, the one who holds it.

original: pa mtha' mi ma'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: pa mtha' mi ma'i yi ge'o //
translated: The end of pa is the letter mi.

original: a'a dang ldan zhes bya ba ni a'a dang lhan cig pa ste /
analyzed: a'a dang ldan zhes bya ba ni a'a dang lhan cig pa ste /
translated: Endowed with a means endowed with a.

original: de bzhin du aam gi yi ges cod pan la brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du aam gi yi ges cod pan la brgyan pa ste /
translated: In the same way, adorned with the letter aṃ means adorned with the letter aṃ.🔽The letter aṃ is placed on the crown.

original: chod pan la sbras te mdor na m'am gi yi ge'o //
analyzed: chod pan la sbras te mdor na m'am gi yi ge'o //
translated: In brief, the letter maṃ.

original: chos kun gyi ni sprin rang bzhin //
analyzed: chos kun gyi ni sprin rang bzhin //
translated: The nature of the cloud of all phenomena.

original: zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi rang bzhin te skye pa dang 'jig ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi rang bzhin te skye pa dang 'jig ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the nature of the cloud of all dharmas, the meaning of which is “arising and passing away.”

original: sa yig ces bya ba ni sa'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: sa yig ces bya ba ni sa'i yi ge'o //
translated: The syllable “sa” is the syllable “sa.”

original: dam chos ni dam pa'i chos kyis mi shes pa gsod pa ste mi shes pa la gnod par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dam chos ni dam pa'i chos kyis mi shes pa gsod pa ste mi shes pa la gnod par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The “true Dharma” is the true Dharma that kills ignorance, the meaning of which is “it harms ignorance.”

original: tstshe sngags zhes bya ba ni tstshe'i yi ge'i sngags so //
analyzed: tstshe sngags zhes bya ba ni tstshe'i yi ge'i sngags so //
translated: The “mantra of tsai” is the mantra of the syllable “tsai.”

original: byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The “bodhisattva” is

original: byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bag chags kyi sgrib pa thams cad gcod pa po zhes bya ba'o //🔽song ba 'khor bar skye ba med //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bag chags kyi sgrib pa thams cad gcod pa po zhes bya ba'o // song ba 'khor bar skye ba med //
translated: the bodhisattva who cuts off all the obscurations of his own habitual tendencies.🔽“ Gone” means not being born in saṃsāra.

original: ces bya ba ni song ba de slar yang 'khor par skye ste 'khor ba po nyid kyang med ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni song ba de slar yang 'khor par skye ste 'khor ba po nyid kyang med ces bya ba'o //
translated: This means that one who has gone is not born again in saṃsāra, and also that one who is in saṃsāra does not exist.

original: ta sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni //
analyzed: ta sde'i dbus gnas sa bon ni //
translated: The seed in the middle of the ta group

original: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi dbus ma ni da'i yi ge'i sa bon no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ta'i sde tshan gyi dbus ma ni da'i yi ge'i sa bon no //
translated: is the seed of the syllable “da,” which is in the middle of the ta group.

original: da yig don med pa snang ba'o //
analyzed: da yig don med pa snang ba'o //
translated: The syllable “da” is the appearance of a meaningless object.

original: zhes bya ba ni don gyi dngos po don med pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni don gyi dngos po don med pa ste /
translated: This is the meaningless thing, the object.

original: gti mug pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gti mug pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: By delusion is meant by the word delusion.

original: na la ai dang ldan pa ste //
analyzed: na la ai dang ldan pa ste //
translated: The syllable na is endowed with ai.

original: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge la ai'i yi ges yongs su sbyar ba ste gnyis las ni'i yi ge'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni na'i yi ge la ai'i yi ges yongs su sbyar ba ste gnyis las ni'i yi ge'o //
translated: The syllable na is endowed with the syllable ai, and from the two comes the syllable ni.

original: 'jig rten ma lus 'chi ba nyid //
analyzed: 'jig rten ma lus 'chi ba nyid //
translated: The whole world is subject to death.

original: ces bya ba ni lhag ma ma lus pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams 'chi ba nyid do //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni lhag ma ma lus pa'i 'jig rten pa rnams 'chi ba nyid do //
translated: The whole world, without exception, is subject to death.

original: kro sngags zhes bya ba ni kro'i yi ge'i sngags so //
analyzed: kro sngags zhes bya ba ni kro'i yi ge'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra of kro is the mantra of the syllable kro.

original: gnon pas 'khor ba gcod ces bya ba ni shin tu gdul dka' ba'i 'khor ba rnam par gcod pa'am de bzhin du khro ba'i'o //
analyzed: gnon pas 'khor ba gcod ces bya ba ni shin tu gdul dka' ba'i 'khor ba rnam par gcod pa'am de bzhin du khro ba'i'o //
translated: By cutting off samsara by subduing is meant cutting off samsara, which is very difficult to subdue, or likewise, by anger.

original: dha'i sa bon zhes @69b bya ba ni dha'i yi ge'i sa bon no //🔽'gro kun rgyun 'joms zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa 'jig par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dha'i sa bon zhes @69b bya ba ni dha'i yi ge'i sa bon no // 'gro kun rgyun 'joms zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa 'jig par byed pa'o //
translated: The seed of dha is the seed of the syllable dha.🔽By destroying the stream of all beings is meant destroying the ignorance of all sentient beings.

original: spros pa med par byed pa'o //
analyzed: spros pa med par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the cause of the destruction of all conceptual thoughts.

original: zhes bya ba ni spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin du byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin du byed pa'o //
translated: This is the nature of non-elaboration.

original: snu'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni m'u'i yi ge'i sa bon te /🔽rmongs pa'i 'jig rten kun gyi las //
analyzed: snu'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni m'u'i yi ge'i sa bon te / rmongs pa'i 'jig rten kun gyi las //
translated: The seed of the moon is the seed of the letter m.🔽The karma of the deluded world

original: zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi las thams cad do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rmongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi las thams cad do //
translated: is all the karma of the deluded world.

original: dmyal bal sogs pa'i 'gro ba drug des de ltar spong ba de gang bshad pa'i yi ge'i don gyis so //🔽de ltar phyed bcas tshig bcu bzhi //
analyzed: dmyal bal sogs pa'i 'gro ba drug des de ltar spong ba de gang bshad pa'i yi ge'i don gyis so // de ltar phyed bcas tshig bcu bzhi //
translated: The six destinies of hell and so forth are explained by the meaning of the letters.🔽Thus, the end of the channel wheel is fourteen and a half.

original: rtsa yi 'khor lo'i mtha'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar phyed dang bcas pa'i sngags tshig bcu bzhi'i sngags kyi 'khor lo ste yi ge'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: rtsa yi 'khor lo'i mtha'o zhes bya ba ni de ltar phyed dang bcas pa'i sngags tshig bcu bzhi'i sngags kyi 'khor lo ste yi ge'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel of the mantra is the wheel of letters with fourteen and a half mantra syllables.

original: des de bzhin du rtsa bskyed pa ste tshig bshad pa /
analyzed: des de bzhin du rtsa bskyed pa ste tshig bshad pa /
translated: By that, the channels are generated.🔽The explanation of the syllables is:

original: gram thi ta /
analyzed: gram thi ta /
translated: granthi

original: dh'a ri ni /
analyzed: dh'a ri ni /
translated: dhāriṇi

original: sumbha ni sumbha /
analyzed: sumbha ni sumbha /
translated: sambha ni sambha

original: ha na ha na /
analyzed: ha na ha na /
translated: hana hana🔽prāṇām

original: pr'a n'am / sarba pa sh'a w'a nam /
analyzed: pr'a n'am / sarba pa sh'a w'a nam /
translated: sarva pāśānām

original: ma h'a m'am sa /
analyzed: ma h'a m'am sa /
translated: mahā māṃsa

original: tstshed ni / kro dha /
analyzed: tstshed ni / kro dha /
translated: cchedi krodha

original: m'u zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: m'u zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The au is the same as before.🔽🔽

original: bum pa can la sogs pa'i las //
analyzed: bum pa can la sogs pa'i las //
translated: The yogi/nī should do whatever action he/she desires,

original: rnal 'byor gang dang gang 'dod byed //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gang dang gang 'dod byed //
translated: such as the vase-breathing, etc.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: This is what is intended.

original: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams kyis 'dod pas las gang dang gang gis te bum pa can la sogs pa'i las kyis so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams kyis 'dod pas las gang dang gang gis te bum pa can la sogs pa'i las kyis so //
translated: The yogi/nī should do whatever action he/she desires, by whatever action, such as the vase-breathing, etc.

original: zhi ba la sogs pas bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: zhi ba la sogs pas bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: One should do the pacifying, etc.🔽This is what is intended.

original: 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
analyzed: 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sbyor ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
translated: The application is by means of samādhi.

original: rkang pa'i bar du sems kyis srog gi rlung nor bu'i skud pa lta bu bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rkang pa'i bar du sems kyis srog gi rlung nor bu'i skud pa lta bu bsam par bya'o //
translated: Up to the feet, one should imagine the life-force wind like a string of pearls.

original: de'i dngos grub bdag nyid kyis tshig gi gzhan gyi go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: de'i dngos grub bdag nyid kyis tshig gi gzhan gyi go 'phang ngo //
translated: Its accomplishment is one's own state of speech.

original: sbyor ba grub ces bya ba ni de'i tshe rnal 'byor gyi nus pa'i dus su 'grub pa ste /
analyzed: sbyor ba grub ces bya ba ni de'i tshe rnal 'byor gyi nus pa'i dus su 'grub pa ste /
translated: The accomplishment of the application is at the time of the power of yoga, accomplishment.

original: yi ge'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo la zhi ba'i las la sogs pa 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yi ge'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo la zhi ba'i las la sogs pa 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The wheel of the machine of syllables is the yoga of desiring the pacifying activity, etc. This is the meaning.

original: de yang thabs kyi 'khor lo drug po de'i rim pas rab tu sbyor bar gsungs pa ste 'di ni rdo rje phag mo'i tshig go //
analyzed: de yang thabs kyi 'khor lo drug po de'i rim pas rab tu sbyor bar gsungs pa ste 'di ni rdo rje phag mo'i tshig go //
translated: The Bhagavān has said that the six cakras of method are applied in sequence. This is the statement of Vajravārāhī.

original: tshig de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig gsungs pa ;
analyzed: tshig de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig gsungs pa ;
translated: For that reason, the Bhagavān has said:

original: gtsug tor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /🔽gtsug tor ni nam mkha'o //
analyzed: gtsug tor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / gtsug tor ni nam mkha'o //
translated: The crown, and so on.🔽The crown is space.

original: lus ni lte ba'o //
analyzed: lus ni lte ba'o //
translated: The body is the navel.

original: ngag ni mgrin pa'o //
analyzed: ngag ni mgrin pa'o //
translated: Speech is the throat.

original: sems ni snying ga'o //
analyzed: sems ni snying ga'o //
translated: The mind is the heart.

original: shes zhes bya ba ni lhan skyes so //
analyzed: shes zhes bya ba ni lhan skyes so //
translated: The gnosis is the secret place.

original: skye gnas ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste /🔽de ltar lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi @70a * //
analyzed: skye gnas ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste / de ltar lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi @70a * //
translated: The birthplace is the gnosis cakra.

original: mthun pas re re'i mthar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mthun pas re re'i mthar shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should understand that the forward and reverse sequences are at the end of each.

original: de nyid byang chub rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bab pa las rtogs par bya zhing shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid byang chub rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bab pa las rtogs par bya zhing shes par bya ba'o //
translated: That itself is to be understood by the buddhas.

original: 'di ni thabs kyi cha dang ni //
analyzed: 'di ni thabs kyi cha dang ni //
translated: This is the portion of method.

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i 'khor lo drug thabs kyi rang bzhin te sngon du grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i 'khor lo drug thabs kyi rang bzhin te sngon du grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is the six wheels of explanation, which are of the nature of method, because they are already accomplished.

original: da ni shes rab kyi cha 'khrul 'khor gsungs pa /
analyzed: da ni shes rab kyi cha 'khrul 'khor gsungs pa /
translated: Now, the machine of the part of wisdom is stated:

original: shes rab kyi cha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi cha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The part of wisdom, etc.
